description: Gilmar Real Estate offers you the opportunity to acquire this exclusive brand new apartment with a private terrace next to Las Canteras Beach, considered the best urban beach in the world. A luxury, now at your fingertips. The eighty-two square meter flat is distributed in an independent kitchen, utility room, living room, two bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them en suite, as well as a private terrace of about nine square meters. The house has a garage and storage room included in the price. Undoubtedly, a safe bet for the most demanding in one of the most sought-after areas of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. description: Gilmar puts at your disposal, in this detached house built on a farm of 5.000 m2 in the protected natural area of Bandama, in front of the Caldera, an experience of peace, countryside, luxury and comfort, since its nearly 400 m2 of housing are developed almost entirely on a single floor, with constant communication with the cobbled gardens and dressed in stonework from Arucas. It is a home ready to move into. The environment of the farm is agricultural composed of vineyards and fruit trees. A wonderful rural environment excellently connected to the highway that allows us to reach the city in 12 minutes and the international airport in 17 minutes. Bandama Golf Course at 1.5 kms and El Cortijo at 8 kms. A few meters from the public transport stop and several schools such as the Colegio Hispano Inglés and the Colegio Americano. Its four bedrooms, three bathrooms, living room connected to a modern kitchen, living room, are some of the spaces, although undoubtedly the protagonism belongs to a beautiful porch with enough space to house a comfortable outdoor living room and a dining room, which can be supplied both from the kitchen and from the barbecue area. Pergolas and terraces, tool room, cistern pond, kennel are other constructions on the estate as well as a 130 m2 warehouse whose versatility can satisfy sportsmen, artists and even car collectors.

description: A piece of history of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria in this manor house built in Ciudad Jardín in the twenties, by the architect Miguel Martín Fernández de la Torre and belonging to the Ley-Martín neighborhood. Ciudad Jardín, with its exclusively residential character, is a neighborhood located in the heart of the city, mainly made up of single-family homes with one or two floors, generally landscaped and with large green areas for recreation, among which the Stadium Park, the Doramas Park and Roman Park. A luxury to be able to move on foot through this modern city without having to use a private vehicle. Imposing house with two main floors of about one hundred and eighty-five square meters plus a charming penthouse of about thirty-six square meters with a hundred terrace. The building is located in the center of a plot of five hundred and eighty square meters, occupying approximately one third and the rest being a garden. The areas are very classically distributed with a day area on the ground floor with several rooms, kitchen and service area and the rest area on the first floor with four bedrooms, highlighting the size of the main en-suite room with a spacious bathroom. The road access is found in Campoamor street where several cars can be located between the covered area and the one that is not. It is a house that requires an important update in its condition, although it does not require modifications in its distribution since it can be considered suitable for the family model of modern times. Information: The sale price does not include transfer taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer according to law. description: GILMAR presents this impressive home that you will fall in love with. From the moment set foot in this house, you will realize that it is much more than just a property. It is a home full of life, light and emotions that will make you feel at home from the first instant. The four rooms of this completely renovated house will welcome you with open arms, each with its own personality and special charm, in addition to its two fully equipped bathrooms for your greatest comfort. The kitchen is a true jewel, with its central island covered in Dekton material and a microcement that invites you to cook and share unique moments. The oak floors give to the house an elegant and sophisticated touch, and the double-glazed windows with thermal break and CORTIZO brand double enclosure in anthracite color guarantee a optimal isolation at the same time that will allow you to enjoy unobstructed views. Lighting is a key element in this house, with indirect lights that create a warm and welcoming atmosphere in all rooms. The fireplace in the living room is the perfect place to enjoy a winter afternoon with a good movie or a good book in hand. It also has centralized air conditioning by means of a heat pump that makes the comfort a luxury in each of the rooms and seasons of the year. But what really makes this house special is the feeling of home that invades you from the first moment. It is a place where you can create lasting memories with your loved ones and where you can enjoy life at its best. The 450 square meter plot with a parking area for two vehicles with WALLBOX type electric car charger will allow you to enjoy sustainable mobility, and the location in the Carretera de Bandama area, in Santa Brígida, is simply spectacular. Are you ready to fall in love with this house? Contact us to arrange a visit! We guarantee that you will not regret it. **The exposed data is merely informative and may be subject to errors or inadvertent omissions. Expenses related to the sale are not included in the price selling.

description: Canarian house on one floor with plot and sea views.This emblematic classic-style house is unique for its location at the foot of Pico de Bandama, for its splendid renovation and for its privileged location with dream views. Oriented to the Southeast, 15 minutes from the Airport and the Capital and very close to the residential area of Tafira - Monte Lentiscal.It is located on a 1,600-meter plot with terraces, access on foot to different walking routes, nature and silence. A large garden surrounds the entire house with native flora and fauna. The property is divided into a main house and an apartment, both connected by a common terrace.A wooden door defines the main entrance.We enter the main house through the kitchen, with an office and pantry, it connects with the large dining room open to the living room with access to the terrace.The terrace flies over the views to the east of the island, enjoying incredible views over the sea.The main house has a master bedroom with dressing room and bathroom en suite.Office area and living room complete the house. The reform has wanted to highlight the original elements such as the stone floor, the wood and the Canarian stone ashlars.The best materials have been added to the original renovated elements in order to achieve quality and comfort in each room. The apartment has its own terrace, garden and glazed porch outside.Inside it has two bedrooms, a bathroom and a living room open to the kitchen with views of Bandama. It has a Vacation Rental License and currently obtains very good profitability, with a score of 9.8 (Exceptional) on Booking. Covered area to park four or five cars. Housing ready to install. Privacy and silence guaranteed for those who value tranquility.Contact Gilmar and we will be happy to assist you to expand the information and organize a visit. Information: The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer. description: Gilmar Real Estate is pleased to present this Detached Villa for Sale in La Atalaya de Santa Brígida. Family home in a green environment with the best construction materials and with all the details so that your day to day is filled with comfort and enjoyment. The house is distributed in two heights, the car reaches the main floor, with direct access to the main floor of the house. The ground floor has an entrance hall, distributor, bedroom with full bathroom, living room with dining room and access to the covered terrace and garden. The kitchen with pantry and utility room completes the floor. The views from all the rooms are beautiful, covering the east side of the island, watching the sunrise. The first floor has a master bedroom with dressing room, bathroom en suite and balcony. Two children's bedrooms with bathroom and fitted wardrobes and large windows. Two other double bedrooms with another bathroom complete the floor. In addition, one of the double bedrooms has a loft and a private balcony. The semi-basement has a cistern and multifunctional space and storage area. Built with the best materials, with double insulation throughout the building, Persian Red Marble and Vitacola Wood, spacious spaces and quality in every detail. The outdoor space has a terrace with a barbecue area, a garden with views and a pool area with a green area. The interior garage for two cars has an electric car charger. Two minutes by car from the town of La Atalaya and fifteen from the center of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, surrounded by nature and in a dead-end street, a unique home for enjoyment. Contact us, we will be happy to assist you and provide more information.

Both with fitted wardrobes and exterior windows. One of them with sea views. 5. Bathroom with shower tray and bidet. Air conditioning in bedrooms and living room. description: Gilmar presents this exclusive detached villa with swimming pool and beautiful views of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria and Santa Brígida. Specifically in the exclusive residential area of Cuesta La Grama, just seven minutes from the town centre of La Villa de Santa Brígida. It is the third smallest municipality on the island in terms of surface area and with the highest per capita income in the Canary Islands, and only fifteen kilometres from the capital. Built with top quality materials, it is equipped with underfloor heating, air conditioning, floating parquet and marble floors. The house is designed in such a way that no walls are in contact with the ground, which greatly improves its conservation. All the technical elements of the machine room have been duplicated so that at no time can the house be affected by a breakdown. The interior layout of the main building is on two levels. Access to the house is from the upper level, the day area, distributed in a kitchen connected to the dining room, living room, library with adjoining office and guest toilet and also two glazed terraces designed to enjoy the views in both winter and summer. An interior staircase leads to the sleeping area, with four spacious double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The master bedroom has two dressing rooms and a double en-suite bathroom. All with exterior access to the gardens.  Attached to the main building is the service flat.

description: Escape to paradise in this spacious family villa in a premium location.  You will love the exclusive location full of lush greenery and without direct neighbors for plenty of added privacy.  Enjoy easy access to all the best local and international schools, bus stop and amenities (supermarket, pharmacy, etc. )! The perfect investment opportunity, use this home as your residence and also enjoy the separate renovated apartment that could be used as a guest suite or rental unit. Plus, there’s so much extra space there’s even room to build another apartment by the garden or expand on the existing unit – the opportunities are endless!  It is e. g. possible to expand to a total of up to 9 bedrooms. In this moment the villa provides of 6 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, office, dining room, large living room with chimney, 3 balconies, several terraces, lawn and a wonderful orchard. Double garage (52 sqm) for 2 cars and storage space. Possibility to build a swimming pool or jacuzzi on the lawn. The home is beautiful and offers a timeless modern design that is as comfortable as it is stylish. An effortless flow guides you through the living and entertainment spaces where you’ll love hosting friends and family. Plenty of warm natural light highlights the designer tile flooring and rich wooden details throughout.  Find even more entertainment space outside on your private balcony and quiet backyard where you can enjoy fruit trees and picturesque views of the Green Mountains and to the sea. Back inside, the private family spaces are equally as nice with spacious and comfy bedrooms and roomy bathrooms. Virtual Tour Apartment:  Virtual Tour Chalet:.

The architecture is very interesting. Everything is very light and airy, some of the rooms are very high and the whole house is divided by several mezzanines. This gives the house a large living space and three self-contained residential units. The house has 3 floors, each floor has its own entrance. The upper and middle floors are also connected by a sweeping staircase. The upper floor can be reached via the garage. The garage was converted in a kitchen. In addition, there are two large bedrooms, two full baths and a walk-in closet and a storage room on the upper floor. On the middle floor there is the large living room with fireplace with attached independent kitchen, pantry and dining room with access to the large terrace. There is another bedroom and bathroom on this floor. On the ground floor there is another large terrace with a small garden, a studio apartment with kitchen and bathroom and another separate large living room. Washing machine and garden tools are in a separate building. Due to its construction, the cottage is also suitable as a B&B.

description: Probably one of the best located properties and in the best area of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Ciudad Jardín, on the corner, overlooking the sea and surrounded by the largest green areas in the city, the Doramas Park and Gardens, Néstor Museum, Gardens and Hotel Santa Catalina and Pueblo Canario. On a 457 m2 plot and with a total of 486 m2 built on two levels, plus a parking floor. The property has an adjoining independent plot, where the old swimming pool of the family home was located, gardens, warehouse and leisure area with an area of 470m2 that are added to the previous ones, having a total of almost 1,000m2. This spectacular property is distributed as follows: FIRST FLOOR: entrance hall, large living-dining room that opens onto a large terrace with views of the Hotel Santa Catalina y Jardines, with the sea in the background, three double bedrooms, and one single, all of them with fitted wardrobes, the master bedroom with en-suite suite, an office and two more bathrooms, independent kitchen and utility room. A corridor runs through the central part of the house with large built-in wardrobes for storage. All the residences are exterior. SECOND FLOOR: a spacious double living-dining room that opens onto the large upper terrace, with the best views of the house, unobstructed views of the gardens and the sea as on the lower floor, surrounding the house three double bedrooms and one single, the main one with a bathroom en suite, all with built-in wardrobes, an office, two more bathrooms that serve the rest of the rooms and an independent kitchen. All the rooms open onto a large terrace that surrounds the entire house from east to west, making the most of the sunlight. Large windows in all rooms and surrounded by green areas, a very quiet and central area, in the heart of the city. GARAGE FLOOR: on the ground floor of the plot, with capacity for more than ten cars, storage room and toilet. All this defines it as a property with a lot of potential, very SPECIAL and UNIQUE, both for its strategic location and for its wide views. Information: The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.

description: We offer this large semi-detached house for sale near Siete Palmas, located in a quiet area with all services nearby. The house is distributed as follows: We enter through the main door that leads to a spacious hall. From this point, we can go both inside and outside. The ground floor has a living room, bathroom, kitchen, dining room, reading corner and two bedrooms, one of them with an adjoining room, ideal for use as an office. The upper floor has two other large rooms, one of them with a connected room perfect for use as a dressing room. Both share a bathroom. All rooms are very spacious and bright. The house has an adjoining space of 146 m2 that is currently the garage. It needs reforms but it has a high potential, since due to the height of its ceilings, it can be very usable for mezzanines and a storage area. The exterior is one of its most remarkable points; a large wooden porch with barbecue, swimming pool, toilet and solarium, large and comfortable spaces to enjoy fun celebrations with family or friends. Without a doubt, living here is synonymous with well-being. Right in front we find one of the most prestigious educational centers on the island, the Arenas school. Other very useful services nearby such as a pharmacy, supermarkets, restaurants, entertainment for the little ones, etc. The qualities that this property offers you are two great advantages: its location and characteristics give you the tranquility you deserve and the opportunity to have a spacious house with a pool in the city, without having to go far, with everything just a few minutes away.

description: Beautiful penthouse on Calle Mayor de Triana, in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. A mixed-use, modern and balanced building, located in the heart of Triana on the pedestrian street and close to Parque San Telmo. With general access from Fco street. Gourié, its generous and imposing design, has turned this building into an urban icon of the new Canarian architecture. The house is developed on 2 levels and is located on the top floor of the Dunas Triana building, which has a 24-hour security and doorman service. Access to the different homes on this exclusive residential floor is from an impressive common hall, illuminated from above. by a huge skylight that bathes a charming zen garden in light. The access floor or main floor, with a surface area of 133 m², contains all the main uses of the house: Large entrance hall, modern glazed kitchen, good dining room, spacious living room with direct window to Triana street. A side corridor accompanied by a beautiful landscaped and glazed patio, which fills the route with nature and distributes two spacious, well-lit bedrooms with high ceilings, a very well-equipped bathroom; Arriving at the façade, there is the master bedroom with a large en-suite bathroom and windows overlooking Triana street. A modern and light wooden staircase leads us to the upper floor of the house, where we find a huge living room of more than 30 m², currently used as an office, with its own interior toilet; another outside toilet and all surrounded by various terraces of 45 m² in total, for private use of the house, which allow you to develop a variety of outdoor activities, enjoying the sky at all times and impressive views over the traditional city of Las Palmas, the Triana neighborhood and in the distance the unique buildings of Los Riscos. The combination of noble and elegant materials, natural textures and overhead lighting fill interiors with light and provide an inimitable feeling of intimacy and comfort. The house is also sold with two parking spaces and two storage rooms, located on the ground floor of the same building and directly connected to the floor by several elevators. Feel the luxury of living in the heart of the city of Las Palmas where architecture, culture, commerce, restaurants and the best cosmopolitan atmosphere: playful and professional are perfectly combined. Contact me, request your visit and feel its potential.

description: Revised price! Excellent opportunity. The Vegueta neighborhood is the founding nucleus and old quarter of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Historic buildings, squares, museums and a more than remarkable cultural and gastronomic offer make Vegueta the ideal place to reside. Living here is synonymous with quality of life, as well as an enormous privilege. Now you have the excellent opportunity to reside in this historic neighborhood, in this fantastic two-story Canarian house, located on the well-known López Botas street, between Plaza de Santo Domingo and the Canarian Museum. Brightness, wide spaces and many possibilities make this property the ideal home for you and your family. A spacious and elegant office, where noble woods predominate, opens the way to the interior of the house through a spectacular typical Canarian patio, which provides the house with natural light in all its rooms. It consists of two floors and almost 400 m2, with ten rooms, two bathrooms, a toilet and a kitchen. High ceilings, arches, wooden floors and lots of light make the main room the ideal place to enjoy pleasant moments with family and friends. It also has a large walkable roof terrace with access from the inside with a large laundry room. Ideal as a habitual residence or as a small charming hostel or urban hotel. Do not miss the opportunity and request more information. Expenses and taxes derived from the sale are not included in the price.

Now that you have put yourself in the situation: House for sale in Firgas, with beautiful views and terraces. Located in a residential area, aptly named Buen Lugar, we find this house that reveals the history of a family, for which this house has become great and wants to make way for new stories and experiences. The house is divided into two houses, differentiated, in fact they have a horizontal division, each of them has three bedrooms. On the ground floor, the house is larger, it has 135 meters, in which we are received by a large distributor, which causes the house to have no corridors, from it, we can move to any room, all very bright, with windows to the Outside, on this floor we have a bathroom, and obviously there is the garage, which is for one car. Going up the stairs, we can access the house that is on the top floor, or the terrace and roof terrace. This house is also spacious, it has almost 90 meters, here we are greeted by the very large kitchen, with a bar, which can be a kitchen-living room or kitchen with a dining room, the views are unobstructed and the area is very sunny. Upon entering the house, we access a living room and from there to the bedrooms and bathroom, the main one with a built-in bathroom, from the landing through which this house is accessed, we can access the terrace and laundry rooms, and from there to the roof, all very open and sunny. In the house you can breathe good vibrations, a clean and fresh environment. It is an area with few neighbors, 25 minutes from the capital... Do you dare to come see it?

description: GILMAR offers you this spacious and bright flat located on the isthmus of Las Canteras, a stone's throw from the beach of the same name and considered an emblem of the island and one of the twenty-five best urban beaches in the world by National Geographic. Its promenade has become a leisure area where you can enjoy wide promenades with an infinity of cafés, terraces, a varied selection of international restaurants and an infinity of services such as a supermarket, small shops and a pharmacy. The property, on the fifth and last floor and east facing, enjoys views of the "Poema del Mar" aquarium and cruise port and has plenty of light from the early hours of the morning. Its location makes it excellent both at the entrance and exit of the isthmus of Las Canteras, either towards the Avenida Maritima or towards Albareda street.  It has a large living room, two bedrooms with spacious built-in wardrobes (originally there were three bedrooms with the possibility of having them again), a kitchen refurbished a few years ago with exquisite taste and two complete bathrooms. It also has the use and enjoyment of a terrace area just above the property. All this with the convenience of having a garage and storage room in the basement. Don't miss the opportunity to live in one of the most sought-after areas of the city. The information given is for information purposes only and may be subject to errors or involuntary omissions. description: Gilmar puts at your disposal on this occasion this fabulous semi-detached house on Mount Lentiscal, with a garden and views of the Bandama mountain. Ready to move into and with very good communication with the ring road as well as with public transport, access on foot to restaurants, supermarkets, etc. The house can be accessed both through the main hall and through a direct service access to the kitchen. The distribution of the chalet dedicates the upper floors to rest with its three bedrooms, one of them with a terrace, plus the independent Suite in the attic. The main floor is divided into a living room with parquet flooring and a comfortable kitchen with various environments and access to the garden. In the garden, together with the barbecue area we find an office or games room separated from the house as well as a laundry room. The approximately 150 square meters of exteriors house another very pleasant corner in the front area of the property where you can enjoy the beautiful sunsets of Monte Lentiscal. It is located in a cul-de-sac that provides a plus of tranquility for a large family looking for a comfortable home to live in.

description: Gilmar presents this time a house like few others in Ciudad Jardín. It is a single-family Villa from the end of the seventies developed by ninety percent on one floor on a plot of eight hundred and thirty-four square meters, leaving a total of five hundred and seventy-two square meters free for the garden. Ciudad Jardín is an exclusively residential area located in the heart of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. It is considered one of the most privileged in the capital of the island and is perfect for a family who wants to surround themselves with green areas without depriving themselves of the advantages of living in the city center. In the surroundings we find prestigious private schools, sports centers, as well as recreational areas and beautiful parks. In short, all the necessary services and good access to the city's ring road, which connects us to the international airport in twenty-two minutes. The house is distributed over two main floors and a basement with a garage with capacity for three vehicles. The main floor, with its three hundred square meters built, in its current design draws a total of five rooms plus a service room, four bathrooms, a large kitchen connected to the dining room and two living rooms as well as two terraces. The house is completed by a cozy open library and a terrace on the upper floor. The prominence of the garden is permanent. Although the building is in an impeccable state of conservation, given its age it requires some updating that thanks to its distribution, easily becomes a home updated to the most open and communicated designs of our days.

The floors of the house are made of Jatoba and the doors and windows of Vitacola. In line with these quality woods are the exterior stone cladding from Ayagaure and stonework from Arucas, the limestone cladding from Valencia and the Travertine marble for the bathrooms. description: Noble house with 200 years of history located in the historic center of the City of Arucas in front of the most important building, the Church of San Juan Bautista. More commonly known as the "Cathedral of Arucas" and the Plaza de San Juan. This house is surrounded by buildings of historical importance from the 17th century to the 20th century. Completely renovated, it has a nice cafeteria called "La Dolorosa" with a terrace (currently in operation) located facing the cathedral, where you can enjoy the pleasant views while having a drink and enjoying those afternoon conversations with family and friends. This property has innumerable possibilities. In addition to the cafeteria, it has dining areas with kitchen and industrial extraction. Patio, bathrooms for clients, etc. On the upper floor, huge rooms that can be used as a habitual residence, in a small hotel or even as a vacation rental. It has a large terrace where the cathedral takes center stage. Impress the immensity of this, even seeming that you can touch with just stretch your arm. Without a doubt, an enveloping sensation at all hours of the day, increasing this sensation in the sunrises and sunsets. The Cathedral and the Plaza de San Juan are very popular due to their location, since they are visited not only by residents but also by a large number of tourists who come as a must to these monuments declared of cultural interest. Arucas is located to the north of the island of Gran Canaria, just 7 minutes from Las Palmas de Gran Canaria (capital of the island) and surrounded by all kinds of services that are demanded such as supermarkets, schools, restaurants, parks, centers health, commercial premises, bus station, etc. It becomes like this, in a locality near the capital surrounded by singularity and history to which it does not lack of anything. Stable climate, natural environment, tranquility, much peace and tranquility. Do not hesitate any more, if you want to live in a property with fairytale views, full of uniqueness and personality, which also brings a lot of light and charm. This is your home! Request information and come to visit it. It will exceed your expectations.

Here there is a small fishing pier with an excellent restaurant in its brotherhood, a lighthouse and a spectacular bathing area to take a good dip, practice scuba diving and other water sports. In addition to its enviable constant temperature throughout the year and its always calm sea, Taliarte has something special that makes everyone who visits it fall in love. Now you have the excellent opportunity to reside in this fantastic enclave a few meters from the promenade, the fishing port and its exclusive bathing areas in this wonderful semi-detached house. Being a corner, it has a large terrace which you can give multiple uses, from a solarium with a shower to sunbathe in complete tranquility to a chill out and barbecue area where you can spend endearing moments with family and friends. The house has three bedrooms, two of them double and one single (currently as a dressing room), an attic, three bathrooms, a living room with a terrace and a large kitchen with access to the outdoor terrace. In the basement it has a garage for two vehicles, a laundry area and a large space (115 m2) for whatever use you want to give it (independent apartment, play area or cinema, office... etc. ), What comes to mind. description: Magnificent villa for sale in the area of Santa Brigida. A wonderful property ready to move in and enjoy its large garden or its modern swimming pool.    In Camino de Gargujo we will see this house, very spacious, bright, with a classic design and decoration that exudes charm in all its corners.    You will be able to enjoy wonderful views and all the tranquillity of the world without having to give up all that the city has to offer, just a few minutes drive away.    Santa Brígida is one of the most exclusive areas of Gran Canaria. Its location is perfect if you are looking to get away from the city but don't want to go too far. You will always be surrounded by a beautiful landscape where green is the main colour.    The house is very close to the old town so you will have all the basic services (supermarkets, chemists, shops... ) very close by.    A dream space with 886 m2, four double bedrooms, four bathrooms, a toilet, two living rooms, a dressing room, dining room and a huge kitchen with a beautiful maroon natural granite island.    The whole house is made with the best materials on the market: marble in the bathrooms, vitacola wood floors, American oak for the doors... , all the details are of exceptional quality.    The villa is composed of two floors: on the upper floor we can find the four bedrooms, one of the living rooms, the kitchen, the dining room and a small covered terrace. On the lower floor there is another living room, a beautiful library, the terrace overlooking the large garden (100m2) and a garage for two cars. Finally, in the outdoor area there is a 50 m2 (10x5) swimming pool, a playhouse, a machine room, a bathroom and the outdoor garage with capacity for six cars.    Some of the bathrooms have a sauna and hydromassage so that you can enjoy a little relaxation after a hard day's work. The kitchen is fully equipped and its spaciousness and design will give you all the practicality you need when preparing your favourite recipes. The pool area and garden are ideal for enjoying coffee or tea in the morning or a glass of wine in the evening.    This property will become your haven when you are looking for peace and quiet or to spend time with friends or family over a good barbecue, call and ask without obligation!

description: Sale of fantastic independent duplex villa designed and built with great charm.Located 10 minutes from the city of Las Palmas, in a residential area in the quiet neighborhood of Las Mesas, is this excellent two-story home with a built area of 250 m². The house is accessed from the quiet and safe cul de sac of this sought after residential area.The type of isolated, independent house allows you to enjoy the large terrace space around the house, providing it with several outdoor areas with a good possibility of enjoying it with the family or as a safe recreation area for the children of the house. The distribution of the house is developed as follows: It is accessed through a generous private garden: a spacious and diaphanous space that characterizes this plot where you can create different environments to enjoy depending on the situation: landscaped solarium, outdoor dining room to see the stars, barbecue area and several corners where you can relax, with lots of possibilities. Once in the house, on the ground floor, we find a large living room with a fireplace and a spacious dining room in the same environment, a very comfortable and functional kitchen that is especially bright and surrounded by windows with a very charming toilet and a cozy guest room with wardrobes. embedded.All on the same floor at street level. The staircase is wide and exquisitely designed, well lit by a generous skylight and perfectly integrated into the general space of the house.It takes us to the Upper and Rest Floor, where we find the usual use where we can enjoy the views offered by the area.On this upper floor there are 3 large bedrooms and another space for a second living room and work area with two bathrooms, one of them en suite and connected to a spacious dressing room. The house is in a very good state of conservation and designed with a completely rustic atmosphere, typical of Nordic countries.Sold without furniture. In recent years, Las Mesas has experienced significant development due to the improvement of the communications infrastructures built, which have led to the establishment of numerous commercial services that facilitate and improve the lives of its residents, including: Los Alisios Shopping Center, Decathlon, Leroy Merlin, etcGood communication with the rest of the island, as well as very close means of transport and all the services within one's reach, give this house all the characteristics that a family needs. description: It is a stately colonial-style house, from the year 1800 in the Vegueta neighborhood, in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, well preserved and with many possibilities (regular residence, charming hotel... etc). It's found just 100 meters from Plaza Santa Ana, the Canary Museum and the Cathedral of Las Palmas among others, right in the epicenter of the Vegueta neighborhood. It is made up of 2 large floors plus an extensive roof terrace on several levels and practicable, with the possibility of creating spaces to enjoy the fantastic climate of the city and the views of the cathedral and the sea. Fantastic traditional central Canarian patio with native plants, and a wonderful and spacious garden at the back. The façade has a symmetrical neoclassical composition, highlighting its colonial-style wooden balcony. It has a main entrance, with wooden shutters, with walls that mix stonework from Arucas and tiles from the period, and a wooden ceiling with beautiful beams in perfect condition. The interior of the house is in a stately style, the large rooms stand out, in a classic style, rooms with high ceilings, noble materials and finishes. Almost all the rooms face the central patio that has, in addition to the vegetation, a water fountain in the middle. In the patio is the main stone staircase that leads to the first floor where the rooms on this level are located and which are preserved with the original style of the first owners. It currently has 14 rooms in total (being able to create more according to needs), kitchens on both floors, several bathrooms, pantries, a garage for several vehicles and endless possibilities. Falling in love with this historic and wonderful property will be as simple as requesting a visit and coming to see it, you will not regret it. Expenses and taxes derived from the sale are not included in the price.

description: Just 8 minutes from Los Alisios Shopping Center, built with magnificent qualities, I present this wonderful house, located in a residential area on the way up to San José del Álamo, a quiet area with beautiful views.To begin with, I must comment that it has all the well-differentiated spaces, in which, if we enter through the main door, the garden welcomes us, and if we enter through the garage, we access the service area.Each space has its differentiation and access.It has a spacious bedroom on the main floor, so you do not have to climb stairs if you have a family member with reduced mobility, apart from that, a forklift or elevator can be installed in the house. The house is built on a plot of almost 500 square meters, in which we find a garden area, parking for 5 cars, terrace, solarium, barbecue area and, of course, the house itself.The roof is made of tile, 4 waters, with insulation. Upon entering the house, we find a large hall, which leads us to the kitchen, which has windows and a balcony facing the rear and beautiful views.To the living room, which has a fireplace or to the study area, which can perfectly be a separate bedroom with a built-in wardrobe, without barriers on this floor, where we also have a toilet.All the pavement is Carrara Marble.If we go up the stairs, with the same pavement but in reddish tones, it leads us to a very spacious living room with a French balcony and a large window, from here, we can go to three of the bedrooms in the house, all with built-in wardrobes, which share a bathroom complete, or to the master bedroom suite, which has a complete bathroom, which in addition to a bathtub has a tray with a screen and two different dressing rooms, mounted with mirrors on the back of the doors.This entire floor, with bedrooms and living room or open TV room, is paved with laminated jatoba flooring, which makes it warmer and more welcoming. On the other hand, either from the main floor or from the outside through the right side of the house, we can access the basement, which is not actually a basement, but a ground floor with a covered terrace in front and windows throughout its area., including English patio windows, with which the entire house has windows for light and air.This floor, currently, is an area where we find a gym, with a shower and full bathroom, a bar or wine cellar area, a games area, a storage room, a workshop and a machine room, with a 35m2 cistern, from this area, We go outside, which is the back of the house and is where we have the barbecue area with terrace and seating area.The exterior structure of the basement is made of reinforced concrete, with insulation throughout the foundation. Taking into account its qualities, spaces, ventilation and construction details, you want to stay in this house, create personalized environments, give it your personal touch and live it in its entirety. SOME DETAILS TO HIGHLIGHT: The construction of the house is a block of 35 double chamber with insulation It is a house that has propane heating 4 water roof As well as, in all the rooms it has a telephone and television socket The kitchen is furnished and equipped with an induction hob. The thermos in the house is propane The interior doors are lacquered in white. The windows of the entire house are European climalit The blinds on the upper floor are adjustable Venetian blinds The house has an alarm and led emergency lighting The property is sold with water rights Water use and redirection engine The distance, in time, from the house, to the La Suerte roundabout, is 8 minutes Shall we visit?

description: Upcoming spectacular homes to move into in Guía. An exclusive, modern, unique, ambitious and efficient project of single-family homes in the best area of Santa María de Guía with a direct connection to the highway. All the houses have three floors. The semi-basement will have a constructed area of 82 m2, it will function as a garage and a part has been adapted to a multipurpose area (gym.movie theater etc...). The ground floor will have a constructed area of 63 m2, with terraces and gardens surrounding the living-dining area, this space is ideal for enjoying good times with family and friends, its large windows provide light and a feeling of freedom, We complement this day area with a large independent kitchen at the front, its large window to the outside will provide natural light, its surface area of more than 12 m2 will provide us with a spacious and very, very bright space.The concept that we have designed is that of a plan that is as diaphanous as possible, with light as the protagonist and where the spaces are defined in a natural way, with the added value of the garden and the terrace. The constructed area of the upper floor is 57 m2, it will be distributed in three bedrooms with built-in wardrobes (the main suite type with a private balcony).Two bathrooms and another balcony. Residencial Brisabai has been designed by and for families, the people who inhabit it, whatever their age, will be able to enjoy this small neighborhood built from scratch and thinking of them.From the garbage containers that will be buried, through the garden areas, children's play areas, wide, comfortable sidewalks and trees, all without incurring an extra cost for the owners. Another point where the technical team has paid special attention is in the design of the facades, they are the letter of introduction of the homes, for that reason they sought to combine efficiency, design and functionality. *Prices from 265,000 euros The homes are not sold furnished, the decoration shown in the infographics is simulated.

description: Can you imagine living in a place where PEACE is breathed? Do you want to feel the fresh air caressing your face at dawn? Do you want to see the stars 365 days a year from your own home? It is difficult to imagine without coming to see it and enjoy the sensations that you can have with this home. Do you want me to tell you more? A chalet built with great care, comfortable, with spacious and bright rooms, where even the smallest detail is taken care of. When I imagine a house to live in, I think of open-plan rooms with large beds that have wardrobes where I can store all my little things, and very importantly, with exterior windows that illuminate me and allow me to breathe the outside air without contamination from smoke or noises. You will tell me if you agree with me when you come to see this little house. I keep telling you.. . Do you want a terrace for barbecues? We have her.. . Do you want a small garden to plant your flowers and fruits and vegetables? We have her.. . Do you want a solarium where you can sunbathe? We have it.. . Do you want a separate bedroom with a bathroom for when guests come? We have it.. . Do you want a large garage that allows you to also use it as a storage room? We have it.. . We do not have a magic wand but we do have this home to experience magical moments with the family. Come and see it and you will be surprised, I fell in love when I saw it for the first time! Wait, I can only tell you that in a few minutes you will be at the exit to the ring road to Las Palmas on the North road. And that I could not finish without mentioning my beloved Villa de Moya, endearing and welcoming, with a taste for good gastronomy and for the magnificent local product. I wait for you.. . If you need it, we can help you with all the mortgage management. The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.

description: Magnificent opportunity to acquire a large apartment with the best views of the city in an emblematic building: Torre Las Palmas, by the prestigious architect Bernardo Suárez García. The house has two entrance doors, a main one through which you enter directly from the elevator to the lobby, without a landing but with a security door, and another secondary or service door on the right wing of this tenth floor. Upon entering from the main door we cross a hall that leads to a spacious and bright living room that connects directly through a sliding door with a large dining room with views of Ciudad Jardín. Adjacent to the living room and dining room we find a large covered terrace, with spectacular views of the Bay of La Luz and Las Palmas. The kitchen, of generous dimensions and again with spectacular views, communicates with the dining room and with a corridor where the service area is located (laundry room, service bedroom and bathroom, storage room or pantry). The remaining 4 bedrooms are located in the left wing of the house. All with exterior windows and fitted wardrobes. The main bedroom with bathroom en suite. This left wing of the house has a second bathroom (3 in total). The price of the house includes two wonderful covered parking spaces and a large storage room. There is also another indoor communal outdoor parking area on the ground floor of the building. The building has been cleaned up on the outside very recently, painted, with telephone and security cameras, new fence.. . 24 hour doorman, garbage collection and security cameras. The beach and the Sports Pier with its wide gastronomic offer are practically at street level. Private health services a short distance away, and a 5-minute walk from El Corte Inglés and the best sports and social clubs on the island. Close to parks and avenues for walking. A unique home in the heart of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. The sale price does not include transfer taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer according to the law. description: We are entering a wonderful example of regionalist architecture, an eclectic style on its façade, of singular beauty and quality. The three floors plus roof terrace, with each and every one of its dependencies, areas, environments, give this property multiple possibilities. The ground and first floors stand out for their age, where the use of stonework, noble woods and unique decorative elements stands out. The staircase that connects these floors is of immeasurable architectural beauty. The patio is the element that connects all the floors, finished off with a glass enclosure that was modernized respecting the same old design, so that the light that enters during the day provides considerable clarity to all the rooms. We have a third floor of the building that consists of a large terrace, with a corner with a pergola. On this floor there are different rooms, all facing the terrace, in which the living room highlights the series of arched windows. From here we access, in turn, an attic with a bedroom, bathroom, a unit prepared for a kitchen and a roof terrace. description: WONDERFUL independent CHALET FOR SALE in Tafira Baja between Casa del Gallo and Monteluz, right in front of the Viera y Clavijo Botanical Garden. Just 2 minutes from the ring road, university campus and with all kinds of services in the Fondillo area very close to the house. The property has 210 m2 deeded (380 m2 real) on 2 floors and is located on a 750 m2 plot, of which 540 m2 are for garden areas, patios and parking area. Rationalist house built in 1964 that is characterized by the quality of its construction. Made of noble materials, wooden carpentry, granite floors on the ground floor and parquet on the upper floor, high ceilings and large windows that provide a lot of light to the entire property. All its dependencies are exterior. Its distribution is made up as follows: Main floor: (120 m2) - Large living room with dining room divided into two adjoining rooms. - 2 Porches that overlook the backyard. - 1 service bedroom. - Full bathroom with shower and cupboard under stairs. - Kitchen with pantry. It connects in turn with porches and service bathroom, as well as with the backyard Upper floor: (90 m2) - Suite bedroom with full bathroom and balcony with views. - Second bedroom with built-in wardrobe. - Third bedroom with built-in wardrobe. - Fourth bedroom with built-in wardrobe and small terrace as a balcony. - Full bathroom with bathtub. - Large office in two rooms where the library is currently located. The garden area is divided into two parts, the front part where the access areas to the house are and the open parking area with a clear garden area. The large backyard is a pleasant area for recreation and leisure in the house, which in turn has tool rooms currently used for supplying garden furniture and facilities. If what you want is peace and tranquility in a privileged natural environment, in an iconic home on the outskirts of the capital and just 7 minutes from the center of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Do not hesitate to contact us! The selling price Does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer. description: SEÑORIAL HOUSING from the 18th century near the emblematic center of Arucas. The house has 500 m2 spread over two floors and a roof terrace with views of the Church of San Juan Batista. The property has access to two streets - calle el Cerrillo and calle Cristo de la Salud - and thanks to its distribution, all the rooms are exterior, with its Canarian patio as its central axis. It has a 130 m2 urban land annex - currently used as a parking area - which increases the value of this investment, allowing you to make an extension or build another new property. This house has many possibilities and due to its meters and its location, it is presented as a great business opportunity to turn it into a hostel, small hotel or vacation. It is well connected to the GC-20 and public transport lines and is close to well-known tourist spots, such as the Arehucas factory, the Jardín de la Marquesa or the Barranco de Azuaje. If you are looking to buy a property that can generate high returns, here it is! Note: part of the ad contains 3D images to recreate a rehabilitation proposal. description: Detached villa for sale in Santa Brígida. WELCOME TO YOUR NEW HOME This spectacular independent villa in Santa Brígida is the house of your dreams come true. Located just 12 km from the center of Las Palmas, and a short drive from the commercial areas of Los Alisios and 7 Palmas, this property is the perfect place for those looking for a quiet and relaxed life without sacrificing comfort and accessibility. SPACIOUS AND BRIGHT With a 563 m² plot and a 335 m² construction spread over two floors, this house has more than enough space for you and your family. Natural light floods all the rooms thanks to its many windows, and the cool breeze flows through the four facades of the house. Built in the 80s with the best construction materials, insulated walls, high-end parquet and wood carpentry, this house is a safe and comfortable refuge. LIVE LARGE The main floor of the house is impressive. From the main terrace, with enough space to park several cars, there is access to a spacious living room and dining room with a wood-burning fireplace, ideal for spending cozy evenings with family or friends. The kitchen, equipped with a pantry, is spacious and bright, and has a door that gives access to the rear terrace, perfect for al fresco dining. Four double bedrooms and two bathrooms complete this floor, including an en-suite bedroom with a private bathroom. There is also a loft that serves as a storage room. YOUR PRIVATE SPACE The ground floor has a separate apartment, which includes its own kitchen, living room, double bedroom and full bathroom. Accessible directly from the main terrace or via internal stairs, this space is ideal for guests or for use as a separate home. There is also a porch to leave a car under cover. EVERYTHING YOU NEED The house is sold semi-furnished and has high-speed fiber optics. The neighborhood is quiet and safe, and has a neighborhood association that keeps the area in perfect condition for a monthly fee of €35. Expenses and taxes are not included in the sale price. READY FOR THE VISIT? This house is a unique opportunity that you cannot miss. Contact us today for more information and to arrange a viewing!

description: The chalet of your dreams. If you are looking for a unique environment, isolated from the rest of the houses, it is located in the Arucas area and has a spectacular plot of 54,000 meters surrounded by the sea and with views of the city of Las Palmas. On the farm we find a unique 250-meter villa that has 4 bedrooms, one of them a suite with its own bathroom and dressing room, a living room, a dining room all with sea views, two bathrooms and a toilet, the kitchen has a pantry and one of rooms for employees and a garage. As the house is oriented to the north sea of the island, the house has a magnificent leisure area which has a lake-type pool and jacuzzi that merge giving a unique aspect where the sea integrates with the countryside, and as Forget about the solarium area where you can enjoy the good weather, this entire area makes up the garden part. Just below the leisure area there is a large warehouse that can be used to store agricultural machinery or storage and treatment of the product produced on the farm, it has a toilet, and right next to it we have a guest house that has a room, kitchen, bathroom and living room. The farm is prepared for agricultural production (aloe grows, and the land is suitable for products such as bananas, vines, potatoes) in an ecological way and can be exploited as rural tourism if you want to take it as an investment, it could be a winery, hotel, etc. restaurant, camping area.. . In addition, the land has a pond. The farm borders directly on the sea, having direct access to it, which allows bathing in the middle of the Atlantic sea with complete privacy. The property is just 1 minute from the GC-2 North highway, 5 minutes by car to Las Arenas shopping center and 10 minutes from the center of Las Palmas. Basic characteristics • Rustic property •400 m² built •6 rooms •3 bathrooms •Plot of 54,000 m² •Terrace •Fireplace •Parking space included in the price •Second hand/good condition •Built-in wardrobes •Storage room •North orientation equipment •Swimming pool •Jacuzzi •Solarium •Yard Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions. Contact us for more information and to arrange a visit!

description: If you like old houses, from the beginning of the 20th century, with high ceilings, unique architectural elements and hydraulic floors, this beautiful property built around 1915 in Arucas is what you are looking for.Whether you want to design your home to measure or make an investment, this property provides a wide variety of design and use alternatives.It needs comprehensive reforms.Distributed over two floors: the first floor, where the house is located, has 5 bedrooms and two bathrooms with a bright kitchen at the back; the light patio, framed by huge windows, allows light to enter all rooms; In the basement, a wine cellar/bar, games room, and even a projection room could be built.It is a building with a protected façade.Exterior, located on Francisco Gourié street in a restaurant area and close to shops, banks and the public transport station.It has beautiful views of the Parque de las Flores.The large roof terrace (walkable) is ideal for a chill-out or barbecue area.One of the main characteristics of this old house is the height of the ceilings and another is the hydraulic floors that have wonderful designs and are in a very good state of conservation.Tall windows with wooden shutters.The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.The exposed data is merely indicative and is subject to errors or omissions.

description: Between El Monte Lentiscal and Santa Brígida we find this 315 m2 house with garden and terraces on a 590 m2 plot There is no trace of the old dairy of the place, today, behind a simple and well-cared façade, we find a magnificent stately home, warm, welcoming and with the hearth of traditional houses. The materials used in its reconstruction, the luster of the wood of wood in carpentry and floors and its distribution in a single plant remind us of things well done, lasting over time. The original house dates from 1910. A spacious distributor and the patio allow us to tour the house through its different rooms. We are on this floor with the library, dining room, office and cabinet as the front part of the house. Around the patio, a bedroom, living room, bathroom, laundry room and the kitchen with double height windows. The garage is easily accessed through a service hall with large closets. On the other side, from the living room, we access a bedroom and private bathroom with a glass roof designed to recreate the nature that surrounds the house. From the patio, we go up to the terraces and garden. Between hibiscus and hydrangeas, the covered deck is arranged as a large terrace with different leisure areas to enjoy with family and friends the solarium, barbecue, outdoor dining, or simply relax with the views around. Already in the garden, a magnificent Indian laurel gives way to the study with a bedroom and bathroom in cobalt blue that are quite a surprise at the end of the walk. Undoubtedly, a home made to measure for those who are looking for a unique space. Information: expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data are merely indicative, and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

In the right wing of the building there are three of the rooms, of which two are oriented to the facade. These are therefore two very bright areas. At the end of the corridor is the bathroom, which has a window that overlooks the inner courtyard of the building, so it has good ventilation and natural lighting. In the left wing of the house there is the fourth room that is currently used as a study and the large kitchen-dining room. Also from the living room there is access to the terrace, from which you can enjoy pleasant views of the sea and where the laundry room is located. Finally on the roof there are five rooms perfect for storage that belong to the property.

It is located in Monteluz, one of the best areas of the island since it has the tranquility of the countryside but only 7 min. from the city; an urbanization that has been historically of high standing. In its 900 m2 built, it has an infinity of rooms, distributed in two floors above ground and a semi-basement; of 300 m2 each. On the ground floor is the main entrance with a wonderful hall, living rooms, kitchens, bathroom, separate office and dining rooms; on the upper floor the rooms and offices, some of them with terraces or balcony, and the main bathrooms; and in the basement we find various rooms for different uses, washing area, service.. . And on this floor is located the "Pub-Bar", a sensational recreation area with billiards, bar and dance area. The house is located on a plot of 2.707, 84 m2 with garden areas, and also has an independent, urban and adjoining land of 1.000 m2. The property is to be renovated, so it could be adapted to any use; housing, Rural Hotel, Residence.. . description: TRIPLEX IN EL PALMAR Spectacular property in an unbeatable environment Its 220 square meters are distributed as follows: Following way: GROUND FLOOR: It has an entrance hall, living room, cozy kitchen, a toilet and a terrace with unobstructed views of the port of Las Palmas. UPPER FLOOR: We have the master bedroom suite, with a dressing room, two more bedrooms and a full bathroom. ROOF FLOOR: Small laundry area, with kitchen, and a roof terrace with views of the Osorio peak and the city, where we can enjoy incredible moments with our family. BASEMENT FLOOR: Two parking spaces with the possibility of acquiring a third and a storage room. description: We present a property located on Calle Mister Blisse, in the city of Telde, in Las Palmas. It is an independent villa to reform, built on a plot of 292 square meters. The property has 263 square meters built and 233 useful meters, distributed over two floors. The ground floor has all the habitable rooms, with a spacious living-dining room, an independent kitchen, a complete bathroom with a bathtub and three bedrooms. From the living-dining room there is access to a balcony with views of the pool. The upper floor, however, is completely to be reformed and does not have a roof at the moment. This floor plan offers great potential to create new living spaces adapted to the needs of the new owners. The property has a south east orientation that provides excellent lighting and natural ventilation in all rooms. In addition, it has a garage space for two cars with direct access from the street, as well as several storage rooms for storage. The terrace has a pool that offers a perfect space to relax and enjoy the warm climate of the area. The chalet has an excellent location, with the best shopping area on the island a 10-minute walk away, shops, hairdressers, supermarkets and basic services, just 600 meters from San Borondón beach, with easy access to the GC-1 highway. and 10 minutes from the airport. In short, this property offers the opportunity to live in an independent house to be renovated, in an excellent location in Telde. Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions. Contact us for more information and to arrange a visit!

description: BIG PRICE REDUCTION OF 1,480. 000 EUROS TO 1,290. 000 EURO! For sale spectacular villa of 523 m2 built (cadastral area) with beautiful views of the sea and the bay of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, located in the area of La Minilla, above the Paseo de Chil. The house has 4 floors distributed as follows: - Ground floor: it is located at street level and consists of a large garage with capacity for 2 vehicles. It also has an apartment with 2 bedrooms, large living room, kitchen, 2 bathrooms and 2 toilets. It has an independent entrance and is currently rented for €600/month. - First floor: we find 2 large living-dining rooms, kitchen and 2 bathrooms. At the front we find a large terrace with beautiful views and barbecue area. At the back there is another terrace that also has a barbecue area. This terrace has a style similar to works by the great Canarian artist César Manrique. - Second floor: 4 wonderful bedrooms (one of them with its own bathroom) and bathroom. - Third floor: attic where we find a bedroom with a toilet. It also has a terrace with spectacular views. The property has an elevator and top quality materials such as interior and exterior carpentry of vitacola wood, marble floors, etc. It also has several built-in wardrobes. This beautiful villa is located in one of the best residential areas of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria and has all the services at your fingertips (supermarkets, shopping center, gym, swimming pools, schools, pharmacy and all kinds of restaurants and leisure, etc. ). It is also 2 minutes by car from Mesa y López avenue and 4 minutes from Playa de las Canteras. Information: The sale price does not include notary fees, registration and taxes derived from it. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

The house is completely renovated with good taste and is distributed in: Elegant kitchen with views of nature, large living room with high gabled ceilings, which gives it an extraordinary luminosity, two rustic-style bathrooms, 4 caves fully equipped as bedrooms that generate balanced climatic conditions: cool in summer and protection against the cold in winter. Outside it has a magnificent terrace with views and a covered dining room where you can enjoy pleasant moments with family and friends. A few meters from the main house there is a cave apartment, with 2 bedrooms, kitchen and bathroom, ideal for guests who come to stay in this unique space. The charm of this farm is in every way: for its orientation, for its contact with nature, away from neighbors and noise. Special product for nature lovers, for people fleeing from daily stress or for investors who want to turn it into a rural house. Do not miss the opportunity to enjoy the home of your dreams. description: Unique house in a privileged area, open to the beautiful Rural Protected Landscape of the midlands of the island of Gran Canaria.It consists of 813.42 m2, distributed: On the first floor, there are 2 double bedrooms, and a full bathroom, linked by a large dressing room with glass doors overlooking the interior garden. The ground floor, which is the main and noble floor of the house.It is a fluid, open, bright, glazed space with views of the interior garden.This plant consists of two semi-levels, always articulated by the interior garden. On the highest semi-level, there is the main entrance, all facing the interior garden. In the lower semi-level, there is the large living room and dining room for 12 people, with a large design fireplace.The opposite wall of the fireplace is a 15m long plan, all glazed, with panoramic and direct views of the Rustic Protected Landscape.This room allows its use as a projection space for cinema or large format television. The main kitchen is accessed directly from the large dining room.Semi-industrial aesthetics, fully equipped, with the most advanced appliances on the market.The kitchen also has direct access to an outside terrace with direct views of the Rustic Protected Landscape. On this floor there is also 1 bedroom and a full adapted bathroom. On the Level-1 Floor, there is the most intimate use area of the family, it has 4 bedrooms, and 4 full bathrooms, one per room. This floor has storage spaces, gym, living room, fully equipped kitchen, as well as a closed area, very bright and glazed, for washing, ironing and drying clothes. From this level there is access to the main garden, the swimming pool and the covered kitchen-dining room and annex to leisure activities. On the Level-2 Floor, there is an open space for multiple uses, classrooms, meetings, etc., along with various storage spaces and a full bathroom.From this room you have access to the back garden and pool. Spacious loft with great natural light, direct access to the back garden-pool, 2 large bedrooms with their respective full bathrooms and a living-dining room. It has a garage for 2 cars, alarm protection, all the dependencies of the house (except the loft that has its own heat pump and the floor of living-dining room-hallways-library with underfloor heating) enjoy heating radiators to heat in a relatively short time. Information: expenses and taxes not included.The information given is merely indicative and may be subject to errors or omissions.

description: We offer you a house where you can enjoy with the whole family, as if you were on vacation all year round. It is a duplex on La Garita Beach, which has been improved year after year, and is ready to move into tomorrow. Its distribution: Ground floor: garage for 2 cars (with automatic door) and storage area, 1 bathroom with shower, and large multifunctional space (such as a bedroom, games area, storage room, music room. etc). 1st floor: Large living room, toilet (where the laundry area has been installed), independent and really large kitchen that does not lack detail. From this floor there is access to a private terrace of 35 m2, with barbecue area, private garden, outdoor dining room and sunbathing area. and from this terrace there is access to a community pool with another community garden. (Incredible, but since the community works very well, you only pay €70 for the community). 2nd floor: 3 large bedrooms, the main one en suite (with private bathroom), the other 2 bedrooms share another bathroom (with a 2-bowl sink), and one of these 2 bedrooms has access to a glazed balcony/terrace with views of the garden. Extras: All the exterior carpentry of the house is PVC ternal + shutters, the interior carpentry of the house is all white lacquered wood, the lights of most of the house are embedded, except on the 2nd floor all the floor it is ceramic, the stairs of the house from the garage to the bedroom floor are made of vitacola wood, with white handrails. etc etc etc The community is very quiet family. The area is great, it can be accessed in 1 minute by car with the Telde ring road and the GC1, which means that it is 10 minutes from the city of Telde, 20 from the city of Las Palmas and 30 from Playa del Ingles. And finally, the area where the living room/bedroom is located with a small balcony overlooking Olof Palme street. The property is located practically in the emblematic Plaza de España, in the commercial area of Mesa y López, and very close to Las Canteras beach. A real opportunity to enjoy a tailor-made apartment or as an investment possibility given the high rental demand in the area. Do we see her? description: If you are looking for a renovated apartment, with quality and very good taste, you have just found yours. A few meters from Las Canteras beach we find this renovated apartment, in a modern building that is highly regarded in the area. Close to the new tower, supermarkets, schools, sports park and a few meters from the Go Fit We open the door and here we have a renovated apartment with excellent qualities and a good distribution. With a spacious bedroom, open to the living room and loft-style kitchen, and a second closed bedroom with a window to the street. The kitchen has all the appliances: fridge, designer hood, oven, dishwasher, etc. The bathroom is spacious and comfortable, with a bathtub and a washing machine and cleaning cabinet integrated into it. Both bedrooms have a large built-in wardrobe. The second bedroom could be separated from the living room by means of a glass partition, which would give the bedroom greater privacy, without removing light or ventilation from the living room and kitchen.

description: Exclusive independent villa in the residential area of Los Alvarados, 15 minutes from Las Palmas de G. C. Impeccable condition, ready to enter. The house has two main floors and a semi-basement, this one with the possibility of turning it into a spacious apartment. It is built on a plot of eight hundred meters and has a constructed area of approximately 450 meters. The materials are of the highest quality, with wooden floors, having double walls on its exterior walls, windows with electric shutters with double safety glass climalit system, underfloor heating in all rooms, air conditioning hot and cold Inverter system in the main rooms and has a fireplace. It has five bedrooms, the main one has a large dressing room and the rest have built-in wardrobes, including a bedroom for the service located on the basement floor. The house is equipped with four bathrooms, the main one with a Jacuzzi bathtub and a cabin. Security system through movement sensor and cameras both exterior and interior. The garden is equipped with automatic irrigation. It has a heated pool with heat pump. Garage for two vehicles. magnificent views.

description: We offer this dream house for sale on San Cristóbal Beach, more specifically in front of the San Cristóbal Castle. The house on the beachfront with unbeatable views, is divided into two floors to which we add a fully passable roof terrace with a solarium area, a games area or space to practice sports, as well as a gym area and other facilities. The first floor is divided into six bedrooms, 3 of them facing the sea, with six bathrooms, kitchen and 72 square meter living/dining room with unbeatable views. On the upper floor, we find 5 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a utility room and interior patio as well as a 55-meter kitchen and living/dining room which ends in an open terrace with views of the entire city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. The variety of opportunities within this property makes us think that apart from being one of the most exclusive houses in the City, not only because of its location but also because of the quality of its materials and its care, it could have another vision as a small residence for students, given its proximity to the University, as well as a small hotel in the city using the roof as a roof top, which is very fashionable today. There is the possibility of agreeing a rent with an option to buy on it. Excellent Opportunity. description: We have the honor of presenting you this beautiful urbanization that is made up of 66 Single-Family Homes in Santa María de Guía. All the houses will have three floors, which will be distributed as follows: - SEMI-BASEMENT FLOOR: It will have an area of 82 m2, one part for the garage and the other for the living room, gym or whatever you want. - GROUND FLOOR: The ground floor will have a constructed area of 63 m2, with more than 40 m2 terrace and garden surrounding the living-dining room area, this space is ideal for enjoying good times with family and friends, the great Windows will provide light and a feeling of freedom, this area will be complemented with a toilet and in the front part a kitchen of more than 12 m2, spacious and very bright. - UPPER FLOOR: It will be distributed with a master bedroom suite with bathroom and private balcony, two secondary bedrooms and another bathroom.Secondary bedrooms will share access to a balcony.All bedrooms have a built-in wardrobe. It is an exclusive, modern and unique project of INVERSIONES BRISABAI, S.L.Single-family homes in the best area of Santa María de Guía with direct connection to the highway.Residencial Brisabai has been designed by and for families, not only the homes, but the entire development, from the rubbish bins that will be buried, through the gardens, children's play areas, wide, comfortable sidewalks and with trees., all this without assuming an extra cost for the owners.Another point where the designers have paid special attention is in the design of the facades, they are the cover letter of the homes, for that reason they sought to combine efficiency, design and functionality.For this you can see the memory of qualities, it is impressive! description: Semi-detached house in Los Castillos - Arucas If you are a nature lover and you are looking for a quiet place, this is your best option.. . We present this wonderful house with three floors of 217m² built in Los Castillos - Arucas. Los Castillos is a hollow between two rocks, covered by a vegetation of laurels, chestnut trees, poplars, ferns, codesos, brooms, brambles, orange trees, apple trees. It is located in a privileged environment, with spectacular views. Preserved in perfect condition and surrounded by an unparalleled natural setting, it is ready to move into. In the basement we find the garage and at the same time two rooms, one with washer dryers and the other for sewing and pantry. Going up the stairs we find the living room that communicates with the terrace that has splendid views of the sea and the mountains. The terrace has many possibilities, it can be glazed or put an artificial grass. The living room is connected to the kitchen through a glass window. Also on the ground floor there is a toilet. Going up to the first floor we find three bedrooms with incredible views of the sea and the Osorio farm and a full bathroom. The house maintains a pleasant temperature throughout the day since it has direct sunlight both in the morning and in the afternoon. About 15 minutes walking is the Osorio farm, where you can enjoy nature throughout the year. There are also several paths for hiking. Ideal as a first or second residence and if you are an investor you have the option of converting it into a rural holiday home due to its fantastic location. Do you want to know more? I will be happy to assist you and thus help you find the best for you and your family! Information: The sale price does not include transfer taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer according to law.
