description: Spectacular detached villa of more than 700 m2 built on the Cuesta del Reventón (Bandama area), only 15 minutes from the city of Las Palmas de G.C.This beautiful home enjoys a privileged landscape for its location that prevents any building interrupting the spectacular views of the protected area of the Caldera de Bandama.Walking, a few meters from the house, you will find all the services necessary for full comfort: regular public and school transport, supermarket, sports facilities-Tennis Club restaurants and cafeterias. The construction maintains a perfect temperature throughout the year without the need to use heating or air conditioning, despite being equipped with both underfloor heating. It is distributed in three floors without having the entrance that is halfway between the ground floor and the first floor.Both floors are arranged around a glazed patio in two heights that works as a thermal regulator of the building. Ground floor: common areas in open and spacious spaces with a spectacular living room with fireplace and a spacious dining room and beautiful views, fully equipped kitchen with solarium open to the outside, office with library area, family room and bathroom with shower adapted.From all the spaces on this floor you can access a large terrace where the sun is sifted with a steel pergola and double-height aluminum plates. First floor: four bedrooms (4) all with bathrooms included.Two of them are divided into two heights that separate the sleeping area from the study space and / or game.The master bedroom has a large dressing room, bathroom with Jacuzzi, large shower and safe.On the same floor there is an office and a closet for bedding. Basement / Spa with 2 swimming pools: heated indoor pool-automatic temperature control, whirlpool, counter-current swimming and salt chlorination system by electrolysis living area with movie projector and a full bathroom as a dressing room.This area communicates with the garden, with fully equipped barbecue area, and the second outdoor pool.It is a space designed for all types of celebrations and / or meetings. On the same floor there is a separate apartment with a bedroom, living room-kitchen and bathroom. Qualities and materials: the house has double glazing, heating by low temperature underfloor heating, security blinds (single use or complete closure when leaving the house), three cisterns, multiple built-in wardrobes, top quality materials (gray marble San Vicente, solid woods of red cedar).The property has a covered garage for 3 vehicles and there is the possibility of putting an elevator in a space already planned. It is a unique home in a privileged environment and spectacular views, the best place to live with family and enjoy with friends.If you like to live in luxury do not forget to visit it, you will never see an equal or similar.Sale price to consult and negotiable without including notary expenses, registration and taxes derived from it.The information given is merely indicative and subject to unintentional errors or omissions.

description: For sale magnificent villa in Tafira Baja, located in the exclusive and luxurious residential area of Casa del Gallo. This cozy area enjoys being surrounded by nature, standing out for its tranquility and its unbeatable location and at the same time so close to the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, being just a few minutes from it and with direct access to the ring road.It is also very close to the university campus, the Viera y Clavijo Botanical Garden and within walking distance there are many sports centers, horse riding, a golf course and many other services (pharmacy, veterinary center, hardware store, restaurants, etc.). Its communications with the motorway are very comfortable, reaching the center of the capital in just 10 minutes and the airport in 16 minutes. Located on a 1050 m2 plot, we access it through a beautiful well-kept garden, surrounded by endless plants and trees such as palm trees, bougainvillea, flamboyant trees, hibiscus, hydrangeas (flower of the world) and strelitzias, among others. The house has been designed and built by the current owners.The building has had the necessary provisions for the climatology of the area, being the walls of the house double-walled with insulating materials inside, in addition to double glazing in the windows and doors throughout the house.In this way, the property is protected not only from the cold, but also from the heat, making the house an extremely comfortable home. The property is divided into 2 heights and a ground floor: - first floor: it has an area of 265 m2, and is made up of 2 large rooms with large doors and windows opening onto the garden, a large covered terrace, an office, a spacious kitchen with dining room and pantry, a large utility room, ironing room, a bathroom and a guest toilet. The warmth of the Vitacola wood is perceived in the house, being of this the floors, the access staircase to the rest of the floors (considered a copy of the Fataga house staircase in the Santa Catalina Park), the kitchen, the dining room and the roof beams. In addition, the doors of the house are from Riga, lacquered in white, and the fittings are from Olaria (luxury and exclusive fittings factory, with such emblematic buildings as Gaudí's Casa Batllo and Milá and the Hotel Gran Palace in Barcelona. ). The entire stairwell is flooded with light through a skylight designed by Guzmán, the same man who designed the skylight for the Government of the Canary Islands. - upper floor: with an area of 165 m2, it is distributed in 4 en-suite bedrooms.The master bedroom has a full bath with a whirlpool tub and separate shower, plus a walk-in closet.We have a very spacious second bedroom with fitted wardrobes and a full bathroom.The third and fourth bedrooms are also quite spacious, sharing the third and last bathroom on the floor. - ground floor: it has an area of 264 m2 and is used as a garage and has capacity for more than 5 cars.It has a large room (bright and with windows with wonderful views of the garden), a bathroom, a room with pre-installation for a kitchen, a cellar and a single room.Likewise, it also has a dumbwaiter that connects the garage with the upper floors.In it, we can carry the purchase or any other heavy load to the upper floors. Don't miss out on the opportunity to live in the capital's elite favorite residential area! Call us without obligation and we will be happy to assist you. The sale price does not include notary fees, registration and taxes derived from it.The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: Detached villa with 3 floors, with swimming pool and solarium on the roof, and basement with garage, storage room and office / office area, with an excellent location in a quiet and residential area of the Altavista neighborhood, and a few minutes from the city center and from the ring road. On the second floor there is another multipurpose room suitable for a bedroom or living room, a complete bathroom, a semi-outdoor kitchen, and an outdoor area with a terrace-solarium and a swimming pool with magnificent views. The basement occupies the entire surface of the plot, about 200 m2, and is distributed in a garage area with capacity for 2/3 vehicles, storage room, machinery room, cistern, a kitchen, a bathroom and an independent office area / offices, with independent access from the street level. description: If you want to live in Tafira in a house with a garden, in an independent villa and with spectacular views, this is your opportunity. Here's your chance. As soon as you enter the house you will have a mountain view of those that fall in love in Tafira. Precisely for this reason, this is where the dining room is, from which you can enjoy a dinner with family or friends, while you will feel like you are in front of a natural setting with the best landscape in front of your eyes. In this room the house has a spacious living room, with several environments in which you can distribute the space in the way that best suits you. The independent kitchen is located on this same floor. And on this same floor there is a room that can be used as a bedroom on the ground floor; and a perfect toilet for your guests. On the upper floor are the bedrooms. Some of them with a terrace or balcony and others with a direct window to the mountain views. Is there anything better than waking up and opening your eyes to the green landscape that Tafira offers us? Above the bedrooms the house has access to the roof terrace. A place that is currently considered as a facilities area but in which a world of possibilities opens up to make a solarium, gym area, chill-out or one more terrace with views from the top of the mountain, towards the entire valley. On the ground floor, the house has one more basement floor with various rooms. But this is where we find another of the most appreciated corners of this house. We found a secret garden, with hidden rooms, other more open ones, and a perfect terrain to delight everyone who wants to. From fruit trees to aromatic plants or flowers everywhere. And to enjoy what you want to create, you already have a gazebo dining room, with a table and barbecue area and kitchen already set up. Through the large door we access the interior space, or by opening the door we make the whole space unique. description: La Boutique presents a diamond in the rough, a fantastic property in the municipality of Santa Brígida with spectacular views. The truth is that Santa Brígida was one of the first places in the Canary Islands where tourism was introduced. This presence of European residents, mainly British, has left its mark on the local architecture (mainly in some Victorian style hotels). Most of the plot is located on rural land under agricultural protection in Santa Brígida and the other part has a building use and typology. In this case the plot consists of 11.866m2 with a constructed area of 890m2. This magnificent house is surrounded by a beautiful garden with orchard and other accessories and consists of 8 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, a separate kitchen and a spacious living room that connects all the rooms. This space has a unique charm, where the natural light from the double height windows provides a sense of wellbeing and warmth. Going upstairs we find a grand roof terrace with spectacular views and a truly captivating experience and additionally, the ground floor of this property consists of 4 bedrooms, a bathroom and a large garage.  This magnificent property has a lot of potential and would be very interesting for investors who would like to build a rural Hotel or a Bed and Breakfast for profitability.  In addition, to irrigate the garden and the orchard, the water that is acquired for this purpose is deposited in a circular reinforced concrete pond, with a capacity of 1958 cubic metres, which is located at a short distance from the property and there is another pond is located inside the property and collects the water from the outside pond. Do not miss this great opportunity. For more information, we will be pleased to help you. [IW].

description: Exclusive apartment in Ciudad Jardín located in front of Playa de las Alcaravaneras, open to the outside through a large covered terrace of 40 m2 from where you can see incredible views of the sea. The exclusivity of the house lies in its location, its 204 m2 surface area and being integrated into an elegant building with only 3 owners, where the horizontal lines of rationalism from the 1930s come together with regal elements that bring sobriety and warmth to the whole. Work of the valued rationalist architect Miguel Martín Fernández de la Torre in 1933 and renovated 14 years ago with high quality materials. Currently, its state of conservation is medium, although in some elements it is very up-to-date, such as the recently installed solar panels and the air conditioning. The house has enormous possibilities because it has two entrances from the outside through different portals and stairs, thus allowing greater independence of one part of the house and because each and every one of its rooms is very spacious, bright and open to the terrace. or patios. The current distribution is an entrance hall, a spacious corner living room with access to the terrace facing the sea, 3 double bedrooms, 1 single, 2 bathrooms and a third currently converted into a dressing room and a living room next to a huge kitchen, equipped with a large patio and a bright dining room for eight people. Without a doubt, it is a magnificent property that combines qualities that are very difficult to gather in a flat and specifically in this area.

description: Are you looking for a unique and exclusive home? or a great location for your business, small city hotel, residence, school or nursery...? I present this magnificent independent villa located in the heart of Ciudad Jardín, one step away from all services. Built on a large plot of 1523m2, with large landscaped spaces, outdoor parking area and garage. Built in 1939, with an original design by the architect Miguel Martín de la Torre, the house remains in its original state, protected by the municipal catalog of Las Palmas. Distribution on the ground floor of the entrance hall, a large hall that leads to the magnificent staircase made of Arucas stone and noble woods, a bar counter communicates with the dining room and this one to the wide gallery with arched doors that have direct views of the wide terrace area, with solarium and the 56m2 pool, fed with sea water from the incredible well of the last century that the house has, with which the water is at zero cost.Certainly something truly special. It has on the ground floor 1 bedroom originally intended for the service, 1 bathroom, 2 toilets, separate kitchen and pantry. Two stairs lead to the first floor, the main one in an L-shape, from the Hall, comfortable, very spacious and spectacularly finished in noble materials.The other staircase goes up from the service area near the kitchen. On the first floor we have 5 double bedrooms, all exterior with views of the gardens or terrace and pool area, one of them with a dressing room.2 large bathrooms complete the floor. The secondary staircase communicates with the attic floor, of no less than 40m2, you can get 2 bedrooms and many storage areas. In the basement there is also a separate apartment with bathroom, living room and 1 bedroom. Undoubtedly, a star of the house is its semi-basement, which has always been used as a library, game room and children's study, finished with a magnificent bookcase in noble woods and a superb English pool or Snooker table, made specifically for the house., a sanctuary of tranquility, which communicates with the north gardens of the house, where there is also a large room that can be used as an office. In the garden area there are two other large rooms that could be used as a guest apartment. The house needs an update although the vintage style of the bathrooms and hydraulic floors are something that gives it exclusivity, it also needs some reform. The spaciousness of the rooms on the ground floor allows for a greater number of bedrooms if needed, being able to easily reach 12 rooms throughout the house. An undoubtedly unique property, demonstrable solvency will be requested to request a visit. Furniture not included in the sale. Taxes, registration, notary and any other expenses derived from the sale are not included in the PVP price.

description: Are you looking for a modern property in good condition located in one of the most important areas of the capital of Gran Canaria? This is your chance!    In the heart of the historic area of Calle Perojo, recently declared a site of cultural interest, and in the extension of the historic quarter of Triana, you will find this penthouse, completely refurbished a few years ago, very well decorated and in perfect condition.    We present you this beautiful and cosy penthouse totally refurbished with the best quality materials in the market. It has a spectacular terrace with views that will delight your guests and where you can spend unique moments with friends or family. The property consists of 3 spacious bedrooms, 1 single room that is currently an office, 3 bathrooms, a fully equipped independent kitchen and an impressive and modern living-dining room. In total it has about 195 m2 (40 m2 of terrace and 155 m2 of living space). It has air conditioning and solar panels for water heating.    The building was developed in 1906, with important modifications in the 30's. Its current owner totally reformed the house in 2004 with the architects Paco Bello and Manuel Monterde Rey, of great prestige in the capital and other areas of our archipelago. The complete renovation of the roof terrace was undertaken in 2019.    After its reform, the roof terrace has become a pleasant terrace for outdoor enjoyment, with a small kitchen and bathroom for the comfort of its owners and guests.     There is also a large space on this floor, currently used for handicrafts and artwork, which could perfectly be converted into the fourth bedroom of the house, together with its bathroom and laundry area.    Currently, the owner and his architect are studying the elaboration of a project for the future installation of a small lift.    Don't miss the opportunity to get your hands on this magnificent property that has all the comforts you are looking for your next home. Ask for information without obligation!

description: Spacious townhouse with views, in Santa Brígida. This beautiful semi-detached house, of 281 m² built, has 118 m² of outdoor terraces distributed on several levels, which expand the interior space with an optimal north-south orientation, and open onto the surrounding green mountain landscape. The house sits on a 173.22 m² plot of consolidated urban land, and is divided into 3 main floors with intermediate levels that expand and provide possibilities to enjoy large spaces with magic inside and outside the house. The ground floor, of 109 m² built, which is reached by crossing a beautiful access terrace of about 50 m², since the main façade is set back about 7 m from the "Carretera a los Olivos", which gives an extra tranquility and privacy.This access floor has a hall, a large, well-lit and ventilated kitchen with a double façade, two bedrooms, a bathroom, a toilet, and a living room with high ceilings facing south and views of the rural landscape typical of the midlands of Gran Canary.The rear façade of the kitchen or utility room opens onto the landscape and communicates via an external staircase with a terrace of approximately 40 m², on the lower level of the house. The upper floor, with 69 m² built and a spacious 28 m² terrace, has two more bedrooms, a bathroom, a living room and a play area open to the terrace.On the terrace there is also a huge California model jacuzzi as a small open-air pool, spectacular. The 103 m² basement, or semi-basement since, being a sloping plot, it has windows which makes this space in the house also very habitable and even the possibility of direct access to the 40 m2 outdoor terrace on the lower level of the house.This basement floor has vehicle access from "Carretera a los Olivos" via a ramp and space for up to four cars, as well as a wine cellar. The house was thoroughly revised during 2022, the kitchen was changed, the stopcocks were renewed, the anti-lime and waste pipes were treated and cleaned, the electrical installation and its panels were fine-tuned., in addition to exhaustive maintenance of the exterior of the facades with fiber, interior and exterior painting and carpentry repair.All the interior flooring is inlaid black granite terrazzo of superior quality and traditional manufacture. The roof is a multi-sloped roof, with some light inputs and equipped with solar thermal energy panels for bathing with hot water and zero energy consumption. In addition, the surroundings of the house have a multitude of attractive facilities such as: the fantastic Santa Brígida municipal sports center, the Health Center, the Market, several schools and a municipal parking lot; and the historic center can also be reached by taking a short walk. The house is sold with an equipped kitchen and a spectacular outdoor jacuzzi, unfurnished.Real photos and photo-renders are shown with fresh ideas to give new life and color to interior spaces. If the proximity and tranquility of Santa Brígida calls you, this house is waiting for you to start living and enjoying it now. Do not hesitate, call me and come and meet her first hand!

With all the papers in order and located in the area of greatest objective of expansion of the municipality, this beautiful house surprises us for its simple and at the same time wide spatial sensation. The floor is on the corner, which allows us to enjoy rooms with windows to the outside; one towards each of the two streets. Designed under a diaphanous central distribution, but without becoming a loft, it shows us all its benefits as soon as we enter it from the outside. The first thing that catches your attention is its living room, with open-plan kitchen, being at the same time the diaphanous distributor of the whole house. We immediately realize the spatial comfort it offers us, observing how this main part separates, along its entire interior perimeter, the rest of the rooms, offering privacy in this way: - Its three rooms, being two exterior (one as a bedroom) and the third with window to a spacious inner courtyard. - Complete and spacious bathroom with large shower. - And the aforementioned inner courtyard for washing machine, electric water heater and even good pantry, as it fits your needs. It is located a few minutes by car from the main schools of this upper area of the municipality, supermarkets and shopping centers (such as Los Alisios), as well as services and direct public transport in the same street and nearby. Thanks to the nearby GC-3 ring road, quick access to the lower areas of the city is guaranteed. Ideal for couples or people who are looking for something that offers them an economical mixed solution, based on proximity to the capital and at the same time be able to enjoy a somewhat more rural tranquility, a purer air and the relaxing "sound" that silence always offers us. description: Nothing suggests that behind its modest main façade is this wonderful Canarian house typical of the area and built in 1900. It is a fantastic and beautiful century-old house, distributed over two floors and immersed in nature. Its owner has managed to maintain the essence of the time and our customs, as well as the original materials both on floors and ceilings. A few meters from the nerve center of Moya, is this wonderful property that consists on the top floor of a spacious and bright living room, a large dining room with access to the kitchen, a toilet and access to the beautiful rear outdoor terrace, where you can enjoy endearing moments outdoors with family and friends and truly privileged views. On the ground floor there are two large rooms, both with access from the large outdoor patio and connected to each other as was customary at the time. The main room has a small living room, a hall with a full bathroom and access to a cozy balcony. The light, its wide spaces, its high ceilings, its wooden floors, its terraces facing nature, make this property the ideal place to rest and escape from the madding crowd. Whether it is to reside in it, as a second residence to spend weekends or as a rural tourism home if you are an entrepreneur, this is the ideal house for all of this. On the roof the pre-installation of air conditioning is made. Do not miss the opportunity to meet him! Expenses and taxes derived from the sale are not included in the price. Wide spaces, natural light most of the day, a large roof terrace, terrace and garden, make this property the perfect home for you and your loved ones. Living room with access to the terrace with views, bathroom and large kitchen on the ground floor. It also has a large basement with a room, storage area and direct access to the private garage where there is room for 3 vehicles. Located in Altavista, very close to its market and the Marpe school, what could be your next home is surrounded by all the necessary services to make your and your family's day-to-day much more comfortable. description: 1. MAIN HOUSE    1.1 - GROUND PART (it has two areas):  1.1.1 Noble area: 2 main lounges with fireplace and television, bedroom with complete bathroom, office with library. Main entrance in white marble and Arucas stonework, painted wooden capitals in ceiling decoration. Height of 5.42 metres at the main entrance, marble staircase leading to the bedrooms, toilet, entrance hall with carraca marble fireplace, dining room for 14 people, gable roof in mulberry and another living room.  1.1.2 Service area: 1 bedroom with bathroom, 1 small dining room (6 diners), kitchen and laundry and ironing area, family kitchen with pantry.    1.2 UPSTAIRS: has a mulberry wood staircase, master bedroom with views and bathroom with carraca marble, dressing room, wooden fireplace, terrace with table and chairs, and balcony.    Bedroom with dressing room and complete bathroom and wardrobes. Bedroom with wardrobes and complete bathroom, all in wood and white marble.    2. OUTSIDE AREA  2.1 Parking for 10 cars outside and 6 inside.   2.2 Annexe to the farmhouse, flat, where washing and ironing is currently done. 2.3 Basketball court.  2.4 Orchard and storage area and workshop.  2.5 Forest and Canarian garden with sculptures of horse wood, various trees, palms and all kinds of plants, work carried out by a landscape technician.   2.6 Guest house, currently offices, with bathroom: 1 office, meeting room and administrative office.  2.7 Winery converted into a hall for celebrations with kitchen, 2 toilets, bar, dining room, discotheque, and stage, gabled roof in chestnut and tea wood.  2.8 Barbecue area for 70 diners.  2.9 Cistern of 480 cubic metres with a small square.   2.10 Stables for 4 horses with feed room and tack room and bathroom.   2.11 Swimming pool area with solarium and male and female changing rooms with toilets.  2.12 Swimming pool kitchen with dining room.  2.13 Restored hermitage with frescoes and stone masonry.   2.14 Cave with table and barbecue.    3. QUALITIES OF THE MATERIALS  - Solid mulberry wood floors and wooden gable roofs.  - White anodised aluminium carpentry with thermal break and double glazing.  - Perimeter and interior walls of Arucas stonework and 72 cm thick ashlars.  - The whole house is covered with projected cork with insulating and waterproofing properties.  -North-South orientation (sun all day).  -Video intercom (Fermax).  -Radiators and air conditioning.  -Marble paving at the entrance and staircase.  -Lighting throughout (installation done by the Lledó group).

description: Very exclusive home in a building of high architectural value located in the heart of the historic neighborhood of Vegueta, very close to Plaza de Santa Ana and the Cathedral of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. From the imposing main gate of the estate, there is access to the wide corridor that separates the two bodies of the building and that leads to the private parking area and the very large garden of 1,000 m2 of the property. This imposing 316 m2 house has four independent entrances, one of them from the main façade and the rest from the central corridor, which would facilitate its segregation into several apartments in case of acquiring it as an investment. It has 8 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, a toilet, two large halls, a spacious kitchen with a pantry, a large dining room and a bright private terrace at the back with access to the parking area and common gardens. It also has a laundry room on the terrace and outdoor parking space. It is a dream property located in a privileged place such as the historic center of the city, in full cultural, tourist and commercial boom. It needs a comprehensive reform, which becomes a magnificent opportunity to adapt it to your needs and tastes, and even to turn it into an interesting business option, since it could be divided into up to four independent houses. Building with only four houses, two per floor, separated by the large central corridor, built with high-quality materials, with wide spaces and light that make it very comfortable.

description: Nothing suggests that behind its modest main façade is this wonderful Canarian house typical of the area and built in 1900. It is a fantastic and beautiful century-old house, distributed over two floors and immersed in nature. Its owner has managed to maintain the essence of the time and our customs, as well as the original materials both on floors and ceilings. A few meters from the nerve center of Moya, is this wonderful property that consists on the top floor of a spacious and bright living room, a large dining room with access to the kitchen, a toilet and access to the beautiful rear outdoor terrace, where you can enjoy endearing moments outdoors with family and friends and truly privileged views. On the ground floor there are two large rooms, both with access from the large outdoor patio and connected to each other as was customary at the time. The main room has a small living room, a hall with a full bathroom and access to a cozy balcony. The light, its wide spaces, its high ceilings, its wooden floors, its terraces facing nature, make this property the ideal place to rest and escape from the madding crowd. Whether it is to reside in it, as a second residence to spend weekends or as a rural tourism home if you are an entrepreneur, this is the ideal house for all of this. Possibility of acquiring the plot that is attached to the right (see price). Do not hesitate and request more information without obligation. Expenses and taxes derived from the sale are not included in the price.

description: I present to you this magnificent semi-detached house, located in Las Mesas, a step away from the ring road, the commercial area of Los Alisios, Arucas and Las Palmas. With all services nearby, schools, supermarkets, parks, etc. It is a three-story house with the possibility of converting into two houses. On the ground floor we have the stairwell, a large open-plan garage with space for 5 cars and several motorcycles, storage, a full bathroom and a kitchen, an automatic door and an underground cistern. The height of the garage would allow work with vehicle lifts. We go up a beautiful and wide staircase to the first floor, in which we have a house with an independent kitchen open to the covered patio, which is used as a dining room, a large living room, two double bedrooms, one single and a complete bathroom. The staircase takes us to the second floor, where we have a complete second home, with 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, kitchen-living room and exit to the sunny terrace, facing southeast. A staircase on this terrace takes us to a second, wide roof terrace with 360º views, from the top, passing through the Arucas mountain, the sea in the background, Tamaraceite and the Las Mesas neighborhood. On this second roof there is also a large pool room that could be used as a study room, games, etc. The entire house is illuminated by the windows on the façade and by a large interior patio that gives light to the interior rooms. The state of the house is excellent, you can move into without the need for reforms, very well cared for and in an area with wonderful views. It is undoubtedly a lifetime home for a large family with space needs or with the possibility of two homes, since the stairwell is independent from the entrances of each floor, the buyer being able to make a horizontal division and put one of them for rent. The meter box is prepared for it. Furniture not included in the sale. Tax, registration, notary and any other expenses derived from the sale are not included in the PVP price.

In addition, it has a recreation area with a swimming pool, barbecue area and solarium, ideal for enjoying days of relaxation and endearing moments in the company of family and friends. Regarding the distribution of the house, it has two double rooms (very cozy) and one single, making it perfect and ideal for the whole family. High ceilings of the time, in gabled wood and in perfect condition. The kitchen is fully equipped so you can enjoy your favorite dishes without worries, with everything you need for day to day. It also has three full bathrooms, two inside and one outside, which makes it very comfortable and functional. In addition, the house has a walkable roof terrace with impressive views and many possibilities, as well as an open garage for two cars. In the restoration, nothing was left untouched, reinforcing with metal and concrete beams both in doors and windows, distributing the rooms for a better use of the floor meters. All the doors and windows have been changed, African teak doors and 6 mm double-layer chemically matte glass, the electrical network has been changed in accordance with current regulations, highlighting above all the priority in LED lighting with warm and cold light in each one of the rooms. At the same price we have the apartment on the second floor with a 100 m2 floor and a 50 m2 terrace located at the back, where we have the best views of the sea and Avenida Marítima. You could also make a joint offer for both floors and have 70% of the building at your disposal. At the same time I leave you a 360 video link to enjoy 100% of the apartment Notary fees, registration and taxes generated by the sale are not included in the price. description: Exclusive luxury home located in a residential complex in the best area of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. This dream property is located in the beautiful urbanization of La Minilla, one of the most attractive young neighborhoods, in the city with the best climate in the world. This very complete home is located on an intermediate level, practically at street level, in an interesting high-end stepped residential building of generous proportions. The house is developed on an exceptional single floor.And it communicates with the rest of the residential complex through large terrace-corridor and open-air stairs, as well as elevators to the garage floor where, once again, the spaciousness of the spaces draws attention for its comfort. The more than 300 m2 available to live with the greatest guarantee of luxury, have spectacular views of Las Canteras and El Rincón where, however, the privacy of those who enjoy them is preserved.This marvel is distributed according to the following spaces: - Spectacular living room furnished with an exquisite taste for the contemporary, open to the views from the large terrace through sliding doors. - Large kitchen, with a clean and modern design that communicates with a hygienic and well-lit area for laundry and kitchenware.It is perfectly equipped with high-end appliances for stove lovers. - 1 magnificent royal suite-type master bedroom, with all kinds of amenities including: 2 magazine dressing rooms, 1 spa bathroom to lose your senses, and access to a large terrace with privacy and unparalleled views. - 1 large master bedroom, with bathroom en suite and an intimate and bright patio. - 2 double bedrooms, with another intimate and bright patio. - 1 generous bathroom with a modern design, next to the previous bedrooms. - 1 very charming toilet for guests. The flooring of the entire interior of the house is resolved using natural oak flooring, this being a material of exceptional quality and nobility, suitable for the most demanding taste due to its soft tonality, its beauty and its comfortable warmth. In addition, all rooms have air conditioning, central vacuum system and other useful domestic amenities. The property also includes in the garage floor: 3 parking spaces of 47 m2, with capacity for up to 4 cars; and 1 storage room of 17 m2. Among the most attractive uses of the community, the following can be highlighted: concierge service, fitness gym, swimming pool with pressure waterfalls, solarium terrace, jacuzzi, 2 Finnish saunas, and 2 bathrooms with dressing rooms. The Minilla neighborhood is perfectly located in the city of Las Palmas, close to the ring road, 1 minute from Hospital Dr.Negrín, a short walk from Playa de las Canteras or the Mesa y López Commercial Zone, and surrounded by local commercial services such as hypermarkets and hairdressers, as well as beautiful green, sports and recreational areas. Make your dreams come true.

description: Imposing apartment with wonderful views of the sea. It is located in one of the quietest and most central areas of the city. This building offers a gym on its ground floor, which, although it is not exclusive to the owners, does offer comfort for its use and enjoyment due to its proximity. This distinguished property occupies the entire floor of the building, so it does not adjoin any neighbour, thus freeing us from possible noise. It is sold, not with a garage space but with three garage spaces and a double storage room. We can also have a Solarium on the roof of approximately 25 m2. In addition, from the outdoor public parking there is an access for the exclusive use of the owners that connects directly with Luis Doreste Silva street. It receives sunlight 3,155 hours a year. The different rooms of the apartment are very well distributed since the common areas are subtly separated from the private areas. The whole house has parquet floors. As we get out of the elevator we can already breathe the elegant environment that we are going to find. We find ourselves in a private hall isolated from the stairs by some wood and glass panels. Upon entering the apartment we find the heart of the property. A very spacious and bright living room surrounded by large windows that allow you to see and connect with the wonderful views of the sea. From here you can access the balcony of approximately 97 m2 that surrounds practically the entire house. This connects to your right with a wonderful space for the dining room, in turn also surrounded by the windows that on the corner give it that added spaciousness and light.  Next, there is the kitchen with its own dining room for family breakfasts or dinners for a more informal use. Next to it is the laundry area, thus not taking away space from the kitchen and independent from it, there is a very spacious and comfortable pantry. All the windows as well as the access doors to the balcony have mosquito nets. In addition, the property has a service entrance that connects directly with the kitchen, with its own room and with its own bathroom. The main suite consists of a full bathroom and a large dressing room with built-in wardrobes located in a way that they go unnoticed with great storage capacity. The rest of the rooms share two complete and independent bathrooms. The bathrooms are prepared for people with reduced mobility. It should also be noted that all the rooms have built-in wardrobes of noble wood. Taking into account all the bedrooms that make up the house, it also has an independent office that connects with the living room and the entrance area. This splendid office has walls covered with wood, built-in bookcases such as impressive pieces of glazed wood, thus giving the room a more solemn air. The location of this property is very interesting, since on the one hand, the business area that surrounds it is very important because it is where all kinds of offices, small businesses and various Public Administration buildings are concentrated. It is also worth noting the easy access it has to enter and leave the city without having to wander the streets. The emblematic San Telmo Park and the main bus station are easily accessible even on foot. Another advantage of this property is that if we do not want to use our car to make purchases or different procedures, we can do so on Calle Mayor de Triana, which is pedestrianized and one of the most important and busiest shopping areas in the city. The expenses derived from the purchase and its management are not included in the price.

description: GARDEN CITY WITH VIEWS, IT'S POSSIBLE! Probably one of the best located properties and in the best area of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Ciudad Jardín, on the corner, overlooking the sea and surrounded by the largest green areas in the city, the Doramas Park and Gardens, Néstor Museum, Gardens and Hotel Santa Catalina and Pueblo Canario. On a 457 m2 plot and with a total of 486 m2 built on two levels, plus a parking floor, this spectacular property is distributed as follows: FIRST FLOOR: entrance hall, large living-dining room that opens onto a large terrace with views of the Hotel Santa Catalina y Jardines, with the sea in the background, three double bedrooms, and one single, all of them with fitted wardrobes, the master bedroom with en-suite suite, an office and two more bathrooms, independent kitchen and utility room. A corridor runs through the central part of the house with large built-in wardrobes for storage. All the residences are exterior. SECOND FLOOR: a spacious double living-dining room that opens onto the large upper terrace, with the best views of the house, unobstructed views of the gardens and the sea as on the lower floor, surrounding the house three double bedrooms and one single, the main one with a bathroom en suite, all with built-in wardrobes, an office, two more bathrooms that serve the rest of the rooms and an independent kitchen. All the rooms open onto a large terrace that surrounds the entire house from east to west, making the most of the sunlight. Large windows in all rooms and surrounded by green areas, a very quiet and central area, in the heart of the city. GARAGE FLOOR: on the ground floor of the plot, with capacity for more than ten cars, storage room and toilet. All this defines it as a property with a lot of potential, very SPECIAL and UNIQUE, both for its strategic location and for its wide views. The property has an adjoining independent plot, where the old pool of the family home was located, gardens, warehouse and leisure area with an area of 470m2 that can be purchased for €500,000 Information: The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.

description: Inmobiliaria Camino presents this central apartment for sale, located in the heart of León y Castillo, specifically at number 135, just a 5-minute walk from Calle Triana and with all the amenities available around it, from supermarkets, pharmacies, doctors, even bazaars and shops, enjoying excellent connections with public transport. The house is located on the first of five floors of a residential building, quiet and with an elevator as well as some stairs that go up directly from the entrance hall. The apartment has three bedrooms, a bathroom, a living room, an independent kitchen and a closed light patio. Of all the rooms, we highlight the living room and the master bedroom for having large windows facing Calle Pamochamoso that allow ventilation and light in the house. This property -it is a bank asset- needs a reform and several improvements to be able to recompose the facilities and other rooms of the house, in order to locate a dream apartment in one of the best areas of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. description: Housing on the top floor of the Dunas building, in Triana. The property is made up of 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, a toilet (with the possibility of incorporating a shower), a kitchen with utility room, a dining room and a living room. Both rooms are spacious, one en-suite with a full bathroom and shower and a large walk-in closet. The second room is currently being used as a bedroom/office and also has a built-in wardrobe with two doors. The toilet can be converted into a bathroom with a small work to include a shower. The kitchen is spacious, has a separate utility room and is connected to the dining room. The living room is comfortable and very bright. The house is renovated and well-cared for and has double-glazed, tilt-and-turn and aluminum windows. Details like this and the good construction of the building make the house well insulated from outside noise. It is a house with very high ceilings and very bright in which outside light reaches many rooms through skylights. The building has a 24-hour doorman, garage spaces for rent in the same building, 4 elevators and a portal completely renovated in 2023.

As a real estate agent, I can confirm that it is a home that meets all the requirements to be a good investment to live in: Very close to the center of Arucas but in a quiet neighborhood, a large basement with access to the land that is in a chain where you can grow crops, create leisure spaces, etc., a large 160-square-meter ground floor with a garage door , a house with an enviable terrace, make this house an ideal place to enjoy tranquility, with many possibilities to carry out a real project to turn it into a modern and independent home. description: I can say that this property meets each and every one of the requirements to confirm that it is a good country house, as it is in good condition both structurally and internally, carpentry, flooring, furniture and coatings. It enjoys enviable views and surroundings, it is totally independent, few neighbors, with good pedestrian and vehicle access and many hours of sunshine, as it faces south and is fully deeded and registered. The property is located in Risco Prieto, passing the town of Las Lagunetas in the direction of Cruz de Tejeda, taking the detour to Valleseco, traveling less than a kilometer to reach the destination. The plot has a total area of 2,157 m2, where the house and the flat area where you can enjoy all this environment, in front of the house, an uneven area where there is a chain of land, a place that has been used for planting and two natural caves of 14 and 11 m2 respectively. The house, Built on two levels, it has a total area of 350 m2, of which 287 m2 belong to the ground floor. On this floor, there is the living room with a fireplace of 25 square meters together with an adjoining room of 8 square meters, a dining room of 13 m2, a large kitchen with enough space to include a dining table for day to day with a total area of 15 square meters. From the kitchen there is access to a large and beautiful covered patio that gives access to the outdoor area where the pool is located and on the other hand to a corridor through which you reach a natural cave of 17 m2, which is inside the house. and a small bathroom. It has 3 bedrooms, the main one measuring 12.5 m2 and two other singles measuring 6.6 m2, ending with a bathroom. The upper floor has a constructed area of 62 m2, with four bedrooms, all of them with gabled ceilings and clad in wood. The main one of 13 m2 and the other three are individual measuring 8.6 m2 each. The rest of the floor is a roof terrace, with excellent views of 94 m2, which are not computed in the built area. The pool measures 22.43 m2 and has an underground mechanical room, it is the only element that needs to be fixed as it is not in good condition. The house is surrounded by a covered terrace where you can spend pleasant moments when the weather requires shelter and thus, not miss the opportunity to enjoy the surroundings. It is really worth coming to see it, to convince yourself that it is a beautiful house, in an environment mountain, quiet and with a sky that can only be enjoyed daily by those who live in this area of the summit of Gran Canaria. The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law corresponds to the buyer. description: We present a one-story building to reform in Bañaderos, on the north coast of Gran Canaria in the municipality of Arucas. The north coast of Gran Canaria is known for its black sand beaches, cozy coves and natural pools, such as those found in Bañaderos and El Puertillo. Surf lovers will also find some of the best spots on the island in this area. The construction has 200 meters of plot and 192 built, it currently has six rooms, one of them on the roof, which is one of the jewels of this construction due to its dimensions, which allows you to design a spectacular outdoor space, kitchen and bathroom complete the description of the building. With the right renovation, this building could become the perfect holiday property for tourists looking to enjoy the natural beauty of Gran Canaria. But if what you are looking for is to be able to design and reform your future home to your liking, in an ideal environment and with all the services, in addition to being able to live on the coast, without a doubt the two hundred meters that this property offers, with its magnificent roof terrace, where you can have a perfect space for relaxation and outdoor entertainment, make this property a magnificent option Bañaderos, thanks to its privileged location on the north coast of Gran Canaria, as it is close to the capital Las Palmas de Gran Canaria and the main municipalities in the north of the island. It offers a wide variety of services and amenities. The building is located near the natural pools and the Puertillo beach. Do not miss this investment opportunity in Bañaderos. Contact us for more information on this property and to schedule a viewing. We are sure that you will fall in love with this building as much as we do!

address: Valle de los Nueve - El Ejido - Medianías
district: Valle de los Nueve - El Ejido - Medianías
description: Luxury villa in Piletillas, in an exclusive urbanization, only a few minutes from the city center and the coast of Telde. In this spectacular villa you can enjoy all the comforts you could wish for, such as a large terrace, private swimming pool, Jacuzzi, recreation area, barbecue.. . as well as a spacious living room with views of the garden and pool.  On the first floor there is a fully equipped kitchen, a dining room and two different entrances for extra privacy. Four bedrooms on the upper floor, the main one with a private terrace, dressing room and its own full ensuite bathroom. Large open spaces throughout the house and a huge garden where you can enjoy all year round the island's climate. The price does not include the costs of the purchase, such as notary, registration, taxes, etc. , which will be paid by whoever corresponds by law.

address: Calle Capitan General Jose Antonio Gutierrez Mellado, 33
description: Construcciones Cristóbal Ortega, SLU (CCO), a solid and solvent company with more than 30 years of experience and track record, promotes and builds “RESIDENCIAL ACEBUCHE”. This residential of new construction homes in TAMARACEITE, will be built between the streets DOCTOR GUTIERREZ MELLADO, JUAN PULIDO RODRIGUEZ and LUCY CABRERA SUAREZ (the building faces 3 facades). The building will be located in a newly expanded area, very close to the Los Alisios Shopping Center, and with all the necessary services and facilities: supermarkets, bus station, schools, institute, municipal offices, sports center, green areas, etc. Likewise, it has excellent communication and very easy access to the GC-3 motorway that connects all directions. It is a building with 56 dwellings (4 dwellings with 2 bedrooms and 52 dwellings with 3 bedrooms), garages, storage rooms and commercial premises with 5 floors above ground (premises and dwellings) and 2 floors below ground (garages and storage rooms). "Residencial Acebuche" is made up of exterior and interior dwellings and is distributed in: •Ground floor: business premises. •1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floor: 14 apartments per floor (1 with 2 bedrooms and 11 with 3 bedrooms). •Basement floor -1 and -2: garages and storage rooms. Six houses on the first floor have the private use (common area) of a patio/terrace ranging from 40 to 51 m2. The price of each house includes a garage and a storage room. The houses have a fitted kitchen, fitted wardrobes, pre-installation of air conditioning, etc. The works are scheduled to start in the first quarter of 2023, and its delivery is scheduled for the first/second quarter of 2025 (approximately 24 months from the start of the work). Prices do not include taxes (I. G. I. C, A. J. D. ) or notarial/registration fees. ** Non-contractual images. If you are attracted to this project and want to live near a privileged environment, well connected and in full expansion, request personalized information.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Tamaraceite, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Capitan General Jose Antonio Gutierrez Mellado, 33

municipality: Santa Maria de Guia de Gran Canaria
description: Inversiones Brisabai sl has entrusted Solcanario with the commercialization of an exclusive, modern, unique, ambitious and efficient project of single-family homes in the best area of Santa María de Guía with direct connection to the highway. All the houses will have three floors, semi-basement, ground floor and upper floor. The semi-basement will have an area of 82 m2, will function as a garage and a part has been adapted to a multipurpose area (gym. movie theater, etc.. . ). The ground floor will have a constructed area of 63 m2, with more than 40 m2 terrace and garden surrounding the living-dining room area, this space is ideal for enjoying good times with family and friends, the large windows provide light and feeling of freedom, this day area will be complemented with a toilet and in the front part a kitchen with more than 12 m2, spacious and very bright. The concept we have designed is that of a plant that is as open as possible, with light as the protagonist and where spaces are defined naturally, with the added value of the garden and the terrace. The upper floor will be divided into three bedrooms (the main one with a private balcony), the two secondary bedrooms share access to a balcony, two bathrooms and all bedrooms have a built-in wardrobe. The Residencial Brisabai has been designed by and for families, the people who inhabit it, whatever their age, will be able to enjoy this small neighborhood built from scratch and thinking of them. From the garbage containers that will be buried, through the garden areas, children's play areas, wide, comfortable sidewalks and with trees, all without implying an extra cost for the owners. Another point where designers have paid special attention is in the design of the facades are the letter of presentation of the homes, for that reason it was sought to combine efficiency, design and functionality. The construction will be carried out in three phases, in the first phase we offer 16 homes for sale with very competitive prices, the range will be between * 219. € 000 and * 235. € 000 (* the expenses inherent to the purchase and sale are NOT included in these prices). In the promotional video, furniture is represented in all the rooms of the house so that the spaces can be better valued, this furniture is NOT included, the houses are sold unfurnished, the kitchen is unfurnished.

description: PRICE REDUCED FROM 299,000 EUROS TO 290,000 EUROS! For sale a wonderful 119 m2 apartment (cadastral area) located on Salvago street (Isleta neighborhood), very close to Playa del Confital and the continuation of Paseo de las Canteras, in the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. The house is in perfect condition and is distributed in 3 spacious bedrooms (one of them with a bathroom and dressing room), a large living-dining room with a small balcony, a living room, a kitchen, a bathroom and a hall. It also has half of the garage (it has about 120 m2 in total), with the possibility of parking 2 cars and several motorcycles. The roof terrace occupies the entire surface of the third floor and is communal (to share the use with a single neighbor), from where you can enjoy beautiful views. It has a privileged location as it is located a few meters from the entrance to the Confital beach and the promenade where you can enjoy beautiful views of the sea and Playa de las Canteras. It has all the necessary services at your fingertips, such as bus stops, schools, sports facilities, supermarkets, pharmacies, beaches, restaurants, etc. TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THIS OPPORTUNITY TO ACQUIRE A WONDERFUL HOME TO LIVE IN, BUT IT IS ALSO VERY INTERESTING AS AN INVESTMENT SINCE IT IS IN ONE OF THE NEIGHBORHOODS WITH THE MOST DEMAND FOR SALE AND RENT IN LAS PALMAS DE GRAN CANARIA! Information: The sale price does not include notary fees, registration and taxes derived from it. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: Spacious apartment in a manor house for sale in San Juan, Telde. Fully furnished apartment ready to move into, located on the ground floor of an elegant manor house. It consists of an entrance hall, a living-dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, a bright patio used as an interior terrace, three bedrooms, a complete bathroom with a shower, two toilets and a small laundry room. The house is stately with high ceilings and has three independent entrances, it can be converted into two independent houses. Property with multiple possibilities of redistribution. There is no community fee. 2-storey house with 2 neighbors per floor. Its location is perfect: located in the historic center of San Juan a few meters from the Arnao park and close to the Lidl and HiperDino shopping centers. Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to errors or involuntary omissions. Contact us for more information and to arrange a visit!

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle León y Castillo

description: Huge farm for sale in Montañon, Valsequillo. This farm has an area of 21,000 square meters, which makes it a true natural paradise. The property is located in a rural environment, ideal for those seeking to enjoy tranquility and nature in its purest form. The cave house, fully furnished and ready to move into, is a true architectural jewel that blends perfectly into the landscape. It has 50 square meters built, distributed in a spacious and bright living-dining room, a fully equipped kitchen, two double bedrooms and two complete bathrooms with a shower (one of them exterior). In addition, it includes a magnificent terrace of 100 square meters to enjoy the weather and the spectacular views. The farm also has a wood cave, a storage cave and a garage space for one car. One of the strengths of this property are the two ponds with a total of 76 cubic meters that collect rainwater. In addition, it has a water tank for the house of 7,000 liters. This guarantees the supply of water at any time of the year, even in the driest months. The property includes a dovecote, two chicken coops, a room for rabbits and a barbecue to enjoy delicious grilled meats. On the land there are also fruit trees such as plums, nispireros, pear trees, apple trees, almond trees, lemon trees, walnut trees, orange trees, avocado trees, olive trees, prickly pear trees and an orchard to grow fresh and healthy vegetables. In addition, it has a pump for irrigation and a small spring of water that guarantee the maintenance of the crops and the quality of the water. Ideal for use as a holiday home. In short, this farm is a unique opportunity for those looking to enjoy nature in its purest form and live in a privileged rural environment. Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to errors or involuntary omissions. Contact us for more information and to arrange a visit!
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Valsequillo de Gran Canaria
suggestedTexts.title: Estate in Montañon

description: You have found your ideal apartment in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria! It is located in a very well connected area near shopping centers, supermarkets, schools and health centers. In addition, we can find parks and sports areas, come on. It is a fantastic area to live! The apartment has 3 bedrooms, two of them doubles, an open-concept kitchen leading to a very bright living room and a full bathroom. The concept we have designed is that of a plant that is as open as possible, with light as the protagonist and where spaces are defined naturally, with the added value of the garden and the terrace. The Residencial Brisabai has been designed by and for families, the people who inhabit it, whatever their age, will be able to enjoy this small neighborhood built from scratch and thinking of them. From the garbage containers that will be buried, through the garden areas, children's play areas, wide, comfortable sidewalks and with trees, all without implying an extra cost for the owners. description: Charming country house with magnificent views of the sea and the Island for sale in La Pasadilla, Ingenio. Rustic property of 11,117 m² located in a privileged location. The property has a constructed area of 471 m² and a useful area of 400 m². The main house has two spacious bedrooms, two fully-equipped kitchens, a cozy living room, three full bathrooms, and a barbecue area ideal for gatherings with family and friends. In addition, the house has several storage rooms and a very large warehouse for additional storage. There are two covered garage spaces for the parking of the owners' vehicles. The house has independent hot water in each unit, which guarantees the comfort and convenience of its occupants. The main room has air conditioning. From the property's large garden, you can enjoy 270-degree panoramic views, ranging from Las Palmas to Vecindario and the entire Ingenio mountain. The property has vehicular access to the entire estate and the capacity to park more than 12 vehicles. The property also has hours of water from a cooperative with a very affordable price and with a direct connection to the farm. In addition, the farm has a huge 111 m² stable for all kinds of animals, which makes it an ideal option for those looking for a place where they can keep their animals. The property also has three cisterns of 36, 43 and 6 square meters in area, with more than 2 meters depth. The water from the cisterns is used to irrigate the farm, which makes it an ideal option for those who wish to cultivate their own garden and enjoy life in the countryside. This rustic finca is a unique opportunity for those looking for a property in a privileged location in Gran Canaria, surrounded by nature and with all the comforts. There are fruit trees of all kinds, from lemon, cacti, plums, figs to olive trees and vines, it is also an area where many kinds of fruits and vegetables grow very well. The area has fiber optics for the best internet connection. This magnificent farm is located just 6 minutes by car from the center of Ingenio where the entire commercial area is located with all the basic day-to-day needs such as supermarkets, pharmacies, shops and others. In 15 minutes you can access the GC-1 motorway and only 17 minutes away is the Gran Canaria airport. Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to errors or involuntary omissions. Contact us for more information and to arrange a visit!

description: Gilmar Real Estate presents the opportunity to acquire this single-family home with a terrace and two attached apartments in the Casco de Tafira Alta. Located in the residential area of Tafira Alta, this property has potential for profitability, being ideal as a family home, for investors who wish to obtain income through apartment rentals or set up a professional office. The house is distributed on one floor and consists of 3 bedrooms, an office, 2 bathrooms, a living-dining room, a kitchen and a garage. In addition, it has an internal staircase that leads to a magnificent terrace with an additional room that could be used as a study or as a laundry and storage area. The property, with a good base of original materials, has a fireplace in the living room and a dressing room in the master bedroom. One of the bathrooms can be reformed to create an en-suite bathroom in the master bedroom or convert the office into another bedroom. The built area in the house is 115 square meters, to which we must add the terrace, the garage and the laundry room, which makes a total of 212 built square meters. In addition to the main house, the property has two independent apartments, each one measuring 35 square meters, with a distribution that includes: living room, kitchen, bathroom and bedroom. Both apartments share a roof terrace with sea views, making them the perfect place to relax and enjoy the warm climate of Gran Canaria. Both the house and the two apartments need reform, which gives them multiple possibilities for private use or as an investment. Do not miss the opportunity to acquire this unique property in Tafira Alta. description: INVESTMENT OR HOUSING OPPORTUNITY! The historic center of Vegueta presents one of its manor houses, a beautiful house from the year 1900, correctly preserved on the corner and perfect both to live in, if what you are looking for is a large property or to take advantage of its commercial premises that supplied the neighborhood for generations from Vegueta or perhaps as a hotel, restaurant or vacation home, since its 396m2 lend themselves to any of them. The Vegueta neighborhood is the historic center of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria and a privileged place to live surrounded by everything that a city can offer you: leisure, culture, gastronomy and a lot of tranquility thanks to its pedestrian streets and the characteristic neighborhood of this beautiful city. Now you have the excellent opportunity to invest in it, in this fantastic Canarian house 5 minutes from Santa Ana and its cathedral, having two museums on the same street, El CAAM and Museo de Arte Sacro, 3 squares: Santa Ana, Plaza del Cortado where having a drink is impossible to avoid and Plaza Espíritu Santo with its historic Hermitage. This property is distributed over 2 floors plus a roof terrace. First floor: We have 7 entrances, the first of which leads to the private part of the house and the rest to the 5 commercial premises.It has a space that is 4 meters high and very wide, all of them are connected to each other, although they can be closed and become completely independent or make divisions within the larger one. On this same floor we have a 28m2 Canarian patio in perfect state of conversation and that distributes the rest of the rooms on this floor, 2 more rooms and access to an interior patio with stairs that lead to the roof. Second floor: From the Canarian patio on the ground floor and covered, we access the upper floor by beautiful original wooden stairs and in perfect condition. This entire floor is distributed from a corridor full of windows that overlook the patio with Light enters throughout the day and year round thanks to its east-west orientation, the floor is made of wood and in perfect condition without insects that could damage it. This floor has 5 rooms, all of them exterior and one of which is large and with large windows and access to a balcony, an original kitchen and bathroom in perfect condition and a storage room. Rooftop: From this passable roof terrace we can see the sea and its sunrise, enjoy a summer afternoon without neighbors watching because of its height and thanks to the fact that its neighbors are a museum and a hotel without access to its roof.All this makes this roof the perfect oasis to relax and to be able to make areas of personal enjoyment or business on it.It also has a laundry room. This home is included in the Vegueta-Triana Special Protection Plan of the Las Palmas de Gran Canaria City Council (Architectural Catalog Volume IV, VT 410), therefore it is exempt from the Energy Efficiency Certificate. Likewise, its first bay is protected by the same plan but after this we can make the necessary modifications as well as build on the roof. Do not miss the opportunity, request more information and come and see it without obligation. Expenses and taxes derived from the sale are not included in the price.

description: Fantastic country house with land and fruit trees in Teneniguada, Valsequillo We are incredibly happy to make this beautiful property available to you.We know that you were looking for this type of opportunity, and we are very happy to finally offer it to you.And they are two houses, not one.Two. On the one hand, it is a house, new construction, in the absence of finishing the details (floor plates, painting walls and the like), totally finished structurally and finished off in the absence of the aforementioned, with all its European aluminum exterior carpentry. This beautiful house is located in Rincón de Tenteniguada, a beautiful area of Valsequillo that combines the natural and the rustic, a haven of incomparable peace and one of the best preserved traditional rural settlements in the Canary Islands. In addition, next to this house, there is another, smaller, which is completely finished in the absence of completing the electrical installation and bathroom fixtures. The reason why the house is not completely finished is that it was a family project that has been decided not to go ahead, since the family's circumstances have changed and they have decided to prioritize other issues, so they have decided to put it up for sale. this wonder for you to qualify for it. It is about two houses, the big one of 116 m², the small one of 34 m². The large house consists of a living room, kitchen, 3 bedrooms, bathroom and roof terrace with spectacular views.The rooms are very spacious, all exterior.It has pre-installation of air conditioning in all rooms. The smallest house has a bathroom, a large kitchen and a bedroom, with a wonderful porch where you can enjoy the beautiful sunsets of the midlands of Gran Canaria.In front of this house, there is a free space, which is urban, and a piece classified as "leisure", which could perfectly be destined for a swimming pool, barbecue area, or the compatible use that you want to give it.Your imagination is the only limit. You like nature, right? In this wonderful property you will have approximately 1,500 m² of rustic land, planted as you can see in the photographs by many fruit trees in full production, and with a fully functional irrigation system.Olive trees, apple trees, orange trees, plum trees, fig trees... an explosion of life, color and nature that will delight you and your family. It is important to note that the car does not reach the house, since it is accessed by a path.There are two entrances to the property, one a little narrower, in which the car is just 15 meters from the house, and another wider and more comfortable, in which it is a little further away, but in any case, very very near walking. Without a doubt, this is a spectacular property for everything it has to offer, and in the current situation, we are sure that it will find its new owner very soon.The only question is will you be that new owner? Surely yes! Feel free to call me and request more information.We can visit it without obligation.Ahead! Information: The sale price Does not include taxes of transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: CHARMING CAVE HOUSE IN GUÍA House with many possibilities, ideal for vacation rental or if you want to live in the middle of nature; It can even be a combination of both, enjoy it as a second residence in addition to renting extra income when you are not using it. Very well located, with the feeling of being far from the cities but only 35 minutes from Las Palmas and 10 minutes from Guía, with incredible views that allow you to see the sea. The property has access by car to it, it has installation of water, sanitation, solar panels for the supply of electricity and heating, as well as pre-installation for a generator. It has been recently renovated respecting its rustic style and with top quality materials. It consists of 3 levels, in the upper one we find a flat land of 1,516 m2 ideal for cultivation; The 118 m2 house is located on the intermediate level with a wonderful porch and a small pond that can serve as a pool; And finally the third level of 624 m2 (m2 of level 2 and 3), divided into terraces with fruit trees..., with which the land would be 2140 m2 in total. The cave house is distributed in: living room, independent kitchen, bedroom with dressing room, complete bathroom and Turkish bath; in addition to another unfinished room but equipped with water and electricity facilities. The property is not registered in the property registry, although this process is quite advanced, but for now its purchase must be in cash or a personal loan, and there is no possibility of acquiring it with a bank mortgage. Do not hesitate to make a visit and thus be able to experience the sensations that it arouses, or ask me any question about the property, I will be happy to assist you. description: GILMAR offers you the possibility of living in the heart of Puerto de La Luz and at the entrance from the sea to the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. This project is the first of the major urban planning transformation planned for the coming years in the city making it one of the areas with more future prospects. RESIDENCIAL LA FÁBRICA DE HIELO is a project that will bring luxury and quality to the area, transforming the city's skyline forever.  Located about 10 minutes walk from Las Canteras Beach, one of the best urban beaches in Europe. This title is due not only to its pleasant climate and calm waters all year round, but also to the quality of its services and its lively avenue, all this in the heart of the city.  RESIDENCIAL LA FÁBRICA DE HIELO is a project of two towers of 9 and 18 floors, with an avant-garde exterior appearance, which will be built with the best materials and an energetically sustainable approach.  The residential complex, which is totally enclosed, has 1,400 square metres of communal areas with gardens, swimming pool and solarium. Magnificent double-height entrance hall and three lifts for 71 homes. Once the first phase of the project, Tower 9, has been sold, GILMAR offers you the exclusive possibility of living in Tower 18. We offer the buyer 1, 2 and 3 bedroom homes, with top quality materials, all exterior, with storage room and the possibility of acquiring a parking space in the residential complex.

description: We are pleased to present you with an authentic jewel in the residential area of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Its location allows us to enjoy the tranquility of an environment in which wide spaces predominate. It is an attractive and perfect location, in which the proximity to the center stands out, and which in turn has leisure areas, commercial services, medical centers, sports areas and nearby schools. The personality of this house makes it unique in the area. Its spectacular views, its wide spaces, full of light, make it the dream home. This spectacular villa, built in 2014, is distributed as follows: On the ground floor and at the height of the entrance to the main door of the house there is a spacious and elegant living room, from this room we access a sunny terrace and an area for a front garage, where we can enjoy the sun's rays from first morning hour until late. Continuing on this floor, we find the fully equipped kitchen, which gives access to a backyard. In this room we also have two large bedrooms, a full bathroom with a shower and utility room. Situated on the first floor we find the night area: Two rooms wrapped in charm and personality where the large windows stand out, the built-in wardrobes on one side and the spacious, comfortable and useful bathroom, its materials and tones, invite you to enjoy a moment of relaxation and feel at home! This level is completed with a large terrace that brings light to the night area. Last but not least, we have a large walkable roof terrace, ideal for creating a chill out space, with pleasant views. There are many homes that seem ideal, but this really is. This can be your new home. Visit it! *CV expenses not included in the price.

address: Santa Maria de Guia de Gran Canaria
municipality: Santa Maria de Guia de Gran Canaria
description: Great farm with housing in Las Boticarias, about 8 minutes from San Roque de Santa María de Guía. The farm has a total area of 17,878 square meters, of which approximately 3,500 square meters are suitable for cultivation. Of the 462 meters built, 200 would correspond to the house and the rest to the two ponds that are in the upper part of the property. The house is in need of reform but has spectacular potential, the distribution is somewhat peculiar for being an old house with wooden ceilings. In the lower part we would have two rooms that communicate directly through the terrace, separated by what was an old shed that is now a covered terrace. In the upper part to the left looking straight ahead at the house, we would have a living room, kitchen and a cave-like living room, this area was renovated at the time. In the upper area on the right we have two rooms, one with stone floors and the other with hydraulic floors that preserve all the original charm of the house. This part is accessed independently by a staircase and just behind there are some caves that could be conditioned to inhabit them. On the terrace in front of the house there is a bathroom and a barbecue area for family celebrations.

description: Fantastic investment opportunity! Great property in a very central location. The property is built on three floors: The ground floor consists of two parts: two offices with their bathroom and the possibility of a small kitchen (which could also be ideal for a coworking space, dining room or additional bedrooms if necessary). The other part is a flat which has two bedrooms, an individual kitchen, bathroom, hall and a small patio. The first floor has a four bedroom flat, all four double bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. There is also a hall and a large light living room which leads onto a kitchen. The top floor has a separate one bedroom apartment with bathroom, living room and large kitchen area. There are two terraces, one large terrace at the front and a smaller terrace at the back which leads to stairs up to the large roof terrace. All the bedrooms, the bathrooms and the kitchens have been renovated with the original floors being kept throughout. The electrical installation is also new. Some renovation on the exterior and interior must still be done. There is space for a lift.  This property would be ideal for a digital nomad room rental hub with a coworking space, or three separate rental properties and office space. Also would make a perfect large family home.
