description: Imagine living in paradise. Feeling isolated, being next to everything. If you're watching it.. . make it happen. We present you a place in paradise, a single-storey Chalet, in Santa Brígida, Gran Canaria, on the central road, built on a 1,852m2 plot. This single-family house is made up of three buildings, that is, a house on the ground floor and a semi-basement floor, a one-storey garage with some adjoining rooms and a storage room in the basement; and a one-story gazebo dining-grill and a cellar in the basement. These three buildings have a constructed area of 465m2 and a useful area of 365m2. The best thing about this property is not the house. Here, what makes the difference is everything that is outside of it. As soon as you enter, its gardens will attract you at any time of the day. Inside the house, its spectacular dining room, completely exterior and with different differentiated environments and with direct access to the terrace, will captivate you. Directly connected to the kitchen, large and spacious, with a central island that governs and sets the course for the best chefs, as well as a stately pantry to serve and accommodate a large family. The house also has 3 bedrooms on the main floor, all with fitted wardrobes and also with direct access to the outside terrace, and one of them with a bathroom included. On the lower floor we find two more rooms, as well as a third bathroom. This area will serve as a guest apartment, or as a family leisure area. Outside the house, the property has a basketball court, a garden area and orchards, an independent covered outdoor garage, a cellar with an ideal natural temperature to keep the best wines. But without a doubt, the place that will make you enjoy unforgettable days with family and friends is its majestic gazebo. Gazebo, with bar and grill included, which will delight any event that we want to celebrate in that dining room. Do not think twice and call us, sure that you will love it.

description: When we look for a new home there are two characteristics that we always, always value to make a decision: EXTERIOR NATURAL LIGHT AND SPACIOUSNESS. Do you agree with me? If so, what more would you ask of your new home? You would like it to have a balcony, two or three.. . You would like to enjoy a huge living room that you could distribute as you wish and that would allow you to rest peacefully after your busy day.. . You would like to be able to take advantage of every corner and that it was well distributed.. . You would like to have a large kitchen where you can comfortably prepare the most delicious delicacies.. . I would like to be able to do magic and please all your tastes. In this home that I present to you, I can tell you that you will have up to three balconies that flood the house with natural light and ventilation. You will have a magnificent living room that you can decorate with care and take great advantage of its spaciousness and comfort. You will enjoy an ideal distribution having the rest area well differentiated from the leisure area. And, you will have a large kitchen in which to delight your family. But, not only that, it is located in an unbeatable place just 5 minutes from Arucas, in one of the quietest and most familiar neighborhoods of the city, in the heart of Visvique, with numerous services at your fingertips, supermarket, pharmacy, a sweet shop that is a temptation and one of the best restaurants on the island, the famous Casa Brito. What more can we ask for? This charming apartment is sold together with a large garage space and a storage room to store your little things. I can only tell you that in a few minutes you are at the exit to the Las Palmas ring road and the North road and that you are one step away from the beautiful Villa de Teror. Come see it and you will be surprised! I'll wait for you.. . A small thing to keep in mind, especially with regard to accessibility, the building does not have an elevator, but it is not a big handicap because it really is a second floor with a comfortable staircase. If you need it, we can help you with all the mortgage management. The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.

description: Great opportunity Do you want a home where you can enjoy your family and nature, less than 20 minutes from the capital? A beautiful property is for sale, completely independent, with many possibilities and in a beautiful area. In it you can create a HOME balanced between the rustic and the urban on a plot of two thousand five hundred and five meters on the Carretera de los Hoyos. The property consists of a main house from 1980, a beautiful Canarian house, with gabled roofs and a beautiful Canarian balcony, which has three hundred and nine meters built, centered on the plot, and a building attached to the back of the plot, of about one hundred and thirty-nine square meters, in which there is a large garage for different vehicles, with a bathroom, storage room and a large open area, which could be given different uses such as a gym, an independent apartment from the main house, etc. In the outdoor area, in addition to terraces and gardens, it has fruit trees, a fountain, a barbecue area with a kitchen, a chicken coop and land to plant. The GROUND floor of the main house has an entrance hall, living room with fireplace, dining area, storage room, two bedrooms, bathroom and kitchen with office. The UPPER floor of said house is distributed in three bedrooms, bathroom, living room and exterior corner balcony with spectacular views of the entire property. The property has three cisterns for rain, supply water and irrigation water. The fiber optic arrives and has the services of buses and schools nearby. Area of prestigious schools nearby. If you have questions, or want to visit it, call me without obligation. The property is best seen and felt its energy. There you will feel peace and good vibes essential today. The documentation is completely in order, property fully registered in the Property Registry and without urban infractions. SALE ONLY, NO RENT OR PURCHASE OPTION IS ADMITTED. Note: Expenses and taxes not included. The data is indicative and is subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: Villa for sale in Verol Alto, Santa Brígida. Sometimes it is necessary to let go to walk. Let go to move on. And this means courage and strength. Why am I telling you all this, you ask? Well, because the owner with courage and grit after living everything she had to live in this house with its positive and negative things has decided that it is time to put an end to this story. Leaving the doors open to the new owners and closing this chapter of his life. Undoubtedly taking from her the greatest gift this place gave her: her son. And leaving behind this wonderful villa designed to your liking, with the mezzanine hall.(I already told you that if you are looking to get a gluteus, this is not your property) since climbing kilometers of stairs is not viable in this property. The upper floor, where he located two rooms with large independent terraces and dream views.The first room with its own bathroom and dressing room, the second with a large and beautiful terrace as well as a separate bathroom. On the ground floor, he decided to have a bright and spacious kitchen with a dining room, a beautiful living room with a fireplace for the coldest winter days.A bathroom and one more room.In addition, on this floor there is also the laundry room. And the exteriors? How wonderful, what better than a good place outdoors in your own home to give you a moment of peace in the most complicated moments... As well as a small piece of land to be able to have your own little garden. If he would have liked to finish something, it is the basement, where he had a very attractive project to also be able to enjoy this floor of the house.Like some little things from the outside where you would have liked to have an outdoor dining room, as well as a pool area with a chill out area to enjoy the pleasant days that living on these wonderful islands gives us. But nothing that cannot be fixed with love and the desire to start a new project. She has decided to end this chapter of her life in the best way she has known how, leaving the doors open to new people who want to make this place THEIR HOME…. And you, would you see yourself living in a place like this? Notary fees, registration and taxes generated by the sale are not included in the price. The Data shown is merely indicative and is subject to inadvertent errors or omissions.

description: "Your Price €403,000" Wonderful property for sale from the 17th century in the Historic Center of Vegueta, in which the facades of the houses are the best guide to discover five centuries of history. Neighborhood that treasures an amalgamation of architectural styles. Its facade is partially protected. It is located near the Plaza de Santo Domingo, which is the protagonist of the well-known Rosario pilgrimage that runs through the neighborhoods of Vegueta and Triana in October, since it starts from there. This square has a fountain dating from the eighteenth century and the Parish of the same name. It consists of 268 square meters distributed as follows: On the ground floor we find its 17th century door that leads to a wonderful natural stone hall that maintains its origin, communicating with a natural wood staircase to the second floor. We continue on the ground floor where we can find a fully equipped and independent kitchen, a living room with wooden beams and natural stone, a comfortable patio where you can enjoy the cozy atmosphere. Spacious and comfortable bathroom. Second floor distributed in 3 bedrooms, dressing room, storage room and a comfortable and spacious bathroom. Finally and on the top floor we find a bedroom, a storage room and we can access a fantastic terrace where we can enjoy good time with family and friends, from which we can see the entire Vegueta neighborhood and access the roof terrace. Highlight the great amplitude and the magnificent state of its walls, maintaining the stone and natural wood, giving it a peculiar and cozy touch. Ideal as an investment for a Hostel or Vacation Home. Information: Expenses and taxes not included. The information given is merely indicative and may be subject to inadvertent errors or omissions.

description: Modern two-bedroom house, recently built, brand new, located in the heart of Las Canteras.As soon as we enter the house we find the utility room on the left and then the U-shaped outdoor kitchen, with a glass door that facilitates the entry of light into the hall and the dining room, equipped in turn with large floor-to-ceiling windows. The kitchen is equipped with wall and base units, an oven, an extractor hood and a compact quartz countertop. From the distributor there is access to the two bedrooms, both with built-in wardrobes, the main one with an en-suite bathroom and floor-to-ceiling windows. Both the en-suite bathroom and the common bathroom in the house have shower trays, shower-handsets for toilets and a vanity unit with drawers in the en-suite bathroom. The interior carpentry is lacquered in white, including the built-in wardrobes and the main door, which is armored, with a security lock and paneled with steel sheets. The height of the house places it above the surrounding buildings, which provides wide views and abundant natural light. The urbanization where it is located, Habitat Las Canteras, was built in 2023, and stands out for its modern and original design, having been projected in two towers linked by an interior walkway.

description: Beautiful penthouse on the seafront  The flat is located in one of the emblematic areas of the city, in an excellent location and with unbeatable views, where you can enjoy spectacular sunsets with the sea breeze.  The property has a total of 157m2 and as we enter, we can find a bright living-dining room and open kitchen, with huge floor-to-ceiling windows, which provide wonderful views from the inside. The living room has two areas, both with access to the 30 m2 terrace, where we can enjoy different ambiences: a sitting area and a cosy reading area, ideal for enjoying a good book with the Atlantic Ocean in the background. Further into the house, we find the bedroom area. All of them have built-in wardrobes and plenty of luminosity. Two of the bedrooms have an en-suite bathroom and the third one has access to the terrace through a sliding glass door, which allows you to enjoy the views from the bed itself and wake up every morning with all the energy of the ocean. This is an exceptional opportunity to get a property with these features in the most popular and demanded area of the city. Location  This flat is located in the amazing area of Las Canteras Beach, one of the best urban beaches in Europe, surrounded by an enormous variety of gastronomic and leisure options, with all the services within reach: shops, pharmacies, schools, health centres and transport. You can walk along the Las Canteras Promenade, from the masterpiece of modern architecture that is the Alfredo Kraus Auditorium to La Puntilla, and enjoy the great atmosphere and ambience. It is the perfect place for sports lovers. Beach volleyball, yoga or functional training groups are constantly taking place, and you can often see people running or swimming along the coastline. Very close to the property there is access to the GC-1 motorway and the GC-2 dual carriageway which connects you quickly with the North and South of the island and takes you to Gran Canaria Airport in 20 minutes.  Just a few minutes' walk away is the area of Mesa y López, one of the best-known commercial neighbourhoods of Las Palmas, which has many shops and commercial stores.  The Dr. Negrín hospital, one of the two general hospitals of the island, and flagship of the Canarian health system, is only a few kilometres away. A privileged location, with all kinds of services and a stunning beach in front, makes this flat a very attractive investment.

description: Country house in San José completely renovated inside and out, it is ready to move into, the kitchen with all brand new appliances, ceramic hob, oven, refrigerator, washing machine and the two brand new renovated bathrooms, it also includes several closets and a office table included in the sale. The house has three floors, on the ground floor we find the living room, bathroom, and kitchen. On the first floor there are three bedrooms and a bathroom and on the second floor there is a walkable roof terrace, it has rooms, one for washing and a small room which could be used for different uses, the car does not reach the door, It is approximately 50 meters from the Paseo de San José. In the area we find services such as: public transport, schools, supermarkets, health centers and Hospitals, University and Maternal and Child. Very close to Vegueta, the Courts and the Triana area, one of the main shopping areas of Las Palmas. It has easy entrance and exit access to the main highways either in a southerly or northerly direction on the island.. . The expenses generated from the sale are not included in the sale price. If you want to make a visit, do not hesitate to make an appointment.

description: SPECTACULAR house ready to be occupied! Located in one of the quietest and most beautiful urbanization of La Pardilla, La Hoyeta. We found a fantastic home, impeccable in its finishes and care, that goes on sale even with the furniture. It should be noted that it is a totally exterior dwelling, so it receives light and ventilation from any room. It has 3 floors. Its access floor with a large living room, kitchen and toilet; You can access the terrace area from the entrance to the house or from the kitchen, the latter wonderful for its light and spaciousness. Upstairs, rest area with spaciousness in its distributor towards the 3 bedrooms; the main spacious and suite type with bathroom and large closet. The other 2 bedrooms share a balcony to the outside and have fitted wardrobes. It should be noted that all the bathrooms in the house have a window, a plus in any home. The entrance and exit from the garage is connected to the interior of the house, so the few days of rain will not be an impediment to access without getting wet. Garage with capacity for 2 cars in addition to having another room inside, currently conditioned as an office. Arriving at the divided terrace to enjoy it with a delimited area of fruit trees and a green area; It also has a barbecue area, toilet and laundry area, it will make the comfort of your guests so they do not have to move inside the house. Without a doubt, it is a home designed to live and enjoy in a good neighborhood. Its careful details make it special, stonework and other improvements, it is ready to pack up and occupy it! Request visit.. . The sale price of the property in question does not include the notary fees, registration and taxes that may be derived from its sale. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: Charming La Higuera Canaria house close to nature and a few minutes from the center of the city of Telde and all the services you may need. This original home with its spaciousness, light and excellent views is ideal for having a great quality of life in a comfortable and welcoming way. **VIRTUAL TOUR AND PLANS AVAILABLE IN PROPERTY INFORMATION** The property is made up of three floors, a roof terrace plus a small side plot that serves to give access to part of the house and that can be used as a terrace. There is also the possibility of making a garage on the property On the main floor we have the entrance hall, living-dining room, gym, bedroom, dressing room, main room where the kitchen is located and the access stairs to the rest of the house, a complementary room to the kitchen with a pantry area and bathroom. We go down to floor -1 where we find a spacious living room and a small distributor hall that give access to the cozy and bright master bedroom, a double bedroom, a DIY room, a dressing room and a bathroom. From this floor we access externally to floor -2 where we find an old alprende that was formerly used as a country house with an outdoor bathroom and terrace. This entire floor needs to be reformed and thus have a cozy independent apartment. Above the main floor we have the roof terrace with a laundry room and a charming chill-out area where you can spend some pleasant moments in a relaxing environment enjoying beautiful views. For more information or to visit the property, do not hesitate to contact us, we will be happy to assist you. We can also offer you personalized and completely free advice on the financing you may need to buy the property and help you manage it. Energy certificate in process. Expenses and taxes derived from the sale are not included in the price. We can make you a detailed estimate of the purchase costs of this property.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Caserones - La Higuera, Telde
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Gc-80, 43

description: If we had to describe this house with a single word, it would undoubtedly be UNIQUE and we are going to explain why. This house is unique because it is part of the Rivero Building, protected according to the Architectural Heritage catalog for being the work of the famous rationalist architect Miguel Martín-Fernández De la Torre. The location could not be better.Ciudad Jardín in essence with all services just a few steps away. We also consider it unique due to its orientation, with windows facing three streets, which gives it incredible light throughout the day and views of the sea from several of its rooms.We also like that it is located on the second and top floor of the building It is unique for its original ceilings, 3 meters high, and for all those little details that they thought of when completely renovating it 6 years ago. The interior carpentry, solid white lacquered wood, is wonderful.It was made to measure respecting the original parts of the house to the millimeter.This includes the armored main access door to the house (because it has two entrances).Equally special are the high skirting boards and the warmth provided by the wooden floor. Another thing that makes it unique is the fact that it has a private elevator.Very few houses of this historical value and in this area have this tool that makes our day to day much more practical. And its distribution, of course.There are 171m2 of housing that include a super spacious and bright dining room.Its independent kitchen is modern and functional and is also equipped with the best materials and has a perfect terrace to have the first coffee of the day in the sun.The apartment has 4 rooms, two of which are very good-sized bedrooms, a custom-made office and a dressing room with an integrated full bathroom. The built-in wardrobes, used up to the ceiling, dressed and equipped in a super practical way are another of the many details that make it unique. In addition to the bathroom in the dressing room, which has its own shower tray, this apartment has 2 full bathrooms made with exquisite taste and the highest quality materials. And we left for last the part of the house that surprised us the most without a doubt.And it is that on the roof, the apartment has what we consider an oasis in the middle of the city.A 33m2 terrace with views of the sea that is the perfect space for meetings with friends, to rest reading a good book or for endless after-dinner family gatherings. This apartment is unique because it surprises, because it pinches you in the gut when you enter.And that, you who have been looking for a long time, know that it is very difficult to find. If from the photos and our description it seems wonderful to you, you have to visit it in person before it is too late. Information: Expenses and taxes not included.The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Ciudad Jardín, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria

description: Spacious apartment in the MESA Y LÓPEZ area; Mesa y López avenue connects with Plaza de América and Guanarteme, on the way to Las Canteras beach and a few meters from Las Alcaravaneras beach, with all the services within easy reach: health centers, pharmacies, shops of all kinds, markets and supermarkets, schools, bus and taxi stops, etc. , added to the new change process underway and the progressive restriction of road traffic in the urban center, further increases the value of this area. This unique property is located in an elegant building, within a neat and quiet community with only three neighbors per floor; The apartment has three bedrooms and two bathrooms, a very spacious living-dining room and a fully equipped kitchen; Of the three rooms, two are used as a bedroom and the third one, located after the kitchen, has been set up as a storage room - pantry; This room, having its own attached bathroom, could be used as a guest bedroom, for personal caretakers or household employees. In addition to the unbeatable location of this property, it is worth noting the luminosity and the absence of noise given by being located on the ninth floor, the quality of the reform carried out by the owner is also noteworthy, with a beautiful wooden floor that makes more welcoming this unique property. The property does not have a private parking space, but one can be rented in the same building. The owner contemplates the sale option in bare ownership as an option to value. The exposed data are merely indicative, they may be subject to any error or involuntary omission.

description: Beautiful and spacious semi-detached house located a few minutes walk from Triana. A fully renovated house with high quality finishes, with views of the entire city and the sea. This house faces two streets, having access to the garage through one and the main access through the other. It is divided as follows: -Ground floor: garage and storage, with a small room/bedroom on the mezzanine. -1st floor: Main entrance, with kitchen/dining room, a spacious and bright living room, a storage room and a toilet. -2nd floor: A master bedroom, a secondary bedroom and a room currently used as a dressing room. -Roof: It has two levels, the first level of the roof being completely covered, and the second diaphanous. It can be used as a family home or as an investment, since the lower part has its own water meter and the bedroom can be used as a loft. In addition, it has the possibility of opening a store or business in the garage. If you have any questions or are interested in making a visit, do not hesitate to contact our advisor David Najor, at the number.

description: That we love our job is no secret.Putting soul into the homes that we market is an effort that deserves much joy (but not worth it). Now, working on this property has been a blast! That unique character that it has has turned out to be the perfect base. From the outside you already perceive it with its perfectly preserved original façade and with that window… oh that window! And yes, what you see above is a wonderful rooftop but let's go step by step. When opening the doors, a charming hall already gives us a clue of what we are going to find inside.Original exposed stone walls, perfectly preserved hydraulic floors, high-quality materials, infinite ceilings and plenty of natural light. This, in addition to giving it personality, sets it apart from the vast majority of country houses. Once in the living-dining room you realize that the window is even more beautiful from the inside.With plenty of space, and that feeling of spaciousness that the staircase and the height of its ceilings give us, it is the perfect place to spend time with the family. The kitchen, fully equipped and with a pantry and utility room, is great for express breakfasts in the morning. On this floor we also find the first of its three bedrooms.Perfect as a main room or as a guest room and the truth is that we can add little to this space.We believe that the photos speak for themselves. Right in front is a very good size full bathroom with a huge shower tray. We begin to go up the wonderful solid wood staircase and on the mezzanine we find the second bedroom.Intimate, quiet and with those original floors… Perfect! We keep going up and we reach our favorite part.On the upper floor we find a multifunctional space that we have found ideal for the little ones in the house.Perfect for studying due to its natural light, and also for playing clearly! The attic part is ideal for resting.It also has another full bathroom. And yes, we have left the most special part of the house for last... A dream in the heart of the city come true.A large terrace to relax while sunbathing or enjoying a barbecue with the whole family. Can you imagine having all this a few meters from Triana with all the services at hand? If you also need a garage for your car, we give you the option of buying a space just 3 minutes from the house, in the emblematic Capitol building on Tomas Morales street. If, like us, you have fallen in love with this house, don't wait too long to discover it in person! Information: Expenses and taxes not included.The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

The properties are distributed between the ground floor, first and second floor. The storage rooms are located on the roof and the garages in the basement. They have in their 75 square meters a fitted kitchen, living room, 2 bedrooms and 1 full bathroom. Their prices range from €81,000, €82,000, €83,000 depending on the plant. description: Satori realty-services It offers you a great opportunity to create the house of your dreams, a Home Sweet Home! Las Mesas, one of the quietest areas of Las Palmas and on a plot of approximately more than 600 square meters we find this large house also has a small extra apartment on one side of the house under the garage (ideal for a large family or for investors) since it has a large terrace with a porch in the front and the barbecue area and pool in the back with a small extra plot to create a garden. The first floor is distributed in a spacious living room with kitchen and dining room with a complete bathroom of approximately 95m2. On the second floor, with an area of approximately 99m2, we find the rest area, with four original bedrooms, currently one of them converted into a room to watch TV with an office and a bathroom with a shower. On this floor we find the staircase that leads to the roof, it occupies the entire extension of the house, it is passable and with great views, undoubtedly being a relief area for the whole house. Taking into account that on the front of the house we have a porch to enjoy the outdoors, a garage that is currently used as a tool room and a workshop. The ideal of the house is that in the back with access from the living room we find an area to make stalls with a barbecue, a kitchen and a small toilet so that when you enjoy those barbecues you do not have to use the bathrooms in the house and thus get privacy. Large terrace, we go down about five steps and find the pool area and solarium. Next to the pool we have a bit of land (about 80m2) ideal for making a garden or an organic orchard. The house needs an update (renovation) although the electricity and plumbing are semi-new. The property has a 15,000 liter cistern. It has fiber optics. Magnificent opportunity to have a Chalet to your liking with impressive views and endless possibilities for both investors and to make a wonderful home. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary error or omission. Purchase-sale expenses and taxes not included in the sale price.

description: Beautiful and spacious semi-detached house located a few minutes walk from Triana. A fully renovated house with high quality finishes, with views of the entire city and the sea. This house faces two streets, having access to the garage through one and the main access through the other. It is divided as follows: -Ground floor: garage and storage, with a small room/bedroom on the mezzanine. -1st floor: Main entrance, with kitchen/dining room, a spacious and bright living room, a storage room and a toilet. -2nd floor: A master bedroom, a secondary bedroom and a room currently used as a dressing room. -Roof: It has two levels, the first level of the roof being completely covered, and the second diaphanous. It can be used as a family home or as an investment, since the lower part has its own water meter and the bedroom can be used as a loft. In addition, it has the possibility of opening a store or business in the garage. description: Sunny flat in San Telmo with Sea View Engel&Völkers presents this spacious flat with terrace and bird's eye views over the San Telmo Park and the sea. Located in the city center of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, only a minute's walk from the famous pedestrian area Triana, this flat offers you all the amenities of everyday life in the immediate vicinity. For example, a wide range of shops, countless bars and restaurants, doctors' surgeries and public transport.  The flat, situated on the sixth floor, welcomes you in a spacious living room with a large terrace from where you can enjoy a wonderful view over the city, the San Telmo Park and the sea. From here there is access to a fantastic kitchen with dining area, which has a utility room with fitted wardrobes, laundry room and its own bathroom with shower.  At the rear of the flat, with afternoon sun, there are two large bedrooms sharing a bathroom. The third and master bedroom offers special tranquility and privacy with an en suite bathroom. An ideal possibility for families who prefer to live in the city center, enjoying the ocean and all the services around from the tranquility of their home. Location Located in the heart of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, the property is right next to the Calle Mayor de Triana, one of the most central and important streets, where much of the social and economic life of the city takes place. All amenities are close by including restaurants, supermarkets, boutiques and shops.  The bus and taxi station and the San Telmo park are in front of the flat and it has express connections to the main destinations on the island. The building has direct access to the cycle lanes which will take you to Las Canteras beach or Santa Catalina Park in no time. Furthermore, it is located next to the old town, just a few minutes away from the Cathedral of Santa Ana, the Island Library and the Monopol Shopping Centre.

description: VILLA WITH WONDERFUL VIEWS FOR SALE If you see yourself living in an idyllic area, with magnificent views of the sea, this is the house you are looking for. The house is located in La Playa del Hombre, just a 5-minute walk away. It is an independent villa, which consists of 410 real square meters (counting the terraces), in which we find the upper floor, which consists of a living room-kitchen-dining room, an open space, where you can enjoy the spaciousness and large windows that generate splendid natural light, three bedrooms and two bathrooms. As well as a terrace with views and a large patio. On the ground floor we have an independent apartment with a terrace, kitchen, living room, bathroom and a bedroom. This small apartment can be used as an investment to rent, or simply to enjoy an independent space for someone in the family unit who wants it. In the highest part of the chalet, we find a large terrace that is the jewel of the property, to enjoy leisure and with a room to convert into whatever you need. With views of the beautiful Playa del Hombre, which you can access directly by comfortable stairs. The house has a large garage for one car. Close to shopping centers a short drive away, such as Alcampo, Las Terrazas Shopping Center and El Mirador Shopping Center. Do not hesitate and contact me to see it, you will fall in love instantly. description: Beautiful house-cabin with an innovative and surprising design. In it you will find a room that becomes a bedroom at the press of a button, thanks to a bed that comes out of the wall. In addition, it has a cozy kitchen that is integrated into the living room for greater comfort. The house-cabin has beautiful designer furniture, which makes it a unique place with its own style. It also has a pantry, so you can store your food in a comfortable and organized way. The bathroom, although practical, is still elegant and functional. One of the jewels of this cabin is its large terrace, with more than 70 square meters, where you can enjoy the sun and the good weather of Gran Canaria, or simply relax in its tranquility. It also has an area to park the car that can also be used as a barbecue area, perfect for celebrating with friends and family. Additionally, this property includes another smaller cabin that is currently used for storage, but could be converted into a game room or guest space. If you are looking for a unique house-cabin, with design, comfort and tranquility in an incomparable natural environment, this is your opportunity. Come meet her in person and fall in love with her!

description: Residencial Las Américas is a new-build housing development located near the Plaza América roundabout, which is part of the new urban plan for the expansion of Mesa y López. This spectacular building consists of a total of 472 homes distributed in 4 blocks, overlooking Calle Mario César, Mesa y López, the central square of the building or the pedestrian area, 428 parking spaces and 370 storage rooms. As well as lifts and access for people with reduced mobility. Two floors of the building will be used for offices. In the residential area there is a large central square with access to the supermarket of a well-known Canarian chain, Hiperdino. In addition, the project has a sustainability study, selection of quality materials and pre-installation of the latest technologies for the home. The RLA development is located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, in the privileged area of Guanarteme, next to Playa de las Canteras and Las Arenas Shopping Center, and very close to the Mesa y López shopping area. description: Impressive Villa!  Wonderful views of the City of Las Palmas de G. C! The location of the house in the upper part of the city and with the best views of it, we are this wonderful distributed on two floors plus the garage. In the first main floor we find a wonderful living room with some windows that allow us to see the port and have an eagle eye view of the city. The dining room shares space with this lounge for family meals. The kitchen is independent and has a daily dining room to enjoy the company of the family while preparing a healthy meal. The kitchen has access to a great terrace where you can enjoy the barbecue that is located there.  When we go up the wooden staircase, which is made of very good quality wood, we find the bedrooms. The 4 bedrooms will make life easier for those large families who want to enjoy privacy. The master bedroom has its own dressing room and bathroom. Here you will find the other 3 bedrooms and 3 more bathrooms. The bedrooms are cozy and have windows to the outside.  On the street you will find the garage where 2 cars are parked; the other part is a great guest apartment with its own bathroom and ready to receive your friends or family in a private but familiar atmosphere at the same time. Living in the heart of the city with the comfort of an independent house. It has all the services nearby, supermarkets, schools, theatres, and endless opportunities for your leisure time. description: Residencial Las Américas is a new-build housing development located near the Plaza América roundabout, which is part of the new urban plan for the expansion of Mesa y López. Its privileged location allows quick and easy access to the ring road, heading to any area of the island. This spectacular building consists of a total of 472 homes distributed in 4 blocks, overlooking Calle Mario César, Mesa y López, the central square of the building or the pedestrian area, 428 parking spaces and 370 storage rooms. As well as lifts and access for people with reduced mobility. Two floors of the building will be used for offices. In the residential area there is a large central square with access to the supermarket of a well-known Canarian chain, Hiperdino. In addition, the project has a sustainability study, selection of quality materials and pre-installation of the latest technologies for the home. The RLA development is located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, in the privileged area of Guanarteme, next to Playa de las Canteras and Las Arenas Shopping Center, and very close to the Mesa y López shopping area. It is an area widely equipped with a variety of services and leisure activities where you can enjoy the advantages of living in a central area without giving up the benefits of being close to the beach.

description: Spectacular promotion of two semi-detached houses in Taliarte, one of the fastest growing areas of Gran Canaria. The houses are close to the beach and with a situation that allows access to other parts of the island very easily. They stand out for their architecture and modern design such as the combination of various high-quality materials, large windows and open spaces. Housing Type A: The plot has 250 m2 with a constructed area of 125m2. It is distributed on two floors: The ground floor has a toilet, living-dining room and a fabulous open kitchen designed in white with a clearly contemporary style. In addition, it includes a central island with a breakfast bar, and enjoys views of the garden and pool thanks to the doors and floor-to-ceiling windows. The upper floor has two bathrooms and two bedrooms, one of them a suite fully integrated into the space that mixes functionality, aesthetics and comfort. The house was designed giving importance to the integration of interior and exterior spaces, creating floor-to-ceiling windows and doors that also allow a lot of natural light to enter. The house has parking for two vehicles. Do not hesitate to visit it, it will surprise you!

description: ARUCAS, NEW WORK FINISHED, LAST HOMES FOR SALE! La Fuentecilla is a residential development of single-family semi-detached houses. It is located in a privileged environment with open views of the mountains and green farming areas, close to the center of Arucas and 700 meters from the ring road. An excellent location to commute to work, schools or shopping, while enjoying the quality of life that a place like this offers you. With functional architecture and designed for family life, the interior space is developed through its main floor with direct access to the living room with terrace, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom and backyard. The staircase is fully integrated with a steel railing and safety glass, clear, bright and modern materials that combine with any decorative style. On the upper floor, a small distributor gives access to the master bedroom with private bathroom and dressing room, the rest of the bedrooms and another bathroom complete this level. What do we imagine for an attic? The perfect and private space to reserve a reading area, study or games room, and the terrace will become the best solarium to enjoy the good weather and sunny days. In the area there is easy parking, but having a garage for two cars and a storage room is the greatest of comforts, and with direct access from your home. Just 15 minutes from Las Palmas, who has not ever thought of living outside the city? Request information and visit. Type V21 Taxes, notary fees and registration not included in the price.

description: Housing in profitability Sold with lease until 06/06/2024, renting 296€ per month. It has a total built area extending to approximately 71 s. q. m. and it is distributed internally in living-dining room, kitchen, three bedrooms, a bathroom and terrace. The interior condition is unknown, it cannot be visited. Year of cosntruction: 1960 Additional information can be found within the legal section. Make your offer and we will forward it to the vendor. This offer will not be binding until its acceptance and formal presentation. You will find more information in the Terms and Conditions. The property is located in the center of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Las Palmas is the capital of Gran Canaria, one of the islands that make up the Spanish archipelago of the Canary Islands, off the northwest coast of Africa. The city is a major cruise port and is known for its duty-free shopping areas and sandy beaches. In its surroundings we find all kinds of services, stores, supermarkets, restaurants, schools, parks, sport centers, etc. Excellent communication by CG-1 and CG-2 only 100 m from Alcaravaneras Beach. description: Be sure to SEE the VIDEO-VISIT REWORK SELLS this spectacular Canarian house in the historic center of Arucas. In this corner location, on the main street León y Castillo, stands this beautiful house full of light, of 216 m2, a large and spacious living room with a large adjoining office, 3 bedrooms, kitchen, 2 bathrooms and a toilet, 2 storage rooms and two roof terraces at different levels. It is worth highlighting the beauty and luminosity of its stairwell and the wooden structures of the floors and floors that rest on thick load-bearing walls, which make up an example of typical Canarian architecture of the time. The house is distributed in 3 heights. On the ground floor or access from the street there is a huge hall and stairwell, a bathroom and a storage room. Before reaching the first floor, we find another storage room on the mezzanine. Upon reaching the first floor, a spacious and bright living room adjoins another smaller room in the corner, which serves as a small living room or office.. . A bedroom, the kitchen and the bathroom of this floor complete the distribution before going up to the last floor where two more bedrooms and another bathroom are located. From here you go out to two terraces totaling about 115 m2, on different levels and connected by stairs. Without a doubt a special property, in a special place. It is sold together with a parking space located in another building, about 450 meters away. Contact through the page or Information: Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data are merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: Cozy 210 m2 terraced house in the San Francisco Javier area, Arucas. The property has three floors, which are divided as follows: On the ground floor there is a garage with capacity for 4 cars and a bathroom. On the first floor we find a wonderful terrace, a living room, 3 large bedrooms with air conditioning and heat pump, fitted kitchen, bathroom and access to the lovely patio on the 2nd floor, where we can enjoy a large walkable roof with laundry room and wooden veranda. Furthermore, there is a second roof terrace with stunning views. Come for your visit without commitment; You will love it! LOCATION: Arucas is a small town in the countryside with a beautiful cathedral and a famous rum factory. The place is located northwest of Las Palmas, the capital of Gran Canaria which is reached by car in about 15 minutes. The sea and the beach of El Puertillo áre on 5 to 10 minutes distance. The airport can be reached in about 30 minutes, the beaches of Playa del Inglés and Maspalomas, the tourist center in the south of the island, in about 45 minutes. The Association ACEGI – BOICAN (Canarian Real Estate Stock Market) Our agency is member of the Canarian Association of Real Estate Agencies (ACEGI) and meets the highest standards of transparency and honesty. We also take advantage of the member’s collaboration network, offering properties of more than 100 canarian agencies, 15 of which are located in the south of Gran Canaria.

description: Great property of 3,000 m2 in Moya (Gran Canaria). The property is guarded by a beautiful 32-year-old Drago.In this is an ancient construction from the year 1900 on which a certificate of stability of the construction was carried out and it was completely rehabilitated. Currently, the main house is divided into two and is used as a holiday home with an occupation practically all year round.It has an authorized license. Great swimming pool with hydromassage to cool off and relax every day of the year as it is heated. Wonderful barbecue area and wood oven where you can meet and celebrate events. Each house has a private and independent barbecue. All the land is in llano and completely fenced. The whole property is in a perfect state of conservation and has drip irrigation that is fed by a pond (it is roofed to avoid falls and dangers) and two cisterns prepared to collect rainwater, it has submersible pumps to extract the water NO DETAIL IS MISSING! The farm currently has a wide variety of fruit trees such as: apple, guava, orange, avocado, mango, pomegranate, membrillo, peach, apricot, pear, membrillo, fig, olive, lime, lemon, banana, almond, kiwi , plums, morals, tomatoes, vines. It has a large parking area. "Residencial Acebuche" is made up of exterior and interior dwellings and is distributed in: •Ground floor: business premises. •1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floor: 14 apartments per floor (1 with 2 bedrooms and 11 with 3 bedrooms). •Basement floor -1 and -2: garages and storage rooms. Six houses on the first floor have the private use (common area) of a patio/terrace ranging from 40 to 51 m2. The price of each house includes a garage and a storage room. The houses have a fitted kitchen, fitted wardrobes, pre-installation of air conditioning, etc. The works are scheduled to start in the first quarter of 2023, and its delivery is scheduled for the first/second quarter of 2025 (approximately 24 months from the start of the work). description: PRICE REDUCED OPPORTUNITY! Two-story house for sale with roof terrace and garage for two cars, very bright, completely exterior, has a terrace with barbecue, its own playground, and land with fruit trees, very close to the center of Teror, which you can walk to. The house consists of two floors with 215 meters built plus the garage of about 45 square meters, totally exterior, very bright and with wonderful panoramic views, in Villa Mariana de Teror, near the Basilica of Nuestra Señora del Pino, and with All services such as: schools, supermarkets, cafeterias, restaurants, pharmacy, health center, bus stop.. . Idyllic location to enjoy nature and tranquility where you can listen to the birds singing. It has two accesses to the property, the main one through the access area to the garage with room for 2 vehicles, where there is also a storage room inside it and its stairs to reach the house, and a small piece of land, and the second access to the left of the property as a pedestrian area. Accessing the house we have right access from the house to the barbecue area and garden with fruit trees, and it has a door to enter the ground floor where we find a toilet, at the central door of the property we access a spacious entrance hall, independent kitchen furnished with a dining area, pantry, a large living room and rear exit of the house where there is a small court where you can practice basketball and soccer, fully fenced and a huge storage room or where you can put your small DIY workshop. On the upper floor we find 2 double bedrooms, 2 simple but spacious bedrooms, a living room with a stove, and 2 bathrooms, one of them renovated. On the roof there is a washing area and the water drums that supply the property, we can also appreciate wonderful panoramic views of the valley and towards the Villa de Teror. The house of your dreams awaits you almost in the center of Teror. description: House terrera of 2 plants with ground of 2.300 m2, ready to live and enjoy it in the countryside and just minutes from the town. Ground floor: Consists of spacious spaces where the living room, kitchen, a bathroom and two bedrooms. First floor: There is a small hall with fireplace, the master bedroom with parquet floor and the other 4 bedrooms plus a full bathroom. The passable roof has almost 90 m2 and is fully roofed. It also has a large terrace with wood oven conditioned to enjoy pleasant evenings with family and friends with beautiful mountain views. The property is located in Teror near the area of "La Guanchia", (very close to the Osorio estate) less than 100 meters from the bus stop. It was renovated in 2002 and is distinguished by details such as the wood of tea on the ceilings, the original stone on the walls and the distribution of the spaces that make it even more welcoming. As additional information it is important to note that the car reaches about 50 m2 of the house and it is expected that in a short time the beautification of the road will be carried out by the city council. Energy certification is in process. The information given is merely indicative and subject to unintentional errors or omissions. Teror, also called Villa Mariana de Teror is a municipality in the north of the island of Gran Canaria. It is known above all because in it is venerated the image of the Virgen del Pino, patroness of the Diocese of the Canary Islands (which includes the province of Las Palmas). It occupies a territory of 25.8 square kilometers, of which 3.5 square kilometers (14% of the municipality) has maximum territorial protection with two natural enclaves of special importance in the island, such as the Rural Park of Doramas Of Osorio) and the protected Landscape of Pino Santo. Teror is the fourth smallest municipality in surface and is considered one of the most beautiful of the island.

description: CHANCE! Two-story house for sale 10 meters from the San Cristóbal Beach with views of the sea, from where you can enjoy the beautiful sunrises since its orientation is to the East, go for a walk along its avenue, eat in its many restaurants or bathe on the beach. The house has two floors: the ground floor has been completely renovated in the absence of some details, and the second floor is halfway through the renovations, where it also has a 60-meter terrace from where you can see the sea. The ground floor has 160 square meters distributed as follows: a spacious entrance hall, a dining room that next to it has a large room where you can make a garage if you wish, three large bedrooms, a fully furnished kitchen with all electrical appliances. , a dining room, and two large bathrooms, and on the upper floor with 98 square meters built it has several rooms that have yet to be finished to your liking, plus the 60-square-meter terrace. A few meters away there is an esplanade with public parking, and very close to all services such as: sports center with swimming pools, Rarrefour and Mercadona supermarkets, pharmacies, schools, bus stops, etc. If you want to live by the sea in a neighborhood as emblematic as San Cristóbal and five minutes from the city center, do not miss the opportunity and come visit it, it will surely be the house of your dreams. The expenses derived from the sale are not included in the price and the exposed data is merely informative subject to errors or involuntary omissions.

The advantages of this beautiful property apart from the fact that it has a high profitability as a vacation rental, its location is also unbeatable a few meters from Playa del hombre and also its particular and unique design that is inspired by a ship, it has a diversity of marble floors, wood, hand-carved stoneware.Each of its spaces are made and designed exclusively and taking care of the smallest detail. description: SPECTACULAR HOUSE IN VEGUETA, LAS PALMAS. HZ Inmobiliarias offers a spectacular house for sale in Vegueta, on Pedro Díaz Street, next to the Santo Domingo Church in the capital of Gran Canaria. This unique property has four floors and 275 m2 built, in which five independent houses are distributed, each with its kitchen and bathroom. In total, the house has seven bedrooms, five full bathrooms and five fully equipped kitchens, plus a patio and three terraces. For plants, we are on the ground floor, at the entrance, with a nice covered patio and two bright and spacious apartments with one bedroom, kitchen and bathroom each. Occupying the entire first floor, we have a magnificent house with three bedrooms, large living room, kitchen and bathroom. In the second, two other apartments, each enjoying, privately, a beautiful terrace, as well as room, kitchen and bathroom. Finally, the third floor has a splendid terrace overlooking the Cathedral of Santa Ana, which can be accessed by all the homes of the property. With a predominantly classic and elegant decoration, with ceilings and noble wood furniture, the house offers its guests, apart from the category of its facilities, an unbeatable location, in the historic center of Vegueta, to enjoy its historic buildings and Colonial houses, museums and an important gastronomic offer and nightlife. The property, ideal for investors, has a vacation home license and currently offers a high economic return thanks to the vacation rental of all its apartments, very well valued on the internet. Call us to visit without obligation, we will be happy to assist you. Additional information: expenses and sales taxes not included in the price. The exposed data are merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

The finishes are of a superior quality. The apartment has a security door and has new electrical installation and plumbing throughout the apartment. The building has a pool with a lifeguard, community fees are €40 per month, 24-hour video surveillance, concierge service from 9am-9pm, the building has changed the electrical and plumbing installation, so there are no pending spills. Perfect for a young couple or use in summer periods or make a profit with a tourist rental.

description: Do you like to live in a quiet place? This is the property you are looking for! We present this wonderful property located in the Ciudad del Campo area. A unique opportunity given its good state of conservation and its characteristics. A place away from the noise and bustle but just a few minutes from all services. It consists of 2 floors, a fairly large garage and 2 terraces. When we access the property we find a small room as a chill out area for those moments of relaxation and to enjoy the tranquility that the place gives us since this property is located at the end of the urbanization and on its right side we have a stone cliff that will give us that point of privacy. On the first floor we find a large living room that will delight anyone who lives in this property, due to its spaciousness, light and views, since we can go directly to the front terrace of the house. On the same floor we have a fully furnished kitchen with access to a rear terrace where a laundry room is also located. On the same floor we also have a bathroom equipped with a shower tray and a window to facilitate ventilation. On this same floor there is a side terrace that can delight the little ones since it has a large surface area. On the second floor you will find the 3 bedrooms, all with natural ventilation and very bright, as well as a spacious bathroom with a shower and Jacuzzi, a luxury to be able to disconnect from those days of hard work. The main room has direct access to the bathroom. The garage with capacity for two large cars also with a small bathroom that gives us comfort. Do not stop being able to enjoy a property that gives you tranquility, comfort and above all quality of life and you love open spaces.

description: Country house with land and fruit trees in Camino del Laurel, Moya Sometimes we are lucky enough to be able to present you a property that makes us feel really happy, because we are sure that we are proposing something really beautiful, a property that combines its own beauty with that of an incomparable natural environment, we could almost say paradisiacal. Surely you have already heard of the Camino del Laurel, a natural space that begins passing the town of Moya, and which houses the Los Tilos de Moya Nature Reserve and its Interpretation Center, one of the last vestiges remaining in the planet of the ancient laurel forests. Along the Camino, along with the beautiful natural landscapes, we find the best examples of the traditional use and coexistence of the Canarian peasant with his land, with small farms perfectly integrated into the territory, and which have decisively contributed to conservation. of this unique natural space. And it is here, precisely, in the upper part of the Camino del Laurel, already close to Fontanales, where we want to invite you to discover this beautiful property, which, as the photos and video that accompany this announcement attest, is in an unbeatable condition, very Cared for and decorated with exquisite taste. The property as a whole occupies an area of approximately 1,200 m², of which the constructed area is approximately 100 m², while the arable part occupies approximately 600 m², the rest being arrifes. The dwelling itself is partly a cave and partly added construction.It consists of two large bedrooms, large living room, kitchen and bathroom.Two large skylights bring in lots of natural light.Outside, a large patio invites you to spend long after-dinner meals in the open air, under the refreshing shade of the vine, while juicy grilled meats are roasted on the barbecue with local firewood.Perhaps you even have some loaves at that moment, or perhaps a little pig's foot, roasting in your wood-fired oven. On the house, a passable roof houses some lines where you can hang clothes or simply sit for a while to enjoy the beautiful views while the chirping of birds brings to our spirit the sensation of tranquility and well-being that only contact with nature Can give us. The lower part of the house houses another cave, which is currently used as a store for tools and equipment typical of agriculture, but which, if desired, can be converted into a covered garage, or even more rooms for the house.In front of this cave we have a garage where you can leave the car outdoors but inside the property. In front of the house we find the arable land, which occupies about 600 m² and is completely flat.It has a good number of fruit trees, among which oranges, lemons, tangerines, kiwis, plums, blackberries, pears, apples, peaches, grapes, kaki and avocado stand out, as well as space to plant potatoes, corn, carrots... or whatever. that you want. To give all these crops a drink, we have a cistern and a small pond that in total accumulate almost 90,000 liters of water that is collected from the rain, although in the unlikely event that it runs out, water can be bought from the estate. Information: The sale price does not include transfer taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer according to law. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: COZY VILLA IN MIRAFLOR - TEROR With beautiful views of Villa de Teror and 15 minutes from the island's capital, we can enjoy this beautiful property built to enjoy family life and in perfect condition. It is located on a 280 m2 plot, with a covered garage for two vehicles and a large terrace. On the first floor of approximately 100 m2 there is a bright kitchen-dining room with access to a complete laundry room with a storage area. On the other side of the floor there is a spacious living room with a fireplace and then a living room for the use that best suits your needs. For greater comfort we have a full bathroom on this first floor. On the upper floor, of the same surface, the three bedrooms are located, two of them have a closed balcony. The master bedroom, apart from the balcony, has a large dressing room and a spacious bathroom. On the landing of this upper floor we find another of the bathrooms of the house. On the top floor, of approximately 70 m2, we can enjoy a cozy attic that is currently fitted out as an office, has a storage area and a bright room where you can enjoy the views through a large window. For more information, do not hesitate to contact us. We will help you with the financing arrangements, if necessary. description: This spectacular home located in one of the most privileged areas of the city of Teror and with the best views of the island. It is found with a distribution divided into four floors, and in which the parking area is distributed on its lowest floor, a capacity to accommodate up to 4 cars, as well as a bedroom, a toilet and a machine area. A very wide staircase will take us through the tour of the house. On the next floor, we find its hall, 1 toilet for visitors, the living-dining room, large kitchen and its pantry, as well as an office area and a balcony with the best views of the city. On the other floor, which is the rest area where we find the 4 bedrooms and two full bathrooms, the living room to watch TV or listen to music and also another spectacular balcony with views that we should not envy anywhere else in the world. And on its top floor, a loft area, a place where the imagination will be placed by its future owners. And if that were not enough, its garden area where you can enjoy its trees and flowers, there is also more room for you to create a place where your paradise is made. You have a series of nearby services such as supermarkets, banks, etc, everything you need without much need to take the car.

description: From 1 to 10, how important is it to feel happy in the place we arrive after a long day? This house has dazzled us... , but it is normal, working in it has allowed us to enjoy it at different times of the day and it is difficult to choose which is better, the tranquility of the morning, the peace of noon or the silence of the afternoon … It may be a cliché, but it is a perfect space to start a family and fill it with wonderful memories, the kind that even with the passage of time always make us smile when we remember them. The ground floor of the house is ideal for family life and large celebrations, its large dining room and its views of the garden make you fall in love, there is also a full bathroom designed to make life easier without having to go upstairs. The kitchen is very spacious and perfectly arranged to add imagination to the craziest recipes, and in terms of storage space.. . there is plenty, the pantry will make organizing the kitchen very practical and easy. On the top floor we enter the rest and most comfortable area of the house. The three rooms are perfectly separated by a living room, preceded by the fireplace and its smell of firewood, ideal to sit down after a long day of work and read a book, watch your favorite movie or simply enjoy the silence that reigns in the room. zone. The main room, overlooking the garden, is very cozy and comfortable and has its own bathroom en suite. The other two rooms are.. . each one more magical, one because of its wooden beams on the ceiling and that light.. . and the other, with its sloping ceiling that creates that feeling of being in a tree house, in the refuge that everyone we wanted to have when we were little. And if you have to talk about a tree.. . WONDERFUL, is the word that defines the majestic tree that reigns in the garden... , at its feet an incredible space to organize stalls or to enjoy the hours of sun.. . In a garden like this, the seasons of the year are lived in a totally different way. As for the location, Tafira is a refuge from day to day, it is a perfect retreat for resting away from the bustle of the city but very close to it. We are clear about our answer, and you? Information: Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: It has never been so easy to have your business in 208 square meters, 104 of warehouse in the basement and another 104 on the ground floor, your brand new home on the first floor and an incredible roof terrace where you can set up your chillout with spectacular views. In the endearing and familiar neighborhood of Santidad we present this magnificent home. As soon as you enter you will see that the owners have put a lot of love into the construction. In the house you will see immaculate walls, with moldings on the high ceilings like old houses, a beautiful ceramic floor placed with care, windows and doors without use.. . In short, you will be able to find a house in perfect condition ready for your needs. Three spacious and well distributed bedrooms, a kitchen next to the living room that opens onto a patio with great light from the roof terrace. And best of all, it was built little by little, and finally the house was refurbished without anyone having enjoyed it. If we keep going up, you will find a rooftop where you can have many relaxing moments with your family and friends, and wherever you look the views will captivate you. You can put a barbecue, a chillout area or even your own solarium with a shower to cool off. Once I have told you everything related to the family and rest area, I am going to tell you that on the ground floor you have a huge garage that you can use both to set up your business, to complete the needs of your home or simply to store numerous vehicles. And if we go down one floor we reach the basement that has natural ventilation, being able to use it as a warehouse or set up your own gym if that is what you like. As you can see in these 273 square meters you have multiple options and possibilities. Come and see it and you will be surprised, surely you are already imagining everything you can do! Wait, I just have to tell you that in a few minutes you will be at the exit to the ring road to Las Palmas along the North road and that you are one step away from the town of Arucas. I'll wait for you.. . If you need it, we can help you with all the mortgage management. The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.

This Property may be from a collaborating Real Estate Agency of the ACEGI / Bolsa Boican Association in which  all kinds of properties are shared throughout the area  Gran Canaria. If you do not find the property you are looking for on our website:  We can offer you more properties that are currently not published, do not hesitate to consult. Gran Canaria is one of the islands of the Spanish autonomous community of the Canary Islands, off northwest Africa. It is known for its white sand and black lava beaches. To the south, the bustling beaches of El Inglés and Puerto Rico stand out, as well as the quieter beaches of Puerto de Mogán and San Agustín. To the north, the capital city of Las Palmas is a main stop for cruise ships and a duty-free shopping area. The interior of the island is rural and mountainous. description: It is known as "Little Monaco" and it is for a reason. Taliarte is the fashionable area of the island. In full expansion, it stands out for its modern architecture, its proximity to the beach and its easy access. In this very exclusive area, all the houses follow the same line and take maximum care of aesthetics, creating a super cool neighborhood to live in peace and perfect for families with children who still enjoy a bike ride or playing ball with imaginary goals. Focusing on the house, it is a modern house with high quality finishes. Functionality and aesthetics go hand in hand. This beautiful house is designed for a family that enjoys family time. Its rear garden is ideal for sunbathing and the front porch is perfect for receiving family and friends. When we open the door we find a super cozy open space full of natural light. Its kitchen, fully equipped with high quality materials, is modern and functional and connects perfectly with the living room area and the front porch. Opening that door and letting the breeze run while some cook and others set the table is wonderful. How important it is to feel comfortable in the areas of the house where we spend the most time each day. Continuing with the first floor we find the main room, with total privacy, the dressing room and a bathroom. They are all exterior and have beautiful natural light. Everything in this house is designed to make life more comfortable. If we go up the stairs, with a huge window, we are greeted by a large hall that connects two very good-sized rooms and a full bathroom. This floor is perfect for the little ones in the house since we could consider it as their "independent area". They also have two terraces: a front terrace to which both rooms have access and another huge terrace, the rear facing the garden, ideal for playing and spending time with friends. If there is something that we fall in love with, it is the area of outdoor space that surrounds the entire house. It is perfect for pets, children and not so children to enjoy the outdoor space in complete safety. The plot also has parking space for two cars. It's nice to be quietly at home or on the terrace and not hear the noise of traffic or the hustle and bustle of the city. Do you want to prove it? If I were you, I wouldn't think about it much.. . description: Country house with land and fruit trees in Camino del Laurel, Moya Sometimes we are lucky enough to be able to present you a property that makes us feel really happy, because we are sure that we are proposing something really beautiful, a property that combines its own beauty with that of an incomparable natural environment, we could almost say paradisiacal. Surely you have already heard of the Camino del Laurel, a natural space that begins passing the town of Moya, and which houses the Los Tilos de Moya Nature Reserve and its Interpretation Center, one of the last vestiges remaining in the planet of the ancient laurel forests. Along the Camino, along with the beautiful natural landscapes, we find the best examples of the traditional use and coexistence of the Canarian peasant with his land, with small farms perfectly integrated into the territory, and which have decisively contributed to conservation. of this unique natural space. And it is here, precisely, in the upper part of the Camino del Laurel, already close to Fontanales, where we want to invite you to discover this beautiful property, which, as the photos and video that accompany this announcement attest, is in an unbeatable condition, very Cared for and decorated with exquisite taste. The property as a whole occupies an area of approximately 1,200 m², of which the constructed area is approximately 100 m², while the arable part occupies approximately 600 m², the rest being arrifes. The dwelling itself is partly a cave and partly added construction.It consists of two large bedrooms, large living room, kitchen and bathroom.Two large skylights bring in lots of natural light.Outside, a large patio invites you to spend long after-dinner meals in the open air, under the refreshing shade of the vine, while juicy grilled meats are roasted on the barbecue with local firewood.Perhaps you even have some loaves at that moment, or perhaps a little pig's foot, roasting in your wood-fired oven. On the house, a passable roof houses some lines where you can hang clothes or simply sit for a while to enjoy the beautiful views while the chirping of birds brings to our spirit the sensation of tranquility and well-being that only contact with nature Can give us. The lower part of the house houses another cave, which is currently used as a store for tools and equipment typical of agriculture, but which, if desired, can be converted into a covered garage, or even more rooms for the house.In front of this cave we have a garage where you can leave the car outdoors but inside the property. In front of the house we find the arable land, which occupies about 600 m² and is completely flat.It has a good number of fruit trees, among which oranges, lemons, tangerines, kiwis, plums, blackberries, pears, apples, peaches, grapes, kaki and avocado stand out, as well as space to plant potatoes, corn, carrots... or whatever. that you want. To give all these crops a drink, we have a cistern and a small pond that in total accumulate almost 90,000 liters of water that is collected from the rain, although in the unlikely event that it runs out, water can be bought from the estate. Information: The sale price does not include transfer taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer according to law. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Moya
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino del laurel no number

description: According to the dictionary, luxury is the display of wealth. And it is that it is such a subjective concept that it can refer to Carrara marble or to the fact of bringing your whole family together under the same roof and with all the comforts. And yes, with this house we are heading for the second option. The small details that make the difference. We are sure that in this description you will find a few: This house is made up of 4 floors: - The ground floor is a huge garage with a workshop area and a double height that does the work of a storage room. Up to 5 well-placed cars fit and it has a pit. - The first floor has a kitchen with an office, a giant living room and two bedrooms. One of them is the main one, which is huge, and another that is perfect as a dressing room or as a single room. The bathroom, of a very good size, has a perfect hydromassage bathtub to end the day. - The second floor will be the favorite of the youngest in the house with its play area, its study area full of natural light and 3 perfect rooms to avoid fights and receive friends at home. It also has two complete bathrooms with a shower tray. - The roof is great because it is super well used. Solarium area, living area, dining area, a small office and the laundry and storage area. The 4 floors are connected by a comfortable staircase and by a perfect forklift to carry the purchase, to lower junk to the garage or to carry the baby carriage if you dare to expand the family. And yes, also to climb when you arrive exhausted after a long day of work. The house is planned for single-family use and is perfect for a large family that wants privacy and spaciousness without sacrificing a central location with all services within walking distance (supermarket, doctor, schools,... ) However, it is also perfect if you are looking to live close to a family member and separate each floor to use it separately enjoying common areas such as the garage and the roof terrace together. It would only take a kitchen on the second floor and that's it! That is why it is also a very good investment. You can live on one floor and rent the other. Or rent both and make the most of your money! The real luxury is coming to know it and experience it in person. Don't be late! Information: Expenses and taxes not included. The exposed data is merely indicative and may be subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

First floor: A completely renovated house, with a comfortable living room, kitchen and a small toilet, all with direct access to the jewel in the crown, which is the wonderful terrace and its views.
