description: The RAE has published 18 definitions of FREE.At Youhome we want to accompany you to the rhythm of a song, to explain the feeling of freedom that you will have in your future home. "He is almost 20 years old and he is already tired of dreaming..." Just 5 minutes from the "Alisios" shopping center and 14 minutes from the city center we find this beautiful modern-style house, in SAN JOSÉ DEL ÁLAMO, known for its natural environment, tranquility and impressive views of the mountains and the city.Tell me you didn't dream about this? "...something you can never stop..." When we open the front door we find a large terrace, a large garage and a storage area. The first floor is wonderful, upon entering you find 2 spacious and bright rooms. Next, a modern full bathroom, a comfortable and functional dressing room, and a fully equipped kitchen, the dream of every lover of this room. At the bottom of this floor we find a huge living room with access to a terrace that enjoys complete privacy.Here you can enjoy family games, barbecues with friends, blanket evenings, movies and a fireplace...You can honestly do whatever you like. "...I walk endlessly..." The second floor has 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and living room-kitchen in a modern and open concept. The living room has large windows with views of the city, which allow us to make this room very bright throughout the day.The kitchen is integrated into the living room giving that modern and cozy touch. One of the rooms is ideal as a work or study area. The other two rooms, almost twins, spacious and bright, separated by the bathroom, where you can choose between a quick shower or a relaxing bath in its hydromassage bathtub. "...behind the truth." Behind the kitchen door, "the icing on the cake", the terrace with mountain views.Can you imagine having the first coffee of the day enjoying the noise of the birds? Sunbathing in your own home, reading afternoons and why not? put on a relaxing jacuzzi. "And I will finally know what freedom is" This house is the perfect place to feel free, since you will be able to live in a natural and quiet environment, without stress or noise, without having to give up the comforts of modern life and proximity to the city. From the Youhome team we will be delighted to receive you with complete freedom so that you have the possibility of visiting this wonderful house. description: Tafira Gardens is an exclusive residential project of 34 independent chalets with gardens and terraces. New construction chalets in a privileged environment, where you can live away from the hustle and bustle of the city, enjoying the landscapes and nature, very well located and connected to the island's main communication routes. Bordering to the west with the Protected Landscape of Pino Santo, the residential development is located in an ideal environment to lead a quiet life, in which to have direct contact with nature, away from noise, without losing connection with the main roads of communication of the island. 34 single-family homes of 2 and 3 storeys, with landscaped plots, in the residential center of the Tafira Alta neighborhood where there is little supply of new construction. An opportunity to make the change you were looking for. RESIDENCIAL TAFIRA GARDENS is made up of a total of 34 single-family homes isolated and separated from each other, on completely independent plots, set back from their enclosing walls, in an idyllic area very close to the center of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, less than ten minutes from downtown. The chalets in the project have large gardens on plots starting at 400 m2.There are 14 different types where you can choose the home that best suits your needs, homes with all the comforts, an excellent level of finishes and a design designed for optimal energy efficiency. A promotion designed to become your next resting place! BOOK your home from €3,000 Prices from €471,575 plus IGIC Handover of keys, Spring 2023 Amounts guaranteed by CAJAMAR Personalized forms of payment until delivery of keys. "Enjoy summer 2023 in the garden of your new home." *Excellent communication to the center of the capital, Vegueta and Triana.International schools, service and leisure. *The ideal home for lovers of tranquility and nature. For those who need a major change in their lives. Tafira Alta is one of the exclusive neighborhoods of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria where we find magnificent residences, which were built with a wide variety of architectural styles and surrounded by beautiful gardens that have inspired the name of our development "Tafira Gardens". With its colorful villas of different styles, this classy neighborhood has managed to preserve all the original atmosphere of its colonial air where Italian-style country houses, large terraces, verandas and magnificent gardens are combined.In the early 20th century it was here that the British built elegant hotels (including Los Frailes) and where historic political meetings were held. *The images shown have no commercial or contractual value, only for the purposes of indicative representation.

description: Apt RIC.Alfa Building, brand new, completely remodeled building, first quality, 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 patios, kitchen, living room, 2 access doors to the house, very bright. Home automation.- The elegance of the Alfa Building cannot stay away from the requirements of the houses of our time.All homes have a home automation system, which allows the control and programming of lights in the home, from an application on your smartphone or tablet.This system is also compatible with the most common assistance applications such as Google Home and Amazon Alexa. Likewise, the homes have an application system for video intercom control from abletone or tablet.This system allows the video intercom to be operated from any location, as well as allowing calls to the home itself or recording accesses. The Alfa Building is one of the emblematic elements of this city, built in 1956, it represents an example of the Spanish architecture of that time, similar to the emblematic buildings of Madrid and Barcelona. A comprehensive rehabilitation has been undertaken, which has allowed this architectural jewel to be restored in all its splendor, while satisfying the needs of the homes of our time. It is a multi-family building, with 5 residential floors and commercial premises.The main façade is oriented towards the south, León y Castillo street nº 41, and the auxiliary façade faces Murga street nº 15 and 17. In the Alfa Building, it is the exceptional protagonist of this privileged area of the city of Las Palmas, very close to San Telmo Park and Triana Street.It has in its area all the services, including administration, shops, leisure and restaurants. The homes are defined by their functionality, the spaciousness of the different rooms and the Premium quality materials, which develop a high level of elegance in detail.

description: We present this wonderful farm of 1237 square meters, in the Lomo de Los Ahorradores in the Municipality of La Vega de San Mateo, very close to the neighborhood of La Lechuza. Fantastic place for growing vegetables and collecting fruit due to the large number of fruit trees available (more than 70) including almond, chestnut, walnut, pear, apple, plum, quince, among others. It has a house to reform, with an independent kitchen, bathroom and 3 rooms, one of which is a natural cave. It has a separate cave which is ideal for growing mushrooms or making compos. Besides, it has a minilla of water (direct outlet of a water spring), a pond for the storage of irrigation water and a cesspool. It has supply water and the possibility of putting light or solar panels according to what each one wants. If you want to be in a spectacular place to rest, and be in contact with nature, do not hesitate to call me. Note: Expenses and taxes not included. The data is indicative and is subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: KI-GranCanaria presents a villa in a quiet residential area with impressive views. Located in Monte Luz it is within walking distance to Las Palmas capital, private schools and the university. Perfect to escape the noise of the city, but maintaining connectivity. The chalet is distributed over two floors plus a basement. On the main floor you enter a large distributor. On the left is a spacious living room with dining room with lots of light thanks to the large windows. The fireplace creates a special atmosphere and invites you to sit in the armchair to read a book or spend the afternoon with family or friends over a table. In front of the living room is the kitchen, a pantry and two toilets. The kitchen offers the space for a dining room for daily life and has an exit to the terrace at the back of the house. On the upper floor is the master bedroom with a dressing room and its own bathroom en suite. The windows offer a view as far as Las Palmas and the sea in the background. In addition, there are three bedrooms and a bathroom. Throughout the house there is parquet. It is sold without furniture, but there is the possibility of acquiring part of the furniture. In front of the chalet there is a garden, terrace and access from the street. At the rear there are more terraces and several caves. In one of them the utility room has been installed, another can be used as a second living room. On the basement floor is the garage with space for two or more cars. We invite you to visit this property with a lot of character. The caves are a very curious and pleasant addition. The information given is understood to be indicative and may have errors and changes. The purchase costs are not included in the price. Normally they are between 8-10% of the price of the house for second-hand sales and between 10-12% in brand new houses. It can be a little more if the price of the house is very low or if the buyer buys with a mortgage. The expenses are made up of: Property transfer taxes of 6.5% on the purchase price for second-hand properties and 8% tax on the purchase price for brand new properties (first sale). In addition to this, the buyer must pay the notary fees, property registration and management fees or lawyers in your case. However, the buyer will receive a detailed description of the acquisition costs of the property he wishes to buy.

description: 4th floor for sale without elevator in Miller Bajo with four bedrooms and two bathrooms to reform. The denomination of 4th is not entirely true, the distribution of heights of the building was changed in its day, the ground floor came to be classified as a First floor, and as a consequence the 3rd also became 4th. Its orientation and distribution favor that light is the main protagonist of this house. It needs reform as an update, not for construction damage, but for use and age of the house and its facilities. The building is located in the central Juan Hernández Guerra street, next to the Health Center. In the property its four bedrooms are exterior, only to the interior patio, the kitchen with an attached utility room and the two bathrooms. It is distributed in double access, from the living/dining room or from the kitchen. With a single distributor corridor to give access to all its rooms, it has a plan that makes good use of its surface area, with square rooms and no constructive elements that disturb or hinder their use. Its kitchen with attached utility room ideal for hanging out and the location of support appliances, such as a washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, etc. Three of its bedrooms are located on the same line, except for the main bedroom, which, although they are all in the same area of the house, has a different orientation from the others. The main bathroom has all the pieces, sink, bidet, toilet and shower tray, however the auxiliary bathroom, although it did have a small shower tray years ago, was removed, practically remaining as a toilet. An ideal home to realize the dream of your first home and live in Las Palmas, or also as an investment and allocate it to rent.

description: You are looking to live in an unbeatable modern area with all basic services one step away, this is your best opportunity. Las Palmas undoubtedly offers you an eternal summer, with fabulous beaches that will make you enjoy a summer atmosphere throughout the year, including the unbeatable Playa de Las Canteras, considered one of the best urban beaches in Europe, it is a beach of fine blond sand 2,250 m long and which can be enjoyed practically all year round; They are bordered by a long 3.5 km promenade full of restaurants and terraces, for this and many more reasons it is perfect for habitual residence or investment. We present this fabulous 105m² apartment located in a five-story building, distributed in one apartment per floor, thus favoring greater tranquility, the elevator has automatic doors and cabins accessible for people with reduced mobility. It consists of three bedrooms, all with built-in wardrobes, the main one being en-suite, an open-concept living room-kitchen fully equipped and furnished with ceramic cladding and two bathrooms with a shower tray and fully equipped, with white vitrified porcelain sanitary ware and single-lever faucets, The sink has hanging furniture and an elegant square mirror, a hall and a cozy terrace, ideal for a coffee, a good book or simply enjoying your home. The entire house is made with top quality materials, designed with your well-being and that of your loved ones in mind, with pre-installation for air conditioning in each of the main rooms, anodized aluminum tilt-and-turn windows with Climalit double glazing and electric shutters.; They also have TV and TF sockets, and for greater comfort it has an intercom connected to the access areas to the building. We also highlight the significant energy savings and the contribution to a better environment by integrating renewable energy with the aerothermal system, whose function is to extract the energy stored in the form of heat in the ambient air of the home to generate heat or cold in the home and Heating water for domestic use is a natural, renewable and inexhaustible energy that does not pollute and is highly profitable, since significant savings are achieved on the electricity bill and it allows making the home a more sustainable space. WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?, CALL US FOR MORE INFORMATION! description: Construcciones Cristóbal Ortega, SLU (CCO), a solid and solvent company with more than 30 years of experience and track record, promotes and builds “RESIDENCIAL ACEBUCHE”. This residential of new construction homes in TAMARACEITE, will be built between the streets DOCTOR GUTIERREZ MELLADO, JUAN PULIDO RODRIGUEZ and LUCY CABRERA SUAREZ (the building faces 3 facades). The building will be located in a newly expanded area, very close to the Los Alisios Shopping Center, and with all the necessary services and facilities: supermarkets, bus station, schools, institute, municipal offices, sports center, green areas, etc. Likewise, it has excellent communication and very easy access to the GC-3 motorway that connects all directions. It is a building with 56 dwellings (4 dwellings with 2 bedrooms and 52 dwellings with 3 bedrooms), garages, storage rooms and commercial premises with 5 floors above ground (premises and dwellings) and 2 floors below ground (garages and storage rooms). "Residencial Acebuche" is made up of exterior and interior dwellings and is distributed in: •Ground floor: business premises. •1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floor: 14 apartments per floor (1 with 2 bedrooms and 11 with 3 bedrooms). •Basement floor -1 and -2: garages and storage rooms. Six houses on the first floor have the private use (common area) of a patio/terrace ranging from 40 to 51 m2. The price of each house includes a garage and a storage room. The houses have a fitted kitchen, fitted wardrobes, pre-installation of air conditioning, etc. The works are scheduled to start in the first quarter of 2023, and its delivery is scheduled for the first/second quarter of 2025 (approximately 24 months from the start of the work). Prices do not include taxes (I. G. I. C, A. J. D. ) or notarial/registration fees. ** Non-contractual images. If you are attracted to this project and want to live near a privileged environment, well connected and in full expansion, request personalized information.

The building will be located in a newly expanded area, very close to the Los Alisios Shopping Center, and with all the necessary services and facilities: supermarkets, bus station, schools, institute, municipal offices, sports center, green areas, etc. Likewise, it has excellent communication and very easy access to the GC-3 motorway that connects all directions. It is a building with 56 dwellings (4 dwellings with 2 bedrooms and 52 dwellings with 3 bedrooms), garages, storage rooms and commercial premises with 5 floors above ground (premises and dwellings) and 2 floors below ground (garages and storage rooms). "Residencial Acebuche" is made up of exterior and interior dwellings and is distributed in: •Ground floor: business premises. •1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floor: 14 apartments per floor (1 with 2 bedrooms and 11 with 3 bedrooms). •Basement floor -1 and -2: garages and storage rooms. Six houses on the first floor have the private use (common area) of a patio/terrace ranging from 40 to 51 m2. The price of each house includes a garage and a storage room. The houses have a fitted kitchen, fitted wardrobes, pre-installation of air conditioning, etc. The works are scheduled to start in the first quarter of 2023, and its delivery is scheduled for the first/second quarter of 2025 (approximately 24 months from the start of the work). Prices do not include taxes (I. G. I. C, A. J. D. ) or notarial/registration fees. ** Non-contractual images. If you are attracted to this project and want to live near a privileged environment, well connected and in full expansion, request personalized information.

description: New construction homes in a modern building in the "Premium" area in Guanarteme, with completion scheduled for July 2023. In the heart of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, a minute's walk from the well-known Playa de las Canteras and 4 minutes from the most important shopping area on the island, Calle Mesa y López. Development located on the pedestrian street of Secretaria Artiles, consisting of 16 homes and 4 duplexes with one and two bedrooms. With modern finishes and unbeatable quality and a soft and diaphanous appearance. With a landscaped interior patio, parking for bicycles and a gym. Homes with a fully equipped kitchen with all appliances and fitted wardrobes in the bedrooms. Storage included in the price. Off-plan reservations prior to July 31, 2022 will obtain a 2.5% discount on the final price. For more information, you can go to our commercial offices, located at Calle Pascal 26, local 1, with hours from 9:00 a. m. to 2:00 p. m. and from 4:00 p. m. to 6:00 p. m. or contact us at the information indicated in the announcement. If you want to know more about "UNIQUE BUILDINGS" promotions, you can consult our website. We will be delighted to assist you.

description: Single-family home for sale in a two-story building with a highly profitable business in the center of Firgas. The apartment is located on the top floor of the building and consists of 65 m² distributed in a living room-kitchen, 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom. On the ground floor, which consists of about 90 m², is the premises, as well as a basement of about 30 m² with two warehouses. It is a popular bar-restaurant that has been fully operational for more than 30 years. Demonstrable profitability. Do not miss this opportunity and request a visit, we will be happy to provide you with the necessary information. The sale price does not include Notary fees, Registration, nor taxes of the Transmission or financing expenses, nor any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer..

suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle José Santos, 2

description: Azzar Las Palmas is a project designed to enjoy a privileged environment next to the golf course, Palmeras Golf.The 100-home project consists of two modern design buildings with typologies of 2, 3 and 4 bedrooms with large terraces and all of them include a garage and storage room.The gated community has excellent common areas for the enjoyment of all family members.We have thought that you would like to have a community pool with saline chlorination where you can have fun on the hottest days or play areas for the little ones in the house.The residential also has a community room where you can celebrate the most pleasant events with friends and family.The houses have the best qualities such as the aerothermal installation for the production of hot water and the kitchen furnished and equipped with an electric oven, induction hob and decorative hood.In addition, to achieve maximum comfort, we have differentiated the day areas from the night areas and the distribution allows the space to be used, making it more spacious and welcoming. COME VISIT US! We are waiting for you at our Aelca office where you will be able to learn about the qualities and materials first-hand, and we will also resolve all your doubts and concerns in a personalized way. We are located at Calle Puerto Rico, 4, 35010, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.Our hours are Monday to Friday from 09:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. and from 4:00 p.m. to 7:30 p.m., Saturdays by appointment. -Location text: Azzar Las Palmas is located in a privileged location on Calle Doctor Alfonso Chiscano Díaz, in the Negrín area next to Las Palmeras Golf.The project is located in an expansion area very close to the Dr.Negrín and services that will provide comfort in your day to day life such as the Las Arenas Shopping Center, educational centers and supermarkets.In addition, a few minutes away is Las Canteras beach and Avenida Mesa y López, one of the most important shopping streets in the city.It is a place where you can enjoy an area with all the comforts, also having excellent communications both by private transport, thanks to fast connections via the GC-23 and GC-2 highways, and by private transport via bus lines 35., 47, 103, 105, 116, 117, 204, 206, 210, 232, 233, 234, 317 and 319. -Legal text: Homes under construction project located on Calle Doctor Alfonso Chíscanos Díaz s/n, in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.Promoted by "ARQURA HOMES, BANK ASSET FUND".Markets AELCA REAL ESTATE DEVELOPMENTS AELCA, S.L.OR.Information on the promotion, delivery dates, economic and marketing conditions available at the Aelca offices located at Calle Puerto Rico nº 4.The Gran Canarian palms.The information and images published here are merely illustrative, so they do not have a contractual nature and are subject to modifications due to technical, legal or commercial requirements of the promotion. -Promotes: Árqura Homes -Markets: Aelca.

The published price does not include the expenses and taxes derived from the sale of the property and are borne by the buyer.

description: Construcciones Cristóbal Ortega, SLU (CCO), a solid and solvent company with more than 30 years of experience and track record, promotes and builds “RESIDENCIAL ACEBUCHE”. This residential of new construction homes in TAMARACEITE, will be built between the streets DOCTOR GUTIERREZ MELLADO, JUAN PULIDO RODRIGUEZ and LUCY CABRERA SUAREZ (the building faces 3 facades). The building will be located in a newly expanded area, very close to the Los Alisios Shopping Center, and with all the necessary services and facilities: supermarkets, bus station, schools, institute, municipal offices, sports center, green areas, etc. Likewise, it has excellent communication and very easy access to the GC-3 motorway that connects all directions. It is a building with 56 dwellings (4 dwellings with 2 bedrooms and 52 dwellings with 3 bedrooms), garages, storage rooms and commercial premises with 5 floors above ground (premises and dwellings) and 2 floors below ground (garages and storage rooms). "Residencial Acebuche" is made up of exterior and interior dwellings and is distributed in: •Ground floor: business premises. •1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floor: 14 apartments per floor (1 with 2 bedrooms and 11 with 3 bedrooms). •Basement floor -1 and -2: garages and storage rooms. Six houses on the first floor have the private use (common area) of a patio/terrace ranging from 40 to 51 m2. The price of each house includes a garage and a storage room. The houses have a fitted kitchen, fitted wardrobes, pre-installation of air conditioning, etc. The works are scheduled to start in the first quarter of 2023, and its delivery is scheduled for the first/second quarter of 2025 (approximately 24 months from the start of the work). Prices do not include taxes (I. G. I. C, A. J. D. ) or notarial/registration fees. ** Non-contractual images. description: Apartment in Las Torres, Calle Malvavisco 10. Magnificent apartment of 78 m2 built, with a terrace, on the third floor. Its privileged location a few meters from the Las Ramblas shopping center. It has two parking spaces. a storage room and elevator to the floor where the house is located. Recent construction. Ask us about the virtual tour of the house so you can check its distribution The property is designed for comfort, with a distribution of a spacious living-dining room and a cozy and intimate kitchen with electrical appliances. It is VERY BRIGHT, it consists of 2 large bedrooms and two bathrooms, one of them is in the master bedroom with a shower. Very good orientation, allows you to enjoy the house with very good temperatures during the afternoons (especially in the summer) and is very close to supermarkets, pharmacies, schools, veterinarians.. . Easy access to the highway and a few kilometers from Mesa and López. Do not hesitate to visit it and see its possibilities. Come see it! We can get the perfect financing for you. Energy rating F. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to involuntary errors or omissions. Expenses derived from the purchase are not included in the price.

description: Ángel Guimerá is our second development in the Tomás Morales area. It is a twin building to its predecessor, Agustín de Bethecourt, a building that left such a good feeling among our clients due to its design, materials and finishes. Ángel Guimerá will be a building of 18 apartments with 1 and 2 bedrooms with a garage and storage room and with an unbeatable location. Located between two of the main arteries of the city, such as Paseo de Tomás Morales and Calle León y Castillo, it will allow you to make a good part of your journeys on foot and use your vehicle less. Ángel Guimerá will be the second building in a series inspired by Le Corbusier, the father of modern architecture, whose importance is present in its design and in all its aspects.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Arenales - Lugo - Avda Marítima, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
suggestedTexts.title: Flat in Calle Ángel Guimera, 74

description: At iRent Today we put this great property for sale for you and your family Neighborhood: The house is located in Las Mesas de Tamaraceite Colegio de las Mesas only 300 meters away, Nursery, pharmacy, supermarket, restaurants, soccer field It is located in a very quiet and familiar neighborhood. This is one of the areas with the greatest added value of the palms. Only 15 minutes from the palms 7 minutes by car from the Alisios shopping center, Leroy Merlin, Mercadona and lidl 7 minutes from Tamaraceite and health center 5 minutes from Tenoya 8 minutes from Aruca Public transport: Just 300 meters away we have the bus stop with lines 319 and 223 Departures from 6 am to 10 pm. Living place: This property has 3 levels Low level: * Direct access to the house and a large garage with an automatic gate where you can park up to 3 cars * Cleanliness * loft Floor 1: * Access to the house that is renovated * New American kitchen * 2 full bathrooms * Spacious living room * 3 rooms * The house is very bright Rooftop: * Laundry room * Barbecue * Closed room that can be used as an extra room, office or recreational area * Cleanliness * Ample space This is an ideal home for a large family in need of space or investment since up to 3 homes can be built and for its price you will be able to obtain great profitability. The house is not sold with furniture or appliances, the furniture or part of them can be negotiated Tax, registration, notary and any other expenses derived from the sale are not included in the price. * All the exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to errors or involuntary omissions*.

description: Country house in the Municipality of Teror. It is a fantastic, very spacious house with patio and terrace. It is a construction that dates, according to the cadastre, from the year 1800 but which is in a good state of conservation pending some reforms for its updating. It is located in the heart of the town, a few minutes from the Basilica, the Town Hall, etc. and surrounded by all kinds of services and means of transport. It preserves all the essence of the time in which it was built: spacious and warm living rooms, double bedrooms with high ceilings, wooden floors, thick partitions that separate the different rooms and serve as natural insulators for both high temperatures and noise. It also has a beautiful hall, a patio for flowers and everything that is needed to make it a comfortable and comfortable home. On the upper floor there is a spacious and bright attic, a bedroom and a bathroom with access to a wonderful terrace. It also has many possibilities to invest and allocate it to holiday tourism. Possibility of acquiring an annex to use as a garage for several cars. Do not hesitate to visit it, you will fall in love. The expenses derived from the sale are not included in the price.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Teror, Teror
suggestedTexts.title: Rustic house in Calle Obispo Urquinaona, 6

description: Construcciones Cristóbal Ortega, SLU (CCO), a solid and solvent company with more than 30 years of experience and track record, promotes and builds “RESIDENCIAL ACEBUCHE”. This residential of new construction homes in TAMARACEITE, will be built between the streets DOCTOR GUTIERREZ MELLADO, JUAN PULIDO RODRIGUEZ and LUCY CABRERA SUAREZ (the building faces 3 facades). The building will be located in a newly expanded area, very close to the Los Alisios Shopping Center, and with all the necessary services and facilities: supermarkets, bus station, schools, institute, municipal offices, sports center, green areas, etc. Likewise, it has excellent communication and very easy access to the GC-3 motorway that connects all directions. It is a building with 56 dwellings (4 dwellings with 2 bedrooms and 52 dwellings with 3 bedrooms), garages, storage rooms and commercial premises with 5 floors above ground (premises and dwellings) and 2 floors below ground (garages and storage rooms). "Residencial Acebuche" is made up of exterior and interior dwellings and is distributed in: •Ground floor: business premises. •1st, 2nd, 3rd and 4th floor: 14 apartments per floor (1 with 2 bedrooms and 11 with 3 bedrooms). •Basement floor -1 and -2: garages and storage rooms. Six houses on the first floor have the private use (common area) of a patio/terrace ranging from 40 to 51 m2. The price of each house includes a garage and a storage room. The houses have a fitted kitchen, fitted wardrobes, pre-installation of air conditioning, etc. The works are scheduled to start in the first quarter of 2023, and its delivery is scheduled for the first/second quarter of 2025 (approximately 24 months from the start of the work). Prices do not include taxes (I. G. I. C, A. J. D. ) or notarial/registration fees. ** Non-contractual images. If you are attracted to this project and want to live near a privileged environment, well connected and in full expansion, request personalized information.

description: Bright apartment in a quiet building, with few neighbors located in the Miller area. In the area there are services such as pharmacies, gas stations, supermarkets and transport since it has a stop on the sidewalk in front. Near the property you can find supermarkets such as SPAR, Híper Dino and Carrefour in the La Ballena shopping center. The closest hospital is the Lower Miller Health Center. The nearest gas station is DISA. It is located on the second floor and it is an exterior property. Regarding its distribution, it has a spacious living room, which connects with the rest of the rooms. In the right wing of the house is the main room, which has a small balcony and a window facing the façade. In addition, next to this we find the second room, from which you have access to the balcony through a window, also facing the façade. It is therefore two very bright areas. In the left wing of the house are located the bathroom and the kitchen-dining room. Also on the roof the property has two storage rooms. In total, this property has a constructed area of 70 m² and 62 m² useful. The photos are made up of the current state in which the house is located and the simulation of a possible reform.

description: Susan Wolf presents this elegant villa, distributed on one floor with attic and located in the surroundings of Bandama, specifically in the Cuesta de El Reventón, in the municipality of Santa Brígida. The main house -of 220 m2- is located in the centre of an urban plot of 1275 square metres, with two other small buildings that are used as a multi-purpose room with bathroom, where meetings, social meals or simply to listen to music can be held. Another adjoining room at one end of the plot serves as a DIY workshop, or even an atelier for painting. At the main entrance, a hallway leads to the main areas of the house: the main living area, with a large living room and a dining room at different heights with access to the kitchen and a covered terrace that houses a comfortable and sunny sitting room open to the garden. From this hall there is also access to the attic - currently a library - to the basement and to the service area and the night area. The service area also has two other entrances from the garden, through which you can access the kitchen and a bedroom, formerly dedicated to the service staff. In this part of the house there is also a pantry and a laundry room with access to an outside solarium. In the night area, there are the other three bedrooms, one of them being the master bedroom with en-suite bathroom and dressing room. This area is serviced by another large bathroom. The basement houses a wine cellar, a small study, a toilet and the garage with machine room and space for storage or tools. Outside the main house and separated by a relaxing chill out area, there is an adjoining building with bathroom and storage room which is currently used for a variety of purposes: meetings, parties, cinema, exhibitions or a place for meditation could be the destination of this unique piece. It could also be adapted to house a flat independent from the house, although today it is the centre of the owners' social gatherings. The property is only a few minutes away from the access to the ring road, from where you can reach Las Palmas de Gran Canaria in 15 minutes, Maspalomas in 30 minutes and Agaete in 35 minutes. It is important to highlight the tranquillity, the proximity to prestigious public schools and the famous Real Club de Golf de Las Palmas, dean of Spain 1891.

description: José Mesa y López Avenue began in the 1950s parallel to the coast of Las Canteras beach, modernizing the city to become the most important, cosmopolitan and commercial area. At present, following the same pattern thanks to the pedestrianization of the avenue, it continues to be the most important area and has also gained in well-being and tranquility. In it we have been lucky enough to find this fantastic 260-meter duplex, with a modern, spacious interior design, with a very good distribution and with high qualities that give you that warm and cozy atmosphere that is so needed in your home. When you open the door you will feel that you are entering an independent house, far from the city, with the difference of being in the center of it. The ground floor consists of 130 meters, distributed in; hall, living room, kitchen, pantry, dining room, a bedroom, a bathroom, utility room-storage room and two patios. The living room is a true marvel, bright, spacious, quiet, with some finishes on a whim, ideal to enjoy with family and friends, and why not? to disconnect from a long day of work. The kitchen is a delicacy, modern, beautiful, cozy, spacious and functional, to be able to do authentic culinary wonders. In it there is also a comfortable pantry. Next to the kitchen, you can have your dining area so you don't have to go to the living room. The room, bright, with its own built-in wardrobe, perfect for the little ones in the house, or ideal as a guest or service room. Next to it, we find the first of the bathrooms, complete, modern and with sensational finishes. At the end of the ground floor, the laundry and storage area that has its own patio. Its situation gives you the comfort of having everything separated and ordered, for your emotional well-being. As you go up its wide, beautiful and comfortable stairs, you also reach the top floor, 130 meters that are distributed in; A nice hall, and a bright and quiet office, perfect for working from home. A large room, with a study area, built-in wardrobe, dressing room, full bathroom and a fantastic terrace to enjoy a little bit of tranquility and disconnection. Finally, the jewel in the crown, the main room, which, having the same orientation as the living room, enjoys light and tranquility, as well as spaciousness. In it we find a comfortable and functional dressing room and a full bathroom, large, with sensational finishes like all the bathrooms in the house, with the difference that in this one you have a wonderful jacuzzi that will make you feel like you are on vacation in your own home. For greater comfort, you have a parking space in the same building, which we already know how expensive it is to park in the area. From the Youhome team we will be delighted to welcome you so that you have the opportunity to visit this luxurious duplex. The exposed data is merely informative and may be subject to inadvertent errors or omissions. Expenses related to the sale are not included in the sale price.

description: En una ZONA ÚNICA Y EXCLUSIVA del NOROESTE DE LA ISLA de Gran Canaria, en los altos de Santa María de Guía y cerca del bosque de Santa Cristina, disponemos de una ESPLÉNDIDA FINCA DE 3000 M2. La finca está totalmente amurallada, y en su interior alberga DOS VIVIENDAS.  VIVIENDA PRINCIPAL: maravilloso chalet individual, a 4 vientos, de estilo canario y techumbre a dos aguas que destaca por la elegancia de los materiales tanto en lo referente a la s maderas como a la piedra de cantería de su paramento. Dispone de una superficie de 600 m2, y consta de 6 dormitorios con armarios empotrados, gran salón comedor, cocina totalmente equipada y amueblada, 3 baños, (1 en suite), chimenea, terraza con unas vistas maravillosas a la ciudad de Las Palmas. SEGUNDA VIVIENDA: junto a la vivienda principal se dispone de otra contigua, que está equipada con 2 habitaciones, discoteca, sala de juegos con pin pon, billar, gimnasio, sala de baile, 2 baños. Entre el excelente equipamiento del inmueble, se encuentran las zonas de ocio y descanso, entre las que se destaca la sauna, una gran piscina con jacuzzi de chorros a presión tipo Spa, bomba de frio calor, placa solares, zona de barbacoa, sala de máquinas debajo de la piscina totalmente transitable, con pequeña bodega, desalinizadora, ósmosis, circuito de seguridad, aljibe de 20.000 litros, estanque de 300.000 litros de agua, jardines, zona de cultivo con frutales, aguacateros, naranjeros, limoneros, nogales, almendreros.. . Garaje para 2 coches más una zona de aparcamiento para 6 coches abierta, cuarto de aperos, trasteros, etc. El inmueble está equipado con toda clase de comodidades y calidades en cuanto a su construcción, pero sobre todo, destaca la calidad de vida que ofrece por ubicación y características, además de estar situada en una zona de buena vecindad, con buena comunicación. Situándose a sólo 40 minutos de la capital de la isla. Un verdadero paraíso para llevar la vida de lujo soñada.

description: En una ZONA ÚNICA Y EXCLUSIVA del NOROESTE DE LA ISLA de Gran Canaria, en los altos de Santa María de Guía y cerca del bosque de Santa Cristina, disponemos de una ESPLÉNDIDA FINCA DE 3000 M2. La finca está totalmente amurallada, y en su interior alberga DOS VIVIENDAS.  VIVIENDA PRINCIPAL: maravilloso chalet individual, a 4 vientos, de estilo canario y techumbre a dos aguas que destaca por la elegancia de los materiales tanto en lo referente a la s maderas como a la piedra de cantería de su paramento. Dispone de una superficie de 600 m2, y consta de 6 dormitorios con armarios empotrados, gran salón comedor, cocina totalmente equipada y amueblada, 3 baños, (1 en suite), chimenea, terraza con unas vistas maravillosas a la ciudad de Las Palmas. SEGUNDA VIVIENDA: junto a la vivienda principal se dispone de otra contigua, que está equipada con 2 habitaciones, discoteca, sala de juegos con pin pon, billar, gimnasio, sala de baile, 2 baños. Entre el excelente equipamiento del inmueble, se encuentran las zonas de ocio y descanso, entre las que se destaca la sauna, una gran piscina con jacuzzi de chorros a presión tipo Spa, bomba de frio calor, placa solares, zona de barbacoa, sala de máquinas debajo de la piscina totalmente transitable, con pequeña bodega, desalinizadora, ósmosis, circuito de seguridad, aljibe de 20.000 litros, estanque de 300.000 litros de agua, jardines, zona de cultivo con frutales, aguacateros, naranjeros, limoneros, nogales, almendreros.. . Garaje para 2 coches más una zona de aparcamiento para 6 coches abierta, cuarto de aperos, trasteros, etc. El inmueble está equipado con toda clase de comodidades y calidades en cuanto a su construcción, pero sobre todo, destaca la calidad de vida que ofrece por ubicación y características, además de estar situada en una zona de buena vecindad, con buena comunicación. Situándose a sólo 40 minutos de la capital de la isla. Un verdadero paraíso para llevar la vida de lujo soñada.

description: José Mesa y López Avenue began in the 1950s parallel to the coast of Las Canteras beach, modernizing the city to become the most important, cosmopolitan and commercial area. At present, following the same pattern thanks to the pedestrianization of the avenue, it continues to be the most important area and has also gained in well-being and tranquility. In it we have been lucky enough to find this fantastic 260-meter duplex, with a modern, spacious interior design, with a very good distribution and with high qualities that give you that warm and cozy atmosphere that is so needed in your home. When you open the door you will feel that you are entering an independent house, far from the city, with the difference of being in the center of it. The ground floor consists of 130 meters, distributed in; hall, living room, kitchen, pantry, dining room, a bedroom, a bathroom, utility room-storage room and two patios. The living room is a true marvel, bright, spacious, quiet, with some finishes on a whim, ideal to enjoy with family and friends, and why not? to disconnect from a long day of work. The kitchen is a delicacy, modern, beautiful, cozy, spacious and functional, to be able to do authentic culinary wonders. In it there is also a comfortable pantry. Next to the kitchen, you can have your dining area so you don't have to go to the living room. The room, bright, with its own built-in wardrobe, perfect for the little ones in the house, or ideal as a guest or service room. Next to it, we find the first of the bathrooms, complete, modern and with sensational finishes. At the end of the ground floor, the laundry and storage area that has its own patio. Its situation gives you the comfort of having everything separated and ordered, for your emotional well-being. As you go up its wide, beautiful and comfortable stairs, you also reach the top floor, 130 meters that are distributed in; A nice hall, and a bright and quiet office, perfect for working from home. A large room, with a study area, built-in wardrobe, dressing room, full bathroom and a fantastic terrace to enjoy a little bit of tranquility and disconnection. Finally, the jewel in the crown, the main room, which, having the same orientation as the living room, enjoys light and tranquility, as well as spaciousness. In it we find a comfortable and functional dressing room and a full bathroom, large, with sensational finishes like all the bathrooms in the house, with the difference that in this one you have a wonderful jacuzzi that will make you feel like you are on vacation in your own home. For greater comfort, you have a parking space in the same building, which we already know how expensive it is to park in the area. From the Youhome team we will be delighted to welcome you so that you have the opportunity to visit this luxurious duplex. The exposed data is merely informative and may be subject to inadvertent errors or omissions. Expenses related to the sale are not included in the sale price.

description: Exclusive 420 m² villa in Los Hoyos, Tafira We are pleased to present you a property that makes a difference due to its architecture, its volume, its luminosity, its distribution and its privileged location. This is a home clearly oriented to those who know what they want and choose not to settle.It is the distinction made architecture. Numbers can describe this beautiful villa, but only by being inside can we feel what this property transmits, the feeling of fullness, space, light and volume that makes this home the haven of peace and tranquility that you want for yourself and your family. family.It isn't true? This home sits on a 552 m² plot, of which 132.52 correspond to construction, and 420m2 to gardens and private terraces.The total constructed area on its 3 floors is 420 m², distributed as follows: basement, 163.33 m²; ground floor, 132.52 m² and upper floor, 123.62 m². The refreshing greenery of the well-kept vegetation welcomes us to the property, leading to a secluded terrace that invites us to enjoy a lively chat or a good book. Going through the door, we access the main living room of the house, with a large window that provides great light and gives access to a terrace that overlooks the garden in the lower part, and from which we enjoy beautiful views.This living room has a fireplace and dining area. The modern and fully equipped kitchen is on the same level, and also has large windows. The staircase that gives access to the rest of the house is wide, comfortable, very affordable because its steps are low in height, and it also has an aesthetically very successful design, which gives it visual lightness and integrates it perfectly into the architectural ensemble. On the upper floor we have a bedroom with an attached study or work area.Next to it, but separated, another bedroom and a spacious bathroom. A few steps below, on the mezzanine, we have the main bedroom of the house, suite type, with its own bathroom and dressing room, and with a large window that also opens onto the garden area of the house, plus another room, currently used for exercise area. If we go down from the main living room, we find another room, with multipurpose use as a TV room, work or study place and reading space, with a large library.Next to it, a room currently used for storing household items, and a room for boilers and hydraulic systems. The basement is another complete house.It has its own kitchen, bathroom, and large bedroom that could well accommodate, as well as a study or work area.All of this completed with a spacious, well-lit living room that gives access to the garden area of the house. The exterior of this beautiful villa is completed with different outdoor terraces, which gives it great versatility and differentiated spaces.Something unique. This house has 5 bathrooms, 6 bedrooms, 3 living rooms and 2 kitchens.All this with high-quality materials, chosen with exquisite taste to create a harmonious and balanced set. The luminosity presides over each space of this house. Comfort is assured, as it has air conditioning and heat pump. We encourage you to visit it and immerse yourself in the sensations and quality of life that this home can offer you.We are sure it will be love at first sight. This is the opportunity you have been waiting for to give the whole family the home they have always wanted.Call us and we will assist you as you deserve. Information: The sale price does not include taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer.The exposed data is indicative and could include errors or omissions.

description: Unique opportunity! Beautiful independent house on the beachfront of Salinetas with terraces and panoramic sea views from all floors. Also, with outdoor rooftop pool. A jewel for a large family or a sea-loving investor. Basement has a garage for one car with automatic door, large storage room, bathroom. Plata baja rises approximately one meter high above the avenue and has a terrace at street level with a white gate and gate. When you enter the house, it is distributed in a hall with the staircase that will take you to the upper floors, large living room with windows with a panoramic view of the sea and the beach, in addition to a large independent kitchen renovated and equipped. The first floor has 4 large bedrooms each with an ocean view and access to the terrace surrounding the house, and 2 full bathrooms. The upper floor is a beautiful terrace with private pool and panoramic views of almost 300 degrees to the sea and the beach. The house is located in a privileged quiet place with direct access to the promenade that borders the beach. Protected from the winds and facing south (sse, s, sso) a few meters away you can find cafes, restaurants, supermarkets, bakery, pharmacy, the beach, etc.. .  A wonderful opportunity for quality life. Offers are heard! LOCATION: Salinetas is situated at the coast and belongs to the municipality of Telde. Telde is a small town located between the island's capital Las Palmas of Gran Canaria, on 10 minutes by car, and the airport, on about 20 minutes. Provided of all kind of services and a large choice of shopping possibilities, the population are almost exclusively locals. Telde is not right on the coast, but the beaches of Melenara and La Garita are on 10 to 15 minutes by car. It has a covered area with a separate door to the entrance hall, very comfortable to avoid going through the living room and kitchen. The second floor has four very spacious bedrooms, one of them suite type, with windows towards the back of the house and views of the mountains, custom wooden dressing room and a balcony with views towards the terrace on the ground floor. A full bathroom with a window to the outside. Another of the bedrooms accesses through a door to a balcony that overlooks the facade and main street. Walkable roof that occupies the entire surface of the house, with spectacular views of the sea and the mountains. The basement has an area of 190m2, space for several vehicles and a storage area. Quite ample storage room and a bathroom. The house is very well preserved and built with top quality materials, Built in the year 2010. In a natural environment with total tranquility and 5 minutes walk from the historic center of Arucas and 15 minutes by car from Las Palmas Notary and registration fees are not included in the sale price. description: Ref. V3339. Rural house for sale in Teror Hey couple! Are you looking for a quiet refuge in the middle of nature? The old school in the Los Arbejales neighborhood in Teror, now converted into a cozy rural house, is the perfect place for you! . Welcome to a unique house, a home with history and charm, declared an Ethnographic and Cultural Property, completely renovated in 2010. If you are looking for a unique and special place to enjoy together, this house is for you. The house has a large terrace, a relaxing solarium and a garden with a barbecue that invites you to enjoy the company of friends and the impressive views of the nearby mountains. In addition, it has parking for several cars and an area to grow your own garden; and inside you have 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms and a study area overlooking the patio. The separate kitchen with utility room is perfect for preparing those homemade country meals, while the patio invites you to relax and enjoy the fresh air. It consists of two joined buildings, an old part with a gabled roof and original wooden floors that are more than 250 years old and another more recent construction from 1920. The reform was carried out after a careful study of traditional Canarian architecture, respecting to the smallest detail the canons of the traditional houses in the area, with exposed stone, and rescuing their original thigh tiles, furnishings and carpentry used decoratively and adapting the electrical and plumbing installations to the present time. With a license to use it as a rural holiday home, but currently in use as a family home, this house is the perfect home for couples like you, who appreciate history and the tranquility of living in the countryside. Come and live your own story" Information: The sale price does not include transfer taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer according to law. Or maybe welcome the new day in this incomparable space of tranquility? It is a very well distributed apartment, which in its 46 m² contains, without stress or pressure, a bathroom, two bedrooms (one double and the other single), a large kitchen where you can prepare your dishes comfortably, and a bright Living room with a large window from where you will enjoy beautiful views of the wooded area, as well as the pool and solarium. In addition, the house is at street level, you do not have to use stairs or an elevator to reach it, which makes it very comfortable for daily life. It is completely renovated and renovated, the photographs speak for themselves, and you can move into right now without having to undertake reforms.The fact of having two bedrooms increases its value both as a habitual residence and as a vacation rental, something for which this property is very attractive and profitable. Piletillas is a residential urbanization located to the south of the municipality of Telde, on the road that connects this municipality with Ingenio.It is an area characterized by its single-family homes and large garden spaces within the properties, which make it a quiet place to live surrounded by nature.It is well connected, halfway between Ingenio and Telde, and just 5 minutes from the GC1 motorway, both south and north. In El Goro, Telde, 3 minutes from the GC-1 motorway and 5 from Gran Canaria International Airport, very well connected both north and south, 10 minutes from the center of Telde and Ingenio, is this house that It has everything necessary to develop a life project in it without missing anything. It is a building of about 250 m² approx.built, spread over 3 levels. On the ground floor, we find the garage, a small entrance hall, 1 full bathroom, the very large open-plan kitchen, which integrates the dining room, and a living room.The kitchen has an efficient, high-capacity, energy-efficient air conditioner. On the second floor, which we access by a comfortable staircase located within a bright covered patio, we have 3 very large bedrooms, 2 of them equipped with fitted wardrobes with top quality wood and air conditioning.In addition, we have a full bathroom, also with a built-in wardrobe.The master bedroom has a balcony and a window to the street. On the third floor, we enjoy an open area, ideal for outdoor barbecues and family gatherings, or simply to enjoy the incomparable sensation of having the sky for a roof.A pergola is responsible for providing a shaded area. On this same floor, we find a room that could well be converted into a studio, with very little work, since it has sanitation and taps, so in practice it is already a studio that could be a home for one person, with all comfort. . On the other side, we have a very large living room, equipped with a fully equipped modern kitchen, as well as a space for a dining room.From here we can access the outside terrace, where we can place a hammock, table, some chairs, and enjoy another totally versatile outdoor space. It is important to emphasize that the house is delivered to its new owner fully equipped and furnished as can be seen in the photographs, except for those items of a personal nature, of course. In summary, this spectacular home has: Garage 4 bedrooms 2 full kitchens with dining area 2 full bathrooms 1 toilet 3 air conditioners 2 living rooms (lounge) Balcony Terrace open roof As you can see in the photos, the house is in impeccable condition, having recently been completely renovated.It has fiber optic Internet, and very close by it has essential services for day-to-day life, such as a Spar supermarket and a public transport stop that communicates with the entire island of Gran Canaria. El Goro, Urbanization La Jardinera, is an area of Telde that is currently among the most popular as it is a quiet area, ideal for living, but at the same time it is very well connected. Take a close look at the photographs and the virtual tour that accompany this ad, and if you think this is the home you were looking for, don't hesitate to call right now and request a visit.Opportunities like this don't come around twice, and given the high demand for housing in the area, you're likely to find a new owner quickly.Call right now and see if this is the opportunity to start your new life project.Ahead! Information: The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.

description: EXCELLENT OPPORTUNITY, in the Palmar de Teror neighborhood, a few minutes from Villa Mariana, very close to all basic services, mini-markets, square, church, school, playground, we find this fantastic duplex of about 100 m2, which gives two streets, distributed by a garage with 2 parking spaces (a little more depending on the cars), in that same garage there is a cistern built with a capacity of about 4000 liters of water. At the other entrance you find a small sunroom from which you can see the neighborhood square and the church. Composed of 4 bedrooms distributed between the first floor and the mezzanine which was a roof terrace, today transformed into home rooms, two bathrooms, 1 on each floor, a kitchen that leads to the exit that leads to the church. The floor is almost all laminated flooring, except for the garage, the kitchen and the two bathrooms. Do not miss this incredible opportunity in one of the quietest neighborhoods in the north, or miss its beautiful views from where you can see the entire valley, the sea and part of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.

description: And if you enter your house smelling new? Last unit available in this building located at Pasaje Marianela, 6 in Santidad (Arucas), with a very quiet and comfortable location at the same time since we quickly connect with the highway and are in the city in a few minutes. The building has a total of 6 neighbors, with two per floor and this receives us from the street with an elevator that takes us up to floor 1 of a total of up to 8 floors, where we will have 2 storey floors, 1 garage floor, the portal floor, 3 floors for homes and a last one for the roof terrace. The building is currently in the renovation phase, the elevator is not yet in operation. The apartment that we present to you on this occasion is the 1st floor, which has a corridor from the entrance that divides the day and night areas. To the left from the entrance we find through its corridor a utility room to separate the washing machine, a completely renovated bathroom, a fairly spacious youth bedroom, another second smaller one that also serves as a dressing room and the master bedroom, en suite with bathroom and exit to the passable light patio. Very high ceilings, giving a greater feeling of spaciousness. Returning to the entrance and this time turning to the right, we find some steps that take us to the living room-kitchen that is totally exterior. White, modern and brand new kitchen, without appliances so you can choose the model you prefer. His living room already has details such as the moldings that offer us a thread of indirect light. This apartment also includes a garage space in the same building, as well as a large storage room with elevator access to all floors. For more information, do not hesitate to contact us. Eye! The photographs of our properties are professional. The lens can generate distortions and the user's perception can vary, so we recommend looking at the m2 indicated in the ad to understand the size of the properties. description: Villa Santa Brigida! Magnificent opportunity to live in a natural environment and with fantastic views. The 10,090m2 plot houses three properties and large areas for gardens, fruit trees and terraces, which makes it a great opportunity to use it for rural tourism or vacation homes. The main house is divided into two floors. The upper floor is distributed in 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, one of them in the master bedroom, which also has a large dressing room. Large kitchen and living room with access to a fantastic Canarian balcony from where you can enjoy wonderful views of the mountains. On the ground floor we find a spacious apartment with one bedroom, a bathroom, a dressing room, a living room-kitchen. The apartment has access to a large terrace where you can enjoy pleasant moments. A few meters from the main house we find a charming cave house with patio, terrace and barbecue area. description: Ref. V3339. Rural house for sale in Teror Hey couple! Are you looking for a quiet refuge in the middle of nature? The old school in the Los Arbejales neighborhood in Teror, now converted into a cozy rural house, is the perfect place for you! . Welcome to a unique house, a home with history and charm, declared an Ethnographic and Cultural Property, completely renovated in 2010. If you are looking for a unique and special place to enjoy together, this house is for you. The house has a large terrace, a relaxing solarium and a garden with a barbecue that invites you to enjoy the company of friends and the impressive views of the nearby mountains. In addition, it has parking for several cars and an area to grow your own garden; and inside you have 3 bedrooms with 2 bathrooms and a study area overlooking the patio. The separate kitchen with utility room is perfect for preparing those homemade country meals, while the patio invites you to relax and enjoy the fresh air. It consists of two joined buildings, an old part with a gabled roof and original wooden floors that are more than 250 years old and another more recent construction from 1920. The reform was carried out after a careful study of traditional Canarian architecture, respecting to the smallest detail the canons of the traditional houses in the area, with exposed stone, and rescuing their original thigh tiles, furnishings and carpentry used decoratively and adapting the electrical and plumbing installations to the present time. With a license to use it as a rural holiday home, but currently in use as a family home, this house is the perfect home for couples like you, who appreciate history and the tranquility of living in the countryside. Come and live your own story" Information: The sale price does not include transfer taxes, notary fees, registration, or any other that may correspond to the buyer according to law. The exposed data is merely informative and is subject to involuntary errors or omissions.

description: Beautiful and spacious triplex house in El Goro, Telde This country house has everything you need: it is spacious, bright, with top quality finishes, and is very well connected.In addition, it is delivered furnished and equipped as seen in the photographs, except for personal items.If you think it may be what you are looking for, read on. In El Goro, Telde, 3 minutes from the GC-1 motorway and 5 from Gran Canaria International Airport, very well connected both north and south, 10 minutes from the center of Telde and Ingenio, is this house that It has everything necessary to develop a life project in it without missing anything. It is a building of about 250 m² approx.built, spread over 3 levels. On the ground floor, we find the garage, a small entrance hall, 1 full bathroom, the very large open-plan kitchen, which integrates the dining room, and a living room.The kitchen has an efficient, high-capacity, energy-efficient air conditioner. On the second floor, which we access by a comfortable staircase located within a bright covered patio, we have 3 very large bedrooms, 2 of them equipped with fitted wardrobes with top quality wood and air conditioning.In addition, we have a full bathroom, also with a built-in wardrobe.The master bedroom has a balcony and a window to the street. On the third floor, we enjoy an open area, ideal for outdoor barbecues and family gatherings, or simply to enjoy the incomparable sensation of having the sky for a roof.A pergola is responsible for providing a shaded area. On this same floor, we find a room that could well be converted into a studio, with very little work, since it has sanitation and taps, so in practice it is already a studio that could be a home for one person, with all comfort. . On the other side, we have a very large living room, equipped with a fully equipped modern kitchen, as well as a space for a dining room.From here we can access the outside terrace, where we can place a hammock, table, some chairs, and enjoy another totally versatile outdoor space. It is important to emphasize that the house is delivered to its new owner fully equipped and furnished as can be seen in the photographs, except for those items of a personal nature, of course. In summary, this spectacular home has: Garage 4 bedrooms 2 full kitchens with dining area 2 full bathrooms 1 toilet 3 air conditioners 2 living rooms (lounge) Balcony Terrace open roof As you can see in the photos, the house is in impeccable condition, having recently been completely renovated.It has fiber optic Internet, and very close by it has essential services for day-to-day life, such as a Spar supermarket and a public transport stop that communicates with the entire island of Gran Canaria. El Goro, Urbanization La Jardinera, is an area of Telde that is currently among the most popular as it is a quiet area, ideal for living, but at the same time it is very well connected. Take a close look at the photographs and the virtual tour that accompany this ad, and if you think this is the home you were looking for, don't hesitate to call right now and request a visit.Opportunities like this don't come around twice, and given the high demand for housing in the area, you're likely to find a new owner quickly.Call right now and see if this is the opportunity to start your new life project.Ahead! Information: The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer.

description: SPECTACULAR COUNTRY PROPERTY IN THE FULL CITY. Located just 5 minutes from the bustle of downtown Las Palmas, we find this great colonial-style property. The house is surrounded by a large garden divided into zones of different environments. Noteworthy is the large outdoor kitchen area, shaded by lush vegetation. The house, as a good stately home from the end of the 20th century, is built with noble and top quality materials. Stone and stonework make up its walls, while tea and riga woods complete its structure, as well as the windows and a large part of the floors. With high ceilings, the main rooms of the house are distributed around a splendid interior patio, having as a link a typical wooden gallery. The property currently consists of 4 bedrooms, 3 of them suite with bathroom, several living rooms, rooms and kitchen with pantry, laundry room on the north side of the house, which at the time was a service area, with its independent entrance. A classic Canarian house, in the middle of its private park, one of those that are increasingly difficult to find and in a great state of conservation. It will lend itself equally well to being a family home or investment in the tourism sector since the property is registered as an urban hotel. The data displayed is purely informative and may be subject to inadvertent errors or omissions. The expenses related to the sale are not included in the price.

description: Fabulous independent house for sale of 150 m2, on a plot of 340m2. The property is divided into two floors plus a roof terrace. On the ground floor, formerly a garage, there is a magical spacious loft with a fitted kitchen and a full bathroom and an entrance and patio with a separate gazebo. The first floor is distributed in two bedrooms, (possibility of making 3) furnished and equipped kitchen, bathroom, living room with fireplace and entrance hall. All its rooms are exterior, which makes it very bright, cozy and with good views. In the rest of the plot, we have several ideal spaces for each moment, a wooden shed, garden area, terrace, gazebo, cultivation area. Huge possibilities! The area is unbeatable, quiet, a few minutes from the beach. They also have a social club where you can enjoy the swimming pool, barbecue area, children's garden and more get-togethers with the neighbors. Do not hesitate to visit it!

description: This penthouse has a privileged location in Telde. From its terrace you can enjoy panoramic views of the surroundings. In addition, the area in which it is located is very quiet and residential, which will allow you to enjoy the privacy and tranquility you are looking for. It has two large bedrooms, a fitted kitchen with utility room, a living room with a dining room and access to a terrace, a complete bathroom with a shower for greater comfort, built-in wardrobes.. . The penthouse itself is very spacious and bright, with an open and modern layout that makes it perfect for living in. If you're a professional looking for a work-from-home property, this penthouse is also a great option. It has an additional room that can be used as an office, study or meeting room, which will allow you to have your work space at home without giving up privacy and comfort. The penthouse also has a utility room and a garage space. The building has few neighbors, very quiet and with an elevator. In short, this penthouse offers an excellent investment opportunity for those looking for an exclusive property in Telde. If you are interested in obtaining more information or in arranging a visit, do not hesitate to contact us, in Tamaragua we will be happy to assist you.

description: Beautiful apartment in perfect condition ready to move into with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms with a garage and storage room located in Tamaraceite - Piletas. The house is in a perfect state of habitability, built with good materials in an organized, clean and very quiet neighborhood community. It is on the 1st floor without an elevator and there are no neighbors above it. It has a very comfortable and pleasant distribution, it has a spacious living room, a large kitchen (with enough space for a large fridge and a table), fully furnished with a large storage capacity and equipped (with appliances in good condition). Interior and exterior carpentry of quality and in good condition. The 3 bedrooms have fitted wardrobes (the main suite type with a built-in bathroom), 2 full bathrooms (1 with a shower and the other with a bathtub). It also has a comfortable parking space and storage room on the roof that is passable and enjoys panoramic and pleasant views of the entire capital, Arucas and the countryside. Ideal for couples or young families who want to live in the capital, in a healthy, quiet environment with all the services at hand. In addition, its location is ideal as it enjoys an excellent and comfortable connection to the entire island by both public and private transport. Do not hesitate to request a visit.

description: TWO-FLOOR APARTMENT in the historic center of Teror, one of the most beautiful and visited towns on our island. This property is located on the pedestrian street that leads to the Basilica of Nuestra Señora del Pino. The magnificent house is a jewel as it retains all its charm on the façade, like others on Calle Real. It consists of two totally independent floors. The first measures 116m2, in which 2 traditional balconies made of Canarian pine tea that does not age and of unique beauty stand out. It consists of living room, 4 bedrooms, kitchen, pantry, 1 bathroom, 1 toilet and patio. The original floors and mulberry wood doors are preserved. On the second floor of 45 m2, we find 2 very bright rooms, with the possibility of converting into an apartment. Roof terrace of 70 m2, where you can contemplate the relaxing landscape that the town offers. Ideal as a habitual residence. Offices or shared work spaces "coworking". Accommodation services such as vacation rental, hotel, boarding house, hostel, etc. Available for sale the complete building of 280 m2. Local 116 m2 + housing on two floors 161m2. Rustic property with 2 Cave Houses of 103 m2 built in total, a 52 m2 warehouse, a 14 m2 tool room, a porch and 13,086 m2 of land for cultivation, it also has 2 water tanks of up to approximately 40,000 liters, with a Irrigation in operation, automatic entrance door and ample parking area. It has 1 orchard and 6 fences with paved roads for cargo vehicles. It also has orange trees, vines, fig trees and avocado trees. description: Extraordinary traditional Canarian house in Vegueta  Engel & Völkers presents this extraordinary typical Canarian house, located in the foundational district of Vegueta, in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.  The property is distributed over three floors. On the first floor we have the main entrance where a beautiful hall gives you a welcoming. Then we find two living rooms, one of them in the style of Louis XV. Following, we have a dining room and a modern kitchen, illuminated by natural light coming from a courtyard full of vegetation and covered by a glass skylight, made by the artist Tuula Giraldo. Crossing the hallway, we have a bathroom and a bedroom with a large dressing room. Going up through a staircase of original design, with an outstanding combination of wood and iron, we find a second living-dining room. On this same level there are four more bedrooms, an office and a bathroom with bathtub. As a finishing touch to the hallway, at the very back, we have a fantastic leaded glass window, also by Giraldo.  On the third floor, we find a living room followed by a dining room, a kitchen, a bathroom with shower and a large bedroom. From the living room we access a terrace of 3 levels, ideal for holding social events. The highest part has a viewpoint overlooking the entire bay, the Cathedral and much of the city.  The property has an optional large parking slot, which is not included in the price. The house dates from 1898, completely renovated five years ago, and declared as part of the National Historic and Artistic Ensemble, since 1973. The balcony is the typical Canarian balcony, a characteristic element of the traditional architecture of the islands, made of wood with carvings, covered with a wood and tile roof. Location  The house is located in the oldest and most historic district of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Its cobbled streets and medieval surroundings take us back to the 15th century, when it was founded. This area has all sort of services around: public transport, pharmacies, clinics, schools, supermarkets, stores, and San Roque Hospital. Since we are in the historical heart of the city, we must highlight the numerous places of interest such as the Cathedral of the Canary Islands, Casas Consistoriales, Casa de Colón or the Atlantic Center of Modern Art. The Vegueta Market is just a few minutes' walk away and, if we continue a little further, we reach the Triana area, one of the most important commercial areas of the city, which also has a wide gastronomic and leisure offer.   In addition, the property has immediate access to the GC-1 highway, being able to quickly connect with the exit of the city to the airport and the south of the island, as well as with the ring road, linking with the central and northern area. Just 400 meters away, we find La Avenida Marítima, a very long promenade perfect for walking, running, cycling or rollerblading. From the bay we can enjoy every Saturday, between March and September, the Vela Latina regattas.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Vegueta, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
suggestedTexts.title: Terraced house
