description: Country house for sale in Santa Brígida, San José de Las Vegas 5 bedrooms. Available exterior housing of 430 m2 on a plot of 903 m2 renovated in 2005. It has all the necessary amenities; garage for four cars, terrace and wide views to the outside. The land house is located in the San José neighborhood of Las Vegas, an idyllic area for rest and tranquility, surrounded by trees and open spaces where you can breathe the tranquility of the countryside, however, it is located fifteen minutes from downtown San Mateo and fifteen minutes from the capital, being an area of easy communication. It also has large common areas of about 450 square meters where you can spend afternoons with your family, or simply enjoying the good weather. For lovers of gardening, it also has different fruit trees such as avocado, lemon or orange trees, among others, it also has a small removable pool accompanied by a barbecue, an ideal area to enjoy good company with unbeatable conditions. On the other hand, it has two cisterns, one of 60,000 liters, and another of 12,000 liters, one of which collects rainwater and is responsible for watering the common areas and the other is intended for consumption in the home. The garage has the possibility of parking four vehicles with total comfort, being sheltered from the weather conditions and isolating them from the street. However, it has a large space that can be used as a storage area, cellar or gym. It has an ideal toilet for outdoor areas. It has a kitchen with all the comforts at your fingertips, due to the spaciousness, good distribution and complete equipment, as well as an exit to the outside. First floor: Two double bedrooms, one of them with bathroom en suite, large living room with fireplace, kitchen with access to the terrace and a second bathroom with double sink. Second floor: A living room with a fireplace, three double bedrooms and a bathroom. In addition, it has luxury finishes, such as smooth paint, an armored door and fitted wardrobes with drawers. Information: The sale price does not include taxes of the transmission, notary fees, registration, or any other that according to law may correspond to the buyer. The exposed data are merely indicative and are subject to errors or involuntary omissions. Contact without obligation and start living your dream. For sale for €659,000.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: San José de las Vegas-La Atalaya, Santa Brigida
suggestedTexts.title: Detached house in Camino de las Rochas

The first floor is distributed in living room, kitchen with access to the patio, toilet and utility room. Upstairs are distributed in three bedrooms (1 en-suite) very bright and two bathrooms. This beautiful property is situated only a few minutes away from the commercial centre Los Alisios and with quick connection to the motorway of the south. description: Engel & Völkers presents this exclusive luxury penthouse on the beachfront of Las Canteras. This impressive penthouse-duplex with an elegant and modern design is divided into two floors. Access to the property is via the first floor, leading directly onto the imposing 58m2 terrace. Unique views of the promenade and the beach. We then enter into an open-plan living room-kitchen with top quality appliances and furniture. From the sofa and through the large glass doors of the living room, we can enjoy the tranquillity of the sea views. In addition, the penthouse enjoys maximum privacy as it is made of mirrored glass. Next, we find a bedroom with sea views and a complete bathroom. Access to the ground floor is via a minimalist style staircase. The master bedroom occupies the entire floor along with a full bathroom and dressing room. If you love sunsets, don't miss the privilege of enjoying the best sunset on the island. The luxury of being able to enjoy a swim on the beach and sunbath on this beautiful terrace is priceless. Location The property is located in one of the best areas of the Avenida de la playa de Las Canteras, where its new owners will be able to enjoy the gastronomy, walks along the avenue, shopping, leisure and sport centres. A flat, in the city centre and close to all the services that someone may require: transport, pharmacies, supermarkets, etc.. . make it an attractive home located in one of the most desirable streets of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria for those who like to live next to the beach and walk everywhere, without having to take the car. All this without renouncing to the easy and quick communication with the motorway link that gives access to the airport and the rest of the island.

description: Modern villa in La Garita. Engel & Völkers presents this exclusive modern design villa in residential the area of l de la Garita, only 2 minutes away from the coast of Telde. This detached villa has been built with high quality materials and exceptional design. The carpentry is made of anodized aluminium, double glazing absorbing solar radiation and external noise.  On the main floor we have a spacious living room with large windows which provides plenty of light. There is a bedroom with built-in wardrobe, and a bathroom. Going up to the first floor, through a modern glazed staircase, we find a hall that can be used as a living room from which we access two bedrooms. Both with access to one of the balconies, and one complete bathroom.  The first floor is dedicated only to the master bedroom. The bedroom has a terrace and an incredible and wide walk-in closed and a large bathroom.  On the ground floor we have a minimalist style kitchen, fully equipped with top quality appliances, open to the dining area with beautiful double glazed sliding doors from where we access the back terrace, with outdoor bathroom, for best comfort. The laundry room is spacious and can be accessed via the kitchen or the terrace itself.  Going downstairs to the basement, we find a toilet, a garage with capacity for 3 vehicles and a wonderful leisure room, fully equipped: soundproofing, American bar, overhead projector and air conditioning where you can enjoy great and fun moments with the family. Location. This property is located in a very quiet area in La Garita, in the municipality of Telde, but very close to large commercial areas. Within walking distance, we have Ikea, La Estrella Shopping Mall, where you will find supermarkets such as Alcampo, Leroy Merlin and, a few minutes away, Decathlon. For nature and sport lovers.  A few minutes by car we have the city centre of Telde, the second most important city of the island, where you can find leisure areas, fashion, banks, private and public medical centres. If we head towards the coast, in a few minutes we will have the opportunity to enjoy the great gastronomy of the coastal area. We can walk to the great beaches that our coastline has to offer, such as Salinetas beach, Melenera, Playa del Hombre, Hoya del Pozo, La Garita and countless beautiful coves where you can lose yourself. An impressive place to enjoy the sunrises and sunsets of the area. It is only 10 minutes away from the city of La Palmas de Gran Canaria, with public services and bus stops nearby. And 20 minutes, we find the famous dunes of Maspalomas in our emblematic area in the south of the island.

description: Casa Terrera in La Calzada, an environment near the Jardín Canario with a pleasant climate and good connections to all services and 15 minutes from the city center. The house is equipped with all the comforts and spaces to enjoy the tranquility provided by the environment, it is also equipped with air conditioning and an alarm system. It consists of two floors and a walkable roof terrace with a large laundry room. On the ground floor there is a large garage with an automatic door and it has a large built-in aluminum wardrobe, it has direct access to the house. Through the main door we access a distributor corridor that connects us with the outdoor living room, a complete bathroom, the spacious and fully equipped kitchen and another living-dining room through which there is access to a terrace equipped for barbecue, etc. From the living-dining room we access a wonderful and comfortable staircase to the upper floor where the three exterior double bedrooms are located. The master bedroom has its own full bathroom and has a terrace through which and through a wide spiral staircase you can access the roof terrace and the laundry room. On this upper floor there is another full bathroom, which would be the third and has room for the other two double rooms. description: Semi-detached house with terrace Engel & Völkers presents a wonderful semi-detached house, located in the exclusive neighbourhood Santa Margarita, in Marzagán. We will access the house through the first floor. Upon entering, on the right hand side we find a room with an en-suite bathroom, while on the left hand side is the main room with panoramic views of the mountains and another en-suite bathroom. Descending a beautiful staircase, we reach the main floor where there is a spacious living room with access to a terrace with views. The living room leads to a large kitchen-dining room and a laundry room. Upon leaving the dining room, crossing a beautiful interior patio with vegetation, we have two more bedrooms and a bathroom. In the basement there is a gym, a large living room, a room with an en-suite bathroom and a light patio. It also has an open private parking area. In summary, this property has ample interior and exterior spaces, with impressive views and facilities for enjoyment such as the jacuzzi, barbecue area and gym. It is an excellent opportunity to live in an exclusive area and enjoy exceptional quality of life. Location Marzagán is a town on the outskirts of the capital and, at the same time, close to the city, just over 12 kilometers away thanks to good road connections. Within a radius of 10 kilometers we find several points of interest: bilingual schools The American School of Las Palmas and The British School of Gran Canarial, the Insular Maternity-Child University Hospital Complex, Las Terrazas and El Mirador shopping centers and Spain's oldest golf club, the Real Club de Golf de Las Palmas. For nature lovers, there is an ideal place nearby, through Barranco de las Goteras. This path is very popular on the eve of the Carmen festivities, since in Las Goteras there is a small hermitage where the image of Ntra. Sra. Del Carmen is located. There are also other royal paths that lead to Bandama Mountain or the summit of Jinámar. An enclave to enjoy peace and nature, away from the pace of the city, without giving up the convenience of being close to several urban centers.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Marzagán-Los Hoyos-La Montañeta, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
suggestedTexts.title: Semi-detached house

description: Spectacular large independent House / Villa located in the most exclusive and privileged areas of Gran Canaria (Tafira). Ideal for large families or investors with the possibility of conversion into a small hotel, nursery, luxury restaurant, school or private clinic. The property consists of 924 m2 built distributed over four floors in which we can find 15 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, 2 large lounges, living room / gym, 1 spacious kitchen, 1 large dovecote located on the deck, as well as 2 garages for a total of six seats. On the other hand, we find a 450 m2 patio / terrace with barbecue area and gardens, a unique space where to hold meetings or celebrations with friends and family in which to spend unforgettable moments in the comfort that transmits the tranquility and privacy of the place. The property is in an optimal state of conservation, ready to move into it, being only 2 minutes from all services in the area (gas stations, supermarkets, greeting center, post office.. . etc. ) and just 10 minutes from the furthest point of the city. If what you are looking for is a dream property in a unique environment in which to spend your time with your family, carry out your vital projects or achieve the quality of life you are looking for, this is a great opportunity.

description: Fantastic Apartment Triana-Vegueta Engel&Völkers presents this fantastic apartment with garage in a privileged area between Vegueta and Triana. With a very functional distribution, each room is designed to maximize space. The natural light that enters in abundance through the large windows illuminates all the rooms, since, both in the living room and in the bedrooms. Those windows are divided into several parts, reaching the floor, having the possibility of opening or closing one or more leaves, depending on the light or how airy we want to have the room at all times. We must highlight the quality of the carpentry and the availability of large built-in closets in the rooms. The property has two entrance doors, the first one leads us to the hall and through the other one we access the kitchen. From the hall we can access the magnificent living room of great amplitude and with a fabulous balcony that allows us to enjoy pleasant open views. The rest of the house is distributed through a wide corridor. Next to the living room is the master bedroom with en suite bathroom complete with bathtub and an excellent floor to ceiling circular bay window. Next, going down the hallway are the bathroom, this one also with bathtub, and the other two bedrooms. Finishing the corridor to the right we find the kitchen and the utility room that, although they require updating, have a great distribution with great possibilities. A great property ideal for families with children or for investors who want to monetize it for rent in an area increasingly demanded by foreign and domestic tourists. Location The property is located next to Triana and is only separated from Vegueta by the Guiniguada.  The area of Triana, the most important commercial and pedestrian street of the city of Las Palmas, where we will find the park and the station of San Telmo, historical buildings such as the Literary Cabinet, the Pérez Galdós theater and the Pérez Galdós house museum among other museums. Crossing the Guiniguada we arrive at Vegueta which is the foundational neighborhood of the city of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. It was declared a National Historic-Artistic Site in 1973.  The neighborhood owes its name to the fertile plain that extended around the Royal fortification of Las Palmas, initially called "La Vegueta de Santa Ana". From then until today it would be the center of the political, religious and administrative life of the island. Today the neighborhood maintains the approximate limits of its foundation, with the ocean to the west and the mountain, now occupied by the neighborhoods of San José, San Juan and San Roque, to the east, the Guiniguada ravine. It maintains its character of administrative center of the city and has acquired a marked tourist character since it is the best preserved historic center of the Canary Islands, where we will find the cathedral and the Plaza de Santa Ana, the Canarian Museum and various historic buildings characterized by the typical Canarian balcony in these narrow streets of Vegueta.
suggestedTexts.subtitle: Triana, Las Palmas de Gran Canaria
suggestedTexts.title: Flat

description: Outstanding villa in the centre of Las Palmas Engel & Völkers presents this magnificent villa in the centre of the capital. A private compound, in the middle of the hustle and bustle of the city.  Just a few steps away Ciudad Jardin, this impressive house has everything you may desire. A huge terrace that surrounds the entire house, and especially a large area where you can enjoy the sunny days having meetings and barbecues with family and friends. It has also the possibility to build your own swimming pool.  The villa is divided into three floors. The first floor leads to two separate areas: an impressive kitchen with a kitchen island, and the best materials and appliances, perfect for cuisine lovers. On the other side we have a great living room with a great luminosity.  On the second floor there are three bedrooms. Almost half of this floor is occupied by the master bedroom with a spectacular walk-in closet and a wide bathroom with bathtub and shower, recently renovated. The other half of the floor is occupied by two bedrooms sharing a bathroom, also recently renovated. All bedrooms are exterior and with excellent luminosity.  The third and last floor is occupied by an en suite bedroom, with its own walk-in closet and bathroom with bathtub. This bedroom has its own terrace with spectacular views of the entire city. If you love living in the centre of the city and do not want to give up the comfort offered by a house compared to an apartment, do not hesitate to visit it! Location The chalet is located in the neighbourhood of Ciudad Jardín, surrounded by all the necessary services, as well as large green areas such as Doramas Park, the Néstor Museum, the Santa Catalina Hotel and the Pueblo Canario.  It is located just above Paseo Chill Street, one of the most important streets of the city, which serves as a link between the Old Town and the Port area. Less than 10 minutes away by car, we have Mesa y Lopez Avenue, one of the most important commercial areas of the city in whose surroundings we find a wide gastronomic and leisure offer.  Ciudad Jardín stands out for being part of a large green belt that includes Doramas Park, Romano Park and the new Parque Estadio Insular. This area of the capital is characterized for being one of the most distinguished and beautiful areas of the capital of Gran Canaria. The unique architecture, born at the end of the XIX century and beginning of the XX century, has allowed it to become an urban example linked to the commercial bourgeoisie. And finally, we need to mention some remarkable spots in the surroundings, such as Santa Catalina Hotel of Ciudad Jardín is its great, El Pueblo Canario and the Néstor Museum.
